An archaeologist embarks on the historically important excavation of Sutton Hoo in 1938.
Two people live in different times. Seo-Yeon lives in the present and Young-Sook lives in the past. One phone call connects the two, and their lives are changed irrevocably.
After crash-landing in the snowswept Andes, a Uruguayan rugby team has no choice but to turn to desperate measures in order to survive.

Cast: Billy Bob Thornton,Halle Berry,Taylor Simpson,Gabrielle Witcher
Description: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.
A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

Cast: Nick Park,Mel Gibson,Julia Sawalha,Phil Daniels,Lynn Ferguson
Description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

Cast: Miles Teller,Shailene Woodley,Kyle Chandler,Jennifer Jason Leigh
Description: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

Cast: Kodi Smit-McPhee,Chloë Grace Moretz,Richard Jenkins,Cara Buono
Description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.
A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Trini Alvarado,Peter Dobson,John Astin
Description: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead, and he uses that gift to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.
An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

Cast: Jon Erwin,Zachary Levi,Anna Paquin,Hayden Zaller,Ser'Darius Blain
Description: The story of NFL MVP and Hall of Fame quarterback Kurt Warner, who went from stocking shelves at a supermarket to becoming an American Football star.
The story of two mothers who bond in unexpected way after giving birth the same day.

Ivan Locke, a dedicated family man and successful construction manager, receives a phone call on the eve of the biggest challenge of his career that sets in motion a series of events that threaten his carefully cultivated existence.

Cast: Meryl Streep,Robert Redford,Klaus Maria Brandauer,Michael Kitchen
Description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.
A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

Suzu is a shy high school student living in a rural village. For years, she has only been a shadow of herself. But when she enters "U", a massive virtual world, she escapes into her online persona as Belle, a globally-beloved singer.
At a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student runs into her sugar daddy and ex girlfriend.
True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

Raised as an oversized elf, Buddy travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, Walter Hobbs, who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.
A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.

Cast: Gastón Duprat,Penélope Cruz,Antonio Banderas,Oscar Martínez,José Luis Gómez
Description: A wealthy businessman hires a famous filmmaker to help make a smash hit film.

Cast: Thomasin McKenzie,Ben Foster,Jeffery Rifflard,Derek John Drescher
Description: A father and his thirteen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

Cast: Mark Osborne,Tom Kenny,Jeffrey Tambor,Rodger Bumpass,Carolyn Lawrence
Description: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.
Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.
A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.
After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.
An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences across late 18th-century Europe with his band of misfits.

Cast: Paul Giamatti,George Clooney,Philip Seymour Hoffman,Ryan Gosling
Description: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.
The Red Ribbon Army from Goku's past has returned with two new androids to challenge him and his friends.

Cast: Matt Damon,Scarlett Johansson,Thomas Haden Church,Elle Fanning
Description: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.
A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.
A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.
Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.
A successful businesswoman gets caught up in a game of cat and mouse as she tracks down the unknown man who raped her.
A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.
In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

A former British Army officer, who was tortured as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, discovers that the man responsible for much of his treatment is still alive and sets out to confront him.
Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.
Firebird follows a handsome, soulful young soldier who embarks on a clandestine sexual affair with a charismatic fighter pilot on a Soviet Air Force Base at the height of 1970's Communist rule.

In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.
As the world is overrun by zombies, a group of scientists and military personnel sheltering in an underground bunker in Florida must determine how they should deal with the undead horde.
In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

Cast: Ethan Hawke,Amanda Seyfried,Cedric the Entertainer,Victoria Hill
Description: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.
A wannabe blues-guitar virtuoso seeks a long-lost song by legendary musician Roberto Johnson.

Cast: Jodie Foster,Kate Winslet,Christoph Waltz,John C. Reilly
Description: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.
A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Sean Penn,Don Harvey,John C. Reilly
Description: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

Movie Name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (Ultimate Edition)
Description: Batman is manipulated by Lex Luthor to fear Superman. Superman´s existence is meanwhile dividing the world and he is framed for murder during an international crisis. The heroes clash and force the neutral Wonder Woman to reemerge.
A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.
Based on the incredible true story of the Beam family.
Wealthy rancher G. W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.
A promising teenage dancer enrolls at a prestigious ballet school while grappling with her gender dysphoria.
A security pro finds his past returning to haunt him when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

Cast: Javier Bardem,Manolo Solo,Almudena Amor,Óscar de la Fuente
Description: Awaiting a visit by a committee that could give his company an award for excellence, the owner of an industrial scales manufacturing business tries to resolve any problems from his workers in enough time.

Cast: Johnny Depp,Mary Stuart Masterson,Aidan Quinn,Julianne Moore
Description: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.
A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

Cast: Frank Oz,Jim Henson,Kathryn Mullen,Frank Oz,Dave Goelz
Description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

Cast: Howard Hawks,Kenneth Tobey,Margaret Sheridan,James Arness,Robert Cornthwaite
Description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.
The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

Cast: Aaron Taylor-Johnson,Kristin Scott Thomas,Anne-Marie Duff,David Threlfall
Description: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.
Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.
Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

Cast: Melissa McCarthy,Richard E. Grant,Dolly Wells,Ben Falcone
Description: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.
During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.
A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.
After spending time in a mental hospital, a girl is reunited with her sister and returns home, only to see some truly strange events start to happen.

Cast: Robin Williams,Mary Beth Hurt,Glenn Close,John Lithgow
Description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

Cast: Kitana Kiki Rodriguez,Mya Taylor,Karren Karagulian,Mickey O'Hagan
Description: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.
Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.
A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.
When a congressional aide is killed, a Washington, D.C. journalist starts investigating the case involving the Representative, his old college friend.

Cast: John Wayne,John Wayne,Richard Boone,Maureen O'Hara,Patrick Wayne
Description: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hope of pursuing freedom while falling in love with his mistress, the philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.

Cast: Kingsley Ben-Adir,Eli Goree,Aldis Hodge,Leslie Odom Jr.
Description: A fictional account of one incredible night where icons Muhammad Ali, Malcolm X, Sam Cooke, and Jim Brown gathered discussing their roles in the Civil Rights Movement and cultural upheaval of the 60s.

Cast: Clyde Geronimi,David Hand,Rickie Sorensen,Sebastian Cabot,Karl Swenson,Junius Matthews
Description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

Cast: Billy Bob Thornton,Bernie Mac,Lauren Graham,John Ritter
Description: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.
A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

Cast: Don Hall,Jim Cummings,Craig Ferguson,John Cleese,Bud Luckey
Description: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

The inspiring true love story of Robin (Andrew Garfield) and Diana Cavendish (Claire Foy), an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. Their heartwarming celebration of human possibility marks the directorial debut of Andy Serkis.
After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.
A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.
When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.
A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.
A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.
A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.
Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.
After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.

Cast: Dustin Hoffman,Robert De Niro,Anne Heche,Woody Harrelson
Description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

Cast: Adarsh Gourav,Rajkummar Rao,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Vedant Sinha
Description: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.
A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.
An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.
After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured, but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.
A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.
A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.
H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.
During a routine exercise, a team of National Guards are threatened by angry and violent locals.

In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

Cast: Marco Leonardi,Lumi Cavazos,Regina Torné,Mario Iván Martínez
Description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.
A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

Cast: Burny Mattinson,David Michener,John Musker,Vincent Price,Barrie Ingham,Val Bettin,Susanne Pollatschek
Description: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.
A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.
A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

Movie Name: It's Kind of a Funny Story
Cast: Ryan Fleck,Keir Gilchrist,Zach Galifianakis,Emma Roberts,Dana DeVestern
Description: A clinically-depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.
An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.
Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.
Katja's life collapses after the deaths of her husband and son in a bomb attack. After a time of mourning and injustice, Katja seeks revenge.
When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.
A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.
In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.
When a young boy's family is killed by the mob, their tough neighbor Gloria becomes his reluctant guardian. In possession of a book that the gangsters want, the pair go on the run in New York.

Cast: John Wayne,Dean Martin,Martha Hyer,Michael Anderson Jr.
Description: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.
A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.
A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

Movie Name: The Girl Who Played with Fire
Description: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

Cast: Evan Rachel Wood,Larry David,Henry Cavill,Adam Brooks
Description: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcé from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.
A chilling vision of the house of Saddam. The world of Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was given a choice; either be the double for Saddam's sadistic son, or die.
A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.
After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

Cast: Anthony Mann,Robert Taylor,Deborah Kerr,Leo Genn,Peter Ustinov
Description: After fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia, he begins to question the tyrannical leadership of the despotic emperor Nero.
The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.

Cast: Curtis Hanson,Jonny Weston,Gerard Butler,Elisabeth Shue,Abigail Spencer
Description: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.
A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

Cast: Florian Lukas,David Kross,Lachlan Nieboer,Stig Henrik Hoff
Description: Norway, WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin, they realize the only way to survive the winter is to place the rules of war aside.
Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.
In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

Cast: Ernest B. Schoedsack,Joel McCrea,Fay Wray,Leslie Banks,Robert Armstrong
Description: A psychotic big game hunter deliberately strands a luxury yacht on a remote island, where he begins to hunt its passengers for sport.

Cast: Shah Rukh Khan,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Arjun Rampal,Isha Koppikar
Description: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

Cast: Monique van de Ven,Rutger Hauer,Tonny Huurdeman,Wim van den Brink
Description: A young love faces with old problems.

Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.
A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex trafficking scandal.
An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".
A recently unemployed single father struggles to get back his foreclosed home by working for the real estate broker who is the source of his frustration.
A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.
When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.
A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.
The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

Cast: Laura Linney,Philip Seymour Hoffman,Philip Bosco,Peter Friedman
Description: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.
An actress attempts to convince a director how she's perfect for a role in his upcoming production.
A young woman goes on a 1,700-mile trek across the deserts of West Australia with four camels and her faithful dog.
An English boy, living in Africa during World War II, through his boxing prowess, becomes a symbol of hope, in a time of war.

Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.
A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.
When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.
Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.
Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love, and club culture.
The citizens of a Texan town become concerned and panicked when a local bad boy escapes prison and heads for his hometown.

Movie Name: A Love Song for Bobby Long
Cast: Scarlett Johansson,John Travolta,Gabriel Macht,Deborah Kara Unger
Description: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

Cast: Stellan Skarsgård,Bruno Ganz,Pål Sverre Hagen,Jakob Oftebro
Description: After his son is murdered by drug dealers, a snowplow driver starts seeking revenge.
A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.
After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.
A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.
An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.
An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.
The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.
A married couple preparing to celebrate their wedding anniversary receives shattering news that promises to forever change the course of their lives.

Cast: Sareum Srey Moch,Phoeung Kompheak,Sveng Socheata,Mun Kimhak
Description: Cambodian author and human rights activist Loung Ung recounts the horrors she suffered as a child under the rule of the deadly Khmer Rouge.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Kate Beckinsale,Sam Rockwell,Drew Barrymore
Description: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

Cast: Kei'ichi Sato,Daisuke Ono,Mao Ichimichi,Tomohiro Kaku,Saori Hayami
Description: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.
A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star.
A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic philosophy. Based on the factual story of a K.K.K. member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.
A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

Cast: Nikolaj Lie Kaas,Fares Fares,Pilou Asbæk,David Dencik
Description: The murder of young twins initially implicates a group of upper class students as the killers, though the case takes a turn or two from its starting point.

Movie Name: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
Description: The killer known as Holiday continues to stalk the Falcone crime family while a new class of costumed criminal rises in Gotham City. Batman suspects that a former ally might be the serial killer.

Cast: Bill Paxton,Billy Bob Thornton,Cynda Williams,Michael Beach
Description: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.
Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

Movie Name: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
Description: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world, based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.
An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

Movie Name: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
Cast: Tony Musante,Suzy Kendall,Enrico Maria Salerno,Eva Renzi
Description: An American expatriate in Rome attempts to unmask a serial killer whom he witnessed in the act of an attempted murder - and is now hunting him and his girlfriend.
A 15-year-old Long Island boy loses everything and everyone he knows, soon becoming involved in a relationship with a much older man.
A young man accused of sabotage goes on the lam to prove his innocence.
Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

Cast: Michael Zimbalist,Vincent D'Onofrio,Rodrigo Santoro,Diego Boneta,Seu Jorge
Description: Pele's meteoric rise from the slums of Sao Paulo to leading Brazil to its first World Cup victory at the age of 17 is chronicled in this biographical drama.

Cast: Lee Marvin,Mark Hamill,Robert Carradine,Bobby Di Cicco
Description: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.
Doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar Anton Phibes seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for the death of his wife.
A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.

Cast: Helena Bonham Carter,Linus Roache,Alex Jennings,Charlotte Rampling
Description: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

Cast: Fernando Fernán Gómez,Jorge Sanz,Penélope Cruz,Miriam Díaz-Aroca
Description: A 1931 Spanish military deserter finds himself on a lonely farm until the farmer's four daughters pay a visit and he falls for all of them.

Cast: Donald Sutherland,Kate Nelligan,Stephen MacKenna,Philip Martin Brown
Description: A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.
A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?
A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

Cast: Thomas Jane,Aaron Eckhart,Paulina Porizkova,James Le Gros
Description: A former L.A. drug dealer has moved to Houston to make a new life for himself as a married architect. Everything falls apart when he is suddenly visited by one of his former cohorts who comes carrying heroin.
A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.
Life for a pair of veteran actors gets turned upside down after they meet a brash teenager.
While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.
A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.
A rugby player is put up in a juvenile detention center. There he plays for the Highland Rugby team and ultimately plays against his father in the National Championships.
A gay filmmaker becomes involved with an obsessive fan while still pining for his absent true love. Meanwhile, he shares a close but complex relationship with his trans sister, an actress.

Cast: Christian Duurvoort,Rickson Tevez,Gabriel Weinstein,Martin Sheen,Rooney Mara
Description: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.

Cast: Joel Murray,Tara Lynne Barr,Mackenzie Brooke Smith,Melinda Page Hamilton
Description: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.
After a casual encounter, a brokenhearted woman decides to confront her life and the most important events involving her estranged daughter.

Cast: Gaëtan Brizzi,Paul Brizzi,Hendel Butoy,Francis Glebas,Eric Goldberg,Don Hahn,Pixote Hunt,James Levine,Steve Martin,Itzhak Perlman,Quincy Jones
Description: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

Kajaki Dam 2006. A company of young British soldiers encounter an unexpected, terrifying enemy. A dried-out river bed, and under every step the possibility of an anti-personnel mine. A mine that could cost you your leg - or your life.
A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.
The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.
A socially awkward teenage maths prodigy finds new confidence and new friendships when he lands a spot on the British squad at the International Mathematics Olympiad.
A masked, shadowy killer brutally murders the models of a scandalous fashion house in Rome.
An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

Cast: Vincent Cassel,Emmanuelle Bercot,Louis Garrel,Isild Le Besco
Description: Tony is admitted to a rehabilitation center after a serious skiing accident. Dependent on medical staff and painkillers, she takes the time to remember the tumultuous love story she lived with Georgio.
The story of three close friends who are involved in a love-triangle.

Cast: Steve Buscemi,Carol Kane,Mark Boone Junior,Bronson Dudley
Description: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".
The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Police Story (1985) are out for revenge.

As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

Cast: Pierfrancesco Favino,Maria Fernanda Cândido,Fabrizio Ferracane,Fausto Russo Alesi
Description: The real life of Tommaso Buscetta, the so-called "boss of the two worlds," the first mafia informant in Sicily in the 1980s.

A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.
A dramatization of the 1968 strike at the Ford Dagenham car plant, where female workers walked out in protest against sexual discrimination.
The lives of a bored suburban couple are changed forever when a seemingly nice old man gives their daughter a job at his fish store, and soon his gruesome hobbies are brought to light.

A mom looks for another source of income, when her husband leaves with the money meant for the new mobile home. A nearby Indian territory stretches across the border to Canada with a drivable frozen river between. Smuggling?

Cast: Wilhelmenia Fernandez,Frédéric Andréi,Richard Bohringer,Thuy An Luu
Description: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.
When Doris Lang is chosen as the next bride for the vampire Count Magnus Lee, she will hire a mysterious vampire hunter known only as D in an attempt to escape her ill-gotten fate.
When her husband goes missing at the beach, a female professor begins to mentally disintegrate as her denial of his disappearance becomes delusional.

Cast: Antonio de la Torre,Roberto Álamo,Javier Pereira,Luis Zahera
Description: Inspectors Velarde and Alfaro must find what appears to be a serial killer. This hunt against the clock will make them realize something they'd never thought about: neither one of them is that different from the killer.

Cast: Nadine Labaki,Joanna Moukarzel,Gisèle Aouad,Yasmine Al Massri
Description: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.
Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

Cast: Forest Whitaker,Diane Venora,Michael Zelniker,Samuel E. Wright
Description: The troubled life and career of jazz musician Charlie "Bird" Parker.
Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?

Movie Name: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
Description: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?
Korean resistance fighters smuggle explosives to destroy facilities controlled by Japanese forces in this period action thriller.
A loan shark is forced to reconsider his violent lifestyle after the arrival of a mysterious woman claiming to be his long-lost mother.
Admiral Yi Sun-sin faces a tough challenge when he is forced to defend his nation with just 13 battleships against 300 Japanese enemy ships in the Battle of Myeongryang.

Cast: Barry Cook,James McAvoy,Jim Broadbent,Bill Nighy,Hugh Laurie
Description: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Valérie Bodson,Hervé Sogne,Rock Chen
Description: Jean-Claude Van Damme gets involved in a bank robbery with hostages situation and reflects about his life during it.

Through a hidden path, a lone rider reaches a little town high up in the Alps. Nobody knows where the stranger comes from, nor what he wants there. But everyone knows that they don't want him to stay.

Cast: Robb Wells,John Paul Tremblay,Mike Smith,Lucy Decoutere
Description: Ricky, Julian, and Bubbles come up with a scheme to steal large amounts of untraceable coins.
A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.
Over the summer, a series of unfortunate happening triggers a financial crisis for a young woman and she soon finds her life falling apart.
A French police magistrate spends years trying to take down one of the country's most powerful drug rings.
A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

Movie Name: Things We Lost in the Fire
Cast: Halle Berry,Benicio Del Toro,Alison Lohman,David Duchovny
Description: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.
Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.
A young woman is taken hostage by a police officer gone mad.
Almost half a century ago, a remote village in the middle of a tropical rainforest starts witnessing a series of unexplainable events which they attribute to the supernatural.
Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Sam comes to resent Tess' hectic lifestyle.
A tough criminal is arrested after hiding the loot from a Paris armored truck robbery. A talkative dimwit befriends him in prison and escapes with him - chased by police and his evil crime boss.
A homosexual Catholic priest finds out during confessional that a young girl is being sexually abused by her father, and has to decide how to deal with both that secret and his own.
A sweet blind girl Zooni meets a flirty Rehan. She ignores her friends' warnings. It's her time to discover life. Is she making the right love choice?
Samar, the son of a political family, has chosen to go to the USA to live with his girlfriend. However, the death of his father makes him put his plans on hold and enter the dirty world of politics.
A young man harasses a homeless woman, another man protests, the police arrest both and the woman has to leave the country. What were their various story-lines leading up to this event?
A jazz musician and a stunt man are the spitting image of two millionaire brothers. They take the job to replace them in Rio de Janeiro when someone plans to assassinate them.
A coming of age story involving young love and a mysterious music, coming from a crystal radio left as a memento by an absent father, that leads a young heroine deep into a hidden world.
The crew of a Danish cargo ship is hijacked by Somali pirates who proceed to engage in escalating negotiations with authorities in Copenhagen.

A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desdemona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?
A skilled Korean archer goes up against the mighty force of Manchus with the sole purpose of rescuing his kidnapped sister.
A blind man seeks revenge against a corrupt politician and his brother after his wife is raped and killed.
A newly married couple's life falls in jeopardy when the wife goes missing under mysterious circumstances.

Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

Cast: Michael Shannon,Douglas Ligon,Barlow Jacobs,Michael Abbott Jr.
Description: Set in Arkansas, this poetic and powerful film directed by Jeff Nichols (Mud, Take Shelter) tracks a blood feud that erupts when two sets of half-brothers come to blows at their father's funeral.
An account of the gangster Mahindra Dolas and his gang, which terrorized Mumbai City, and a massive war between Mumbai Police and gangs during 16 November 1991.

Cast: Louis de Funès,Geneviève Grad,Michel Galabru,Christian Marin
Description: Gendarme Ludovic Cruchot is re-assigned to the French Riviera seaside resort town of Saint-Tropez where petty criminals and his own daughter give him a hard time.

Cast: Louis Koo,Suet Lam,Tony Ka Fai Leung,Eddie Cheung
Description: Rival gang leaders are locked in a struggle to become the new chairman of Hong Kong's Triad society.
Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.

Movie Name: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not
Cast: Audrey Tautou,Samuel Le Bihan,Isabelle Carré,Sophie Guillemin
Description: A young woman who is in love with a married doctor becomes dangerous when her attempts to persuade him to leave his wife are unsuccessful. However, when things are seen from his point of view, the real situation becomes clear.
Four independent stories set in modern China about random acts of violence.

Movie Name: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
Description: On a small pacific island, Alan and Charlie try to find a war treasure left behind by the Japanese army in World War II.
A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.
The lives of four drug dealers, one user, and two prostitutes are explored.

2 cops are promised by the retiring chief of the Paris police that the one, getting the violent gang robbing armored trucks, will get his job. The 2 will do whatever it takes to get the promotion, even if it means breaking the law.
A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.
Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romance.

Nicholas has every reason to keep things in life unchanged; however, when he accidentally overhears mum and dad talking about a new baby brother, his world will turn upside down. Will they abandon him to make room for the little stranger?
The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.
Three girls in 1980s Stockholm decide to form a punk band -- despite not having any instruments and being told by everyone that punk is dead.
A look at the life of philosopher and political theorist Hannah Arendt, who reported for 'The New Yorker' on the trial of the Nazi leader Adolf Eichmann in Jerusalem.

Cast: Heavenveer Singh Hayer,Kartik Aaryan,Mrunal Thakur,Amruta Subhash,Soham Majumdar
Description: Reassigned from TV to radio, a frustrated anchor sees both danger and opportunity when he receives threatening calls on the air.

Cast: Seu Jorge,Bruno Gagliasso,Luiz Carlos Vasconcelos,Humberto Carrão
Description: Facing a violent military dictatorship and an intimidated opposition, writer-turned-politician Carlos Marighella articulates a resistance all the while ousting heinous crimes of torture and the infamous censorship instituted by the regime.

Cast: Thorbjørn Christoffersen,Stefan Fjeldmark,Anders Matthesen,Kim Mattheson,Bill Bailey,Ben Bishop
Description: Terkel is an average teenager whose life takes a turn for the worse when a girl who had a crush on him kills herself and an unknown maniac starts stalking him.
Young Soviet Army recruits are stuck in the bloody war in Afghanistan, that was started by politicians.

Cast: Farhan Akhtar,Konkona Sen Sharma,Rishi Kapoor,Dimple Kapadia
Description: When Vikram gets tapped to play the male lead in a Bollywood film, he can't believe his luck. But it may ruin his relationship with his girlfriend.

Cast: Philip Seymour Hoffman,Christopher Walken,Catherine Keener,Mark Ivanir
Description: Members of a world-renowned string quartet struggle to stay together in the face of death, competing egos, and insuppressible lust.
An attempted robbery turns to be an unexpected recruitment when two unemployed men mistakenly break into a police office instead of a store.
7 Spanish top corporate job candidates are left in a room and informed on computer screens about their tasks and that one of them is an observer. Let the psyching begin.

Cast: Amitabh Bachchan,Farhan Akhtar,Aditi Rao Hydari,John Abraham
Description: A grief-stricken cop and an amputee grandmaster are brought together by a peculiar twist of fate as part of a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives.

A man takes his thoroughly-British daughter to his home country, India. There, he arranges her marriage to someone she considers a fool. The daughter attempts to outwit them, but the groom quietly and patiently hatches his own plan.

Cast: Dulquer Salmaan,Indrajith Sukumaran,Sobhita Dhulipala,Shine Tom Chacko
Description: Kurup is a criminal who is on the run from police after murdering someone for life insurance fraud.
Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona.
A much abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.
A brilliant scientist creates a humanoid robot to protect mankind, but things go awry when human emotions are programmed and inner turmoil causes the robot to switch sides.
The life and misadventures of a family in contemporary Japan.

Cast: Frank Hvam,Casper Christensen,Marcuz Jess Petersen,Mia Lyhne
Description: In order to prove his fatherhood potential to his pregnant girlfriend, Frank 'kidnaps' her 12-year-old nephew and tags along on his best friend Casper's debauched weekend canoe trip.

Cast: Ibrahim Ahmed,Abel Jafri,Toulou Kiki,Layla Walet Mohamed
Description: A cattle herder and his family who reside in the dunes of Timbuktu find their quiet lives -- which are typically free of the Jihadists determined to control their faith -- abruptly disturbed.
To save her relationship, a woman puts herself through extensive plastic surgery.
When Dev finds out his wife is cheating on him, he secretly blackmails his wife and her lover as a form of revenge.
Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel's life... and things take a sinister turn.
A violence prone police officer discovers that his colleague is trafficking drugs.

Movie Name: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
Description: The vicissitudes of Gloria, a neurotic housewife, and her family's peculiar characters.
A chef with a mysterious past spends the day with a waitress who needs a friend.

Cast: Anders W. Berthelsen,Ann Eleonora Jørgensen,Anette Støvelbæk,Peter Gantzler
Description: Several lonely hearts in a semi-provincial suburb of a town in Denmark use a beginner's course in Italian as the platform to meet the romance of their lives.
Goodbye Bafana is the true story of a white South African racist whose life was profoundly altered by the black prisoner he guarded for twenty years. The prisoner's name was Nelson Mandela.
Hedonistic bachelor Nick falls for an escaped mental patient.

Cast: Ebru Ceylan,Nuri Bilge Ceylan,Nazan Kesal,Mehmet Eryilmaz
Description: A dowdy university instructor Isa is an inattentive husband to his younger, TV-business wife Bahar. Self-absorbed and selfish, Isa only communicates in the most rudimentary way, while she, similarly, detaches into crying jags and juvenile behavior.
A grief-stricken man takes the law into his own hands when he begins to kidnap and murder corrupt public servants.
An ambitious salesman will do anything for that big promotion he's been chasing, but inevitably, he will learn that there is no such thing as the perfect crime.

Cast: Engin Akyürek,Farah Zeynep Abdullah,Kaya Akkaya,Efsun Akkurt
Description: Eylül, who does not remember the last month after her accident, learns that she was in Bozcaada during this time and goes to Bozcaada to follow the truth and gets close to an artist named Tekin, who knows her.
A father tries to help his son cope with a rare condition that causes the young boy to age beyond his years.

The diminutive Asterix and his rather larger companion Obelix, warriors of the last village in Gaul still free after the Roman invasion, set out on a mission to deliver a barrel of their ...                See full summary »
In 1960s Paris, a conservative couple's lives are turned upside down by a group of Spanish maids that live in the same building.

On a fishing boat at sea, a 60-year old man has been raising a girl since she was a baby. It is agreed that they will get married on her 17th birthday, and she is 16 now. They live a quiet and secluded life, renting the boat to day fishermen and practicing strange divination rites. Their life changes when a teenage student comes aboard...

Cast: Georgina Campbell,Bill Skarsgård,Justin Long,Matthew Patrick Davis
Description: A woman staying at an Airbnb discovers that the house she has rented is not what it seems.
In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Movie Name: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
Description: In this action-packed comedy, Nicolas Cage plays Nick Cage, channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan (Pedro Pascal) and a CIA agent (Tiffany Haddish).

Cast: Chris Weitz,Jason Biggs,Chris Klein,Thomas Ian Nicholas,Jennifer Coolidge
Description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.
The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.
High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy. Relationships with her family, friends and view of the world are forever altered.
A girl gifted with a keen intellect and psychic powers uses both to deal with her crude, distant family and free her kind teacher from their sadistic headmistress.

An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. But the glamour is not all it appears to be and the dreams of the past start to crack and splinter into something darker.

Cast: Molly Ringwald,Anthony Michael Hall,Justin Henry,Michael Schoeffling
Description: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday is anything but special: her family forgets about it, and she suffers from every embarrassment possible.
Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

Cast: C. Thomas Howell,Matt Dillon,Ralph Macchio,Patrick Swayze
Description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

Cast: Diedrich Bader,Daniel Radcliffe,Lin-Manuel Miranda,Richard Aaron Anderson
Description: Explores every facet of Yankovic's life, from his meteoric rise to fame with early hits like 'Eat It' and 'Like a Surgeon' to his torrid celebrity love affairs and famously depraved lifestyle.

As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.
A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.
A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

Movie Name: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
Cast: Barry G. Bernson,Herb Caillouet,Bill Camp,Raffey Cassidy
Description: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

Cast: Zachary Levi,Mark Strong,Asher Angel,Jack Dylan Grazer
Description: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.
A grifter working his way up from low-ranking carnival worker to lauded psychic medium matches wits with a psychologist bent on exposing him.
A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.
Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.
A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.
An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.
A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper responsible for a mass shooting.
Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.
A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

Cast: Brad Pitt,Mireille Enos,Daniella Kertesz,James Badge Dale
Description: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.
Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.
A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.
Follows a woman checking into a psychiatric ward to investigate a homicide.

Cast: Gerard Butler,Pablo Schreiber,O'Shea Jackson Jr.,50 Cent
Description: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.
The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.

Cast: Ivan Massagué,Zorion Eguileor,Antonia San Juan,Emilio Buale
Description: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. Only one food platform and two minutes per day to feed. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.
Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.
Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

Movie Name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
Description: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.
Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.
A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.
An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

Cast: Shia LaBeouf,Sigourney Weaver,Jon Voight,Tim Blake Nelson
Description: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.
A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.
During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.
When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

Cast: Benicio Del Toro,Josh Brolin,Isabela Merced,Jeffrey Donovan
Description: The drug war on the U.S.-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. To fight the war, federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with the mercurial Alejandro.
Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.
The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.
A married couple, Simon and Robyn, run into Gordo, an old classmate. Things take a turn when Gordo begins to drop in unannounced at their house and inundates them with mysterious gifts.
When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

Cast: Rakel Lenora Fløttum,Alva Brynsmo Ramstad,Sam Ashraf,Mina Yasmin Bremseth Asheim
Description: During the bright Nordic summer, a group of children reveal their dark and mysterious powers when the adults aren't looking. In this original and gripping supernatural thriller, playtime takes a dangerous turn.
A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.

Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deeply into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living--no matter the cost.
After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.
The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.
Two brothers attempt to pull off a heist during a NASCAR race in North Carolina.

Cast: Hilary Swank,Gerard Butler,Harry Connick Jr.,Lisa Kudrow
Description: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.
Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.

Cast: Christopher Miller,Channing Tatum,Jonah Hill,Ice Cube,Nick Offerman
Description: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

Cast: Joel Coen,Brad Pitt,Frances McDormand,George Clooney,John Malkovich
Description: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Cast: Guy Pearce,Dakota Fanning,Emilia Jones,Carice van Houten
Description: From the moment the new Reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows that she and her family are in great danger.

Cast: Kevin Hart,Bryan Cranston,Nicole Kidman,Aja Naomi King
Description: A comedic look at the relationship between a wealthy man with quadriplegia and an unemployed man with a criminal record who's hired to help him.
A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

Cast: Dane DeHaan,Alex Russell,Michael B. Jordan,Michael Kelly
Description: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.
Three juvenile delinquents are sentenced to a correctional facility where they encounter gang violence, death, and harassment from staff and other inmates.

A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.
Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

When a young mother's home birth ends in unfathomable tragedy, she begins a year-long odyssey of mourning that fractures relationships with loved ones in this deeply personal story of a woman learning to live alongside her loss.

Cast: Garance Marillier,Ella Rumpf,Rabah Nait Oufella,Laurent Lucas
Description: A young woman, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.

After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Emma are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.
Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

Cast: Clint Eastwood,Patrick L. Reyes,Cesar De León,Gustavo Muñoz
Description: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.
In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.
Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.
A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.
The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Cast: Rich Moore,John C. Reilly,Sarah Silverman,Gal Gadot,Taraji P. Henson
Description: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.
In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.
In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

Movie Name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.
A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

Cast: Kirk Wise,Demi Moore,Jason Alexander,Mary Kay Bergman,Corey Burton
Description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Cast: Eric Stoltz,Mary Stuart Masterson,Lea Thompson,Craig Sheffer
Description: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.
The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.
James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

Cast: Sylvester Stallone,Harvey Keitel,Ray Liotta,Robert De Niro
Description: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.
Four inner-city teenagers get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as "the juice".
A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

A psychological study of Marine's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

Hayley's a smart, charming teenage girl. Jeff's a handsome, smooth fashion photographer. An Internet chat, a coffee shop meet-up, an impromptu fashion shoot back at Jeff's place. Jeff thinks it's his lucky night. He's in for a surprise.
Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.
A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.
A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

Cast: Charlton Heston,Edward G. Robinson,Leigh Taylor-Young,Chuck Connors
Description: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.
During pre-WWII McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that genuine friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

U.S. Olympic wrestling champions and brothers Mark Schultz and Dave Schultz join "Team Foxcatcher", led by eccentric multi-millionaire John du Pont, as they train for the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, but John's self-destructive behavior threatens to consume them all.
A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".

Cast: Ben Stiller,Robert De Niro,Teri Polo,Blythe Danner
Description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

Cast: John Candy,Leon,Doug E. Doug,Rawle D. Lewis
Description: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared to be.

Cast: Joel Coen,Michael Stuhlbarg,Richard Kind,Sari Lennick,Fred Melamed
Description: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.
Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

Cast: Paul Newman,Tom Cruise,Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio,Helen Shaver
Description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.
Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.
In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.
A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.
A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.
A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.
Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

Movie Name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
Description: A Korean-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.
Desperate to provide care for her daughter, down-on-her-luck Jean moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.

Cast: Keanu Reeves,Winona Ryder,Robert Downey Jr.,Rory Cochrane
Description: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.
A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

Cast: Michelle Williams,Kristin Scott Thomas,Margot Robbie,Eric Godon
Description: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (Michelle Williams), a French villager, and Lieutenant Bruno von Falk (Matthias Schoenaerts), a German soldier.
A young woman's desperate search for her abducted boyfriend draws her into the infamous Colonia Dignidad, a sect nobody has ever escaped from.

Cast: Tom Hanks,Julia Roberts,Philip Seymour Hoffman,Amy Adams
Description: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

Cast: Wilfred Jackson,Ruth Warrick,Bobby Driscoll,James Baskett,Luana Patten
Description: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.
A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.
A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.
A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

Cast: Ryan Reynolds,José Luis García-Pérez,Robert Paterson,Stephen Tobolowsky
Description: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.
When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.
An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.
A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.
