Chaos ensues when a lethal, airborne virus infects the population of a South Korean city less than 20 kilometers from Seoul.

Cast: Toni Collette,Brittany Murphy,Marcia Gay Harden,Piper Laurie
Description: The clues to a young woman's death come together as the lives of seemingly unrelated people begin to intersect.
A retired mobster goes on a revenge spree after being left for dead with 22 bullets in his body by his former childhood friend.
A mysterious gang of bikers is on a robbing spree. ACP Jai gets Ali, a mechanic, to assist him in the case. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to nab the thieves red-handed.

Cast: Valeria Bruni Tedeschi,Stéphane Freiss,Françoise Fabian,Michael Lonsdale
Description: Five stages in the romance between a woman and a man.
Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.
The journey of legendary football coach Bob Ladouceur, who took the De La Salle High School Spartans from obscurity to a 151-game winning streak that shattered all records for any American sport.
New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.
Jake Vig is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss and his enforcer.
A dying family man in need of money is persuaded to assassinate a European crime boss.
The fractious family of a father and his two sons confront their different feelings and memories of their deceased wife and mother, a famed war photographer.
In the depths of the Korvatunturi mountains, 486 meters deep, lies the closest ever guarded secret of Christmas. The time has come to dig it up. This Christmas everyone will believe in Santa Claus.
This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.
When a homeless man is accused of murdering a Justice Department file clerk, a public defender is tasked with mounting his legal defense.
A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.

Cast: Rodrigo Sopeña,Alejo Sauras,Elena Ballesteros,Lluís Homar,Santi Millán
Description: 4 mathematicians are invited to solve an enigma. Once there, they're locked in a mechanically shrinking room and given 1 minute to solve each puzzle via cellphone while also figuring out why they're there.
A spoiled Manhattan housewife re-evaluates her life after visiting a Chinatown healer.
Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.
Two documentary filmmakers attempt to penetrate a cult who worships a woman who claims to be from the future.
Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and his modern, liberal father-in-law.
A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.
In 1961, famed social psychologist Stanley Milgram conducted a series of radical behavior experiments that tested ordinary humans' willingness to obey authority.
As he copes with the death of his fiancée, a young man befriends her parents and must figure out what he wants out of life.
A man's obsession with his designer deerskin jacket causes him to blow his life savings and turn to crime.
Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband, Daniel, when he goes missing in Pakistan.

This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.
A wacky inventor and his wife invite two other couples for a weekend party at a romantic summer house in the 1900s countryside.

Cast: Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla,Saif Ali Khan,Akshaye Khanna,Bipasha Basu,Katrina Kaif
Description: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.
The story of an obsessively organized efficiency expert whose life unravels in unexpected ways when fate forces him to explore the serendipitous nature of love and forgiveness.
Two childhood friends from South Boston turn to crime as a way to get by, ultimately causing a strain in their personal lives and their friendship.

Movie Name: A Home at the End of the World
Description: A boy who has experienced many losses in his life grows to manhood and enters into a love triangle with a woman and his boyhood friend.

Cast: Çagatay Ulusoy,Emir Ali Dogrul,Ersin Arici,Turgay Tanülkü
Description: Mehmet is a cherished fellow who runs the solid waste warehouse in the neighborhood, he helps everyone in need, especially homeless children and teenagers since he was one too.

Cast: Raj Nidimoru,Saif Ali Khan,Kunal Kemmu,Vir Das,Anand Tiwari
Description: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.

A veteran chef faces off against his restaurant group's new CEO, who wants to the establishment to lose a star from its rating in order to bring in a younger chef who specializes in molecular gastronomy.
An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

Thongs and Octopus accept a job from their landlord: kidnap a baby. Soon, the baby awakens strong paternal feelings in the two crooks, leading to complications when it comes to handing him over to his possibly crazy gang boss grandfather.
Activists arrive in Seattle, Washington en masse to protest a meeting of the World Trade Organization. Riots and chaos ensue as demonstrators successfully stop the WTO meetings.
An art instructor and an English teacher form a rivalry that ends up with a competition at their school in which students decide whether words or pictures are more important.
After hearing that his wife sleeps with Clay, Earl kills himself, making it look like Clay shot him. The widow doesn't like it when Clay starts sees another woman instead. Bodies start piling up.

Checco was born into privilege in a small Italian town with a guaranteed job as a public servant. When a new reformist government vows to cut down on bureaucracy, Checco is forced to accept worsening conditions.
Unable to cope with a recent personal tragedy, LA's top celebrity shrink turns into a pothead with no concern for his appearance and a creeping sense of his inability to help his patients.

Cast: Michael Douglas,Evan Rachel Wood,Willis Burks II,Laura Kachergus
Description: An unstable dad who after getting out of a mental institution tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.
The story of a boxer and the struggles he faces on his journey to get to the national level competition.

Cast: Willem Dafoe,Edward Furlong,Danny Trejo,Mark Boone Junior
Description: A young man goes to prison and a tough, older convict takes him under his wing as a mentor.

Cast: Jens Albinus,Peter Gantzler,Friðrik Þór Friðriksson,Benedikt Erlingsson
Description: An IT company hires an actor to serve as the company's president in order to help the business get sold to a cranky Icelander.
Asterix, the most cunning warrior of a Gaulish village resisting Roman occupation, must save their magic potion-brewing druid when he is kidnapped by a Centurion.
The story of former UVF member Alistair Little. Twenty-five years after Little killed Joe Griffen's brother, the media arrange an auspicious meeting between the two.
A jaded Japanese woman discovers a hidden copy of Fargo (1996) on VHS, believing it to be a treasure map indicating the location of a large case of money.

Cast: Arthur Qwak,Vincent Lindon,Patrick Timsit,Philippe Nahon,Amanda Lear
Description: A fantastic tale telling the adventures of two dragon hunters!
Radhe is a ruthless gangster who will kill anyone for money. He is attracted towards Jhanvi, a middle class girl, who does not approve of his work and wants him to change.
Sherry tries to integrate again into society and become a good mother.
Two men, six meals in six different places on a road trip around Italy. Liguria, Tuscany, Rome, Amalfi and ending in Capri.

Cast: Stéphane Foenkinos,Audrey Tautou,François Damiens,Bruno Todeschini,Mélanie Bernier
Description: A French woman mourning over the death of her husband three years prior is courted by a Swedish co-worker.

Cast: Noel Clarke,Scarlett Alice Johnson,Adam Deacon,Jacob Anderson
Description: Six years after KiDULTHOOD, Sam Peel is released from jail for killing Trife, he realizes that life is no easier on the outside than it was on the inside and he's forced to confront the ...                See full summary »
A coming of age story about a shy teenage boy trying to escape from the influence of his domineering mother. His world changes when he begins to work for a retired actress.
A dishonest banker pays the ultimate price for his wrongdoings when he is held hostage in his own speeding car by a bomb-making extortionist.

Movie Name: Detective Dee: The Mystery of the Phantom Flame
Cast: Tony Ka Fai Leung,Chao Deng,Carina Lau,Bingbing Li
Description: An exiled detective is recruited to solve a series of mysterious deaths that threaten to delay the inauguration of Empress Wu.

Cast: Gad Elmaleh,Alice Taglioni,Daniel Auteuil,Kristin Scott Thomas
Description: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.
Saya is a Japanese vampire slayer whose next mission is in a high school on a US military base in 1960s Japan, where she poses as a student. She uses a katana/samurai sword to kill vampires.

Cast: Jeffrey Friedman,James Franco,Todd Rotondi,Jon Prescott,Aaron Tveit
Description: As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.
A young gene researcher, Ilona, is kidnapped in a future Paris. Police Captain Karas and his team are in charge of finding her.

Cast: Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla,Akshay Kumar,Kareena Kapoor,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Amrish Puri
Description: A man is accused of sexual harassment by his former lover and he has to prove his innocence in order to restore his dignity.
Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

Cast: Thorbjørn Christoffersen,Philip Einstein Lipski,Anders Juul,Hadi Ka-Koush,Lærke Winther,Brian Lykke
Description: The 100 Barbarian Sons of Krull get attacked by a superior force and captured. It's up to the young, weak but smart Ronal to free them. 3 join his dangerous quest.
In New York City, a husband and wife butt heads with the granddaughters of the elderly woman who lives in the apartment the couple owns.

Poonam, a traditionally brought-up young woman, is to marry Prem, a groom chosen by her uncle. Poonam and Prem's faith and love are to be tested however, when an accident occurs and Poonam might be scarred for life.

Cast: Gael García Bernal,Kim Bodnia,Dimitri Leonidas,Haluk Bilginer
Description: Iranian-Canadian journalist Maziar Bahari is detained by Iranian forces who brutally interrogate him under suspicion that he is a spy.
A clarinetist from a village in Turkey's Thracian region tries to reach his fiancé, who works as a nurse in a village near Çanakkale, to give her a ring to win back her heart.
Kishan and Sunny's life are troubled after their womanizing friend Prem sets them up with a hooker named Bobby, leading to web of lies and confusions.
A shy genius is employed by his former university to design robot software.
A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.
A feature film adaptation of the self-help book, 'The Secret', which focuses on the power of positive thinking.

Cast: Joe Russo,Ryan Gosling,Chris Evans,Ana de Armas,Billy Bob Thornton
Description: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.
In the West End of 1950s London, plans for a movie version of a smash-hit play come to an abrupt halt after a pivotal member of the crew is murdered.
Follows the life of Father Stuart Long, a boxer-turned-priest who inspired countless people during his journey from self-destruction to redemption.
A preteen girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.
An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

Movie Name: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
Description: In the riveting conclusion of the landmark Skywalker saga, new legends will be born-and the final battle for freedom is yet to come.

Private Joe Bauers, a decisively average American, is selected as a guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program but is forgotten, awakening to a future so incredibly moronic he's easily the most intelligent person alive.
After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attraction grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.
When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

Movie Name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.
A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.
At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.
Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.
Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

Cast: Andrea Riseborough,Christopher Abbott,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Rossif Sutherland
Description: An agent works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

Cast: Channing Tatum,Channing Tatum,Ryder McLaughlin,Aavi Haas,Luke Forbes
Description: Two former Army Rangers are paired against their will on the road trip of a lifetime. Briggs (Channing Tatum) and Lulu (a Belgian Malinois) race down the Pacific Coast to get to a fellow soldier's funeral on time.
Lawman Luke Hobbs (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) and outcast Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham) form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.
James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
When the manic Dr Robotnik returns to Earth with a new ally, Knuckles the Echidna, Sonic and his new friend Tails is all that stands in their way.
The arrival of Patrick into Marion and Tom's home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previously.

Movie Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
Cast: Espen Sandberg,Johnny Depp,Geoffrey Rush,Javier Bardem,Orlando Bloom
Description: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably Jack.
Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.
Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.
Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murder of rapper Notorious B.I.G.

Cast: Brad Pitt,Tommy Lee Jones,Ruth Negga,Donald Sutherland
Description: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

Cast: Janeane Garofalo,David Hyde Pierce,Michael Showalter,Marguerite Moreau
Description: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

Cast: Jane Levy,Shiloh Fernandez,Jessica Lucas,Lou Taylor Pucci
Description: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

Cast: Bilall Fallah,Will Smith,Martin Lawrence,Vanessa Hudgens,Alexander Ludwig
Description: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

Cast: Deborah Kaplan,Jennifer Love Hewitt,Ethan Embry,Charlie Korsmo,Lauren Ambrose
Description: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

Cast: Jon Hamm,Caitlin Zerra Rose,Roy Wood Jr.,Ayden Mayeri
Description: After becoming the prime suspect in multiple murders, Fletch strives to prove his innocence while simultaneously searching for his fiancé's stolen art collection.
A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.
The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.
An Indian soldier chases after his mentor who has gone rogue following an unexpected kill.

Cast: Breckin Meyer,Seann William Scott,Amy Smart,Paulo Costanzo
Description: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.
A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

Movie Name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
Description: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.
A couple tries to spice up their marriage in a remote lake house. After the husband dies unexpectedly, the wife is left handcuffed to their bed frame and must fight to survive and break free.
A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.
Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.
Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.

Cast: Dar Salim,Sonja Richter,Sus Noreen Jondahl Wilkins,Mikael Birkkjær
Description: Follows a couple who appear to be living the perfect life after their son is declared healthy following a long-term illness.

Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.
Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.
A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.
A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.
After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

Cast: Steven Seagal,Gary Busey,Tommy Lee Jones,Erika Eleniak
Description: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.
A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets.
A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

Cast: Jennifer Garner,John Gallagher Jr.,John Ortiz,Juan Pablo Raba
Description: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

Movie Name: The Last House on the Left
Description: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.
The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

Cast: Vanessa Winter,Joseph Winter,Melanie Stone,Jason K. Wixom,Pat Barnett
Description: A disgraced internet personality attempts to win back his followers by livestreaming one night alone in a haunted house. But when he accidentally pisses off a vengeful spirit, his big comeback event becomes a real-time fight for his life.
A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.
A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.
A filmmaker at a creative impasse seeks solace from her tumultuous past at a rural retreat, only to find that the woods summon her inner demons in intense and surprising ways.
A young couple trying to reunite amid a city ravaged by a plague that turns its victims into deranged, bloodthirsty sadists.
A chronicle of Max Perkins's time as the book editor at Scribner, where he oversaw works by Thomas Wolfe, Ernest Hemingway, F. Scott Fitzgerald and others.
Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

12 Strong tells the story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11; under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban.

Movie Name: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
Description: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.
Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.
After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

Communist radicals hijack Air Force One with the U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.
In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.

Cast: Radha Mitchell,Laurie Holden,Sean Bean,Deborah Kara Unger
Description: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.
A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

Cast: Eduardo Sánchez,Heather Donahue,Michael C. Williams,Joshua Leonard,Bob Griffin
Description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

Movie Name: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
Description: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

Cast: Seth Rogen,James Franco,Seth Rogen,Randall Park,Lizzy Caplan
Description: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.
Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.
Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

Cast: Sean Connery,Jill St. John,Charles Gray,Lana Wood
Description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

Cast: George Clooney,Mark Wahlberg,John C. Reilly,Diane Lane
Description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.
Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.
When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 14 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.
A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in a political assassination.
Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.
Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

Movie Name: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
Cast: Robert Rodriguez,Mickey Rourke,Jessica Alba,Josh Brolin,Joseph Gordon-Levitt
Description: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.
In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.
A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the factual case of Natascha Kampusch.

In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

Movie Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
Description: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.
A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Cast: James Van Der Beek,Jon Voight,Paul Walker,Ron Lester
Description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.
Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Wesley Snipes,Robert Downey Jr.,Joe Pantoliano
Description: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

Movie Name: The Man in the Iron Mask
Description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.
Set in the 1930s, an honest, good-hearted man is forced to turn to a life of crime to finance his neurotic mother's sky-rocketing medical bills.
Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).
A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.
In 1909, two explorers fight to survive after they're left behind while on a Denmark expedition in ice-covered Greenland.

Cast: Sam J. Jones,Melody Anderson,Max von Sydow,Topol
Description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

Movie Name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
Description: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.
A high-school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.
A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

Cast: Ashley Judd,Tommy Lee Jones,Bruce Greenwood,Benjamin Weir
Description: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.
A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club, and meets a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.
A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

Movie star Vincent Chase, together with his boys Eric, Turtle, and Johnny, are back - and back in business with super agent-turned-studio head Ari Gold on a risky project that will serve as Vince's directorial debut.
With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.
The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year-round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn--that seems too good to be true.
A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identity.

Cast: Aaron Taylor-Johnson,Chloë Grace Moretz,Christopher Mintz-Plasse,Jim Carrey
Description: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.
A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.
The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.
After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.
A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.
In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.
A young FBI agent, eager to prove himself in the field, goes undercover as a white supremacist.

The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

Cast: Matthew McConaughey,Richie Merritt,Bel Powley,Jennifer Jason Leigh
Description: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at the Sun Tribune go to two guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

Cast: Jamie Lee Curtis,Judy Greer,Andi Matichak,James Jude Courtney
Description: Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe, Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.
1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.

Movie Name: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
Cast: Shawn Wayans,Marlon Wayans,Keenen Ivory Wayans,Tracey Cherelle Jones
Description: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).
Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.
A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

Movie Name: A Rainy Day in New York
Description: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.
An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a cop who has managed to maintain a spotless reputation despite being involved in a web of corruption.

Cast: Aaron Moorhead,Aaron Moorhead,Justin Benson,Callie Hernandez,Tate Ellington
Description: As kids, they escaped a UFO death cult. Now, two adult brothers seek answers after an old videotape surfaces and brings them back to where they began.

Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.
After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.

Cast: Haley Bishop,Jemma Moore,Emma Louise Webb,Radina Drandova
Description: Six friends hire a medium to hold a seance via Zoom during lockdown, but they get far more than they bargained for as things quickly go wrong.
An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.
A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

Cast: Todd Edwards,Tony Leech,Anne Hathaway,Glenn Close,Patrick Warburton,Jim Belushi
Description: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.
An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.
Four African-American vets battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen squad leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

Cast: Ariel Schulman,Emma Roberts,Dave Franco,Emily Meade,Miles Heizer
Description: A high school senior finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move starts to become manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers."
When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.
An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.
A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.
Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.
Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers and another that could end their marriage.
A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.
A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida.
A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus.

Cast: Evan Rachel Wood,Scott Speedman,J.K. Simmons,Treat Williams
Description: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He then takes the naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.

A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.
Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.
Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.
After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

Cast: Emilio Estevez,Kiefer Sutherland,Lou Diamond Phillips,Christian Slater
Description: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.
The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.
Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.
A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

Cast: Nate Parker,Armie Hammer,Penelope Ann Miller,Jackie Earle Haley
Description: Nat Turner, a literate slave and preacher in the antebellum South, orchestrates an uprising.

Cast: Jeff Daniels,Julian Sands,John Goodman,Harley Jane Kozak
Description: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.
A wealthy young man undergoing heart transplant surgery discovers that the surgical team intend to murder him.

Cast: George C. Scott,Ed Flanders,Brad Dourif,Jason Miller
Description: A police lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.
An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.
A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.
Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.
Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.
Kid decides to go to his friend Play's house party, but neither of them can predict what's in store for them on what could be the wildest night of their lives.
A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.
A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.
J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly fifty years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

Cast: Marisa Tomei,Robert Downey Jr.,Bonnie Hunt,Joaquim de Almeida
Description: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.
Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

Cast: Michael Thurmeier,Ray Romano,Denis Leary,John Leguizamo,Aziz Ansari
Description: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

Cast: Sidse Babett Knudsen,Monica Swinn,Chiara D'Anna,Kata Bartsch
Description: A woman who studies butterflies and moths tests the limits of her relationship with her lesbian lover.

Cast: Robert Downey Jr.,Zach Galifianakis,Michelle Monaghan,Jamie Foxx
Description: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

A minor-league baseball player must spend $30 million in 30 days in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity, or tell anyone about the deal.

Cast: Tim Johnson,Woody Allen,Sharon Stone,Gene Hackman,Sylvester Stallone
Description: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

Cast: Queen Latifah,LL Cool J,Timothy Hutton,Giancarlo Esposito
Description: Upon learning of a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to sell all her possessions and live it up at a posh Central European hotel.
A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

A young woman grieving the loss of her mother, a famous scream queen from the 1980s, finds herself pulled into the world of her mom's most famous movie. Reunited, the women must fight off the film's maniacal killer.
Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.
A mild-mannered morgue attendant is assigned to the night shift, and his new coworker, along with his prostitute neighbor, convince him of running a prostitution ring out of the morgue.

Cast: Tom Tataranowicz,Randy Norton,Cynthia Leake,Steve Sandor,Sean Hannon
Description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

Cast: Michelle Pfeiffer,George Dzundza,Courtney B. Vance,Robin Bartlett
Description: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.
Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.
A successful writer in the midst of a painful divorce is stalked at his remote lake house by a would-be scribe who accuses him of plagiarism.

Cast: Clint Eastwood,Tommy Lee Jones,Donald Sutherland,James Garner
Description: When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.
The fabled romantic Giacomo Casanova, after failing to win the affection of the Venetian woman Francesca Bruni, strives to discover the real meaning of love.

Two sets of identical twins are accidentally separated at birth. Several years later, when they are coincidentally in the same town, there is a lot of confusion and misunderstanding when people mistake them for each other.
An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.
A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.
Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

Hunter, a newly pregnant housewife, finds herself increasingly compelled to consume dangerous objects. As her husband and his family tighten their control over her life, she must confront the dark secret behind her new obsession.

The story follows a married couple, apart for a night while the husband takes a business trip with a colleague to whom he's attracted. While he's resisting temptation, his wife encounters her past love.

Set in the year 2092 and follows the crew of a space junk collector ship called The Victory. When they discover a humanoid robot named Dorothy that's known to be a weapon of mass destruction, they get involved in a risky business deal.
Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

Cast: Bruce Willis,Kevin Pollak,Serena Scott Thomas,Jimmy Bennett
Description: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.
48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.
People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

Cast: Jason Statham,Catherine Chan,Chris Sarandon,Robert John Burke
Description: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. Then she discovers that she is pregnant--but she is only 50% sure of the baby's father's identity.
A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.
On a quiet suburban street, a babysitter must defend a twelve-year-old boy from intruders, only to discover it's far from a normal home invasion.

Cast: Saoirse Ronan,Gemma Arterton,Sam Riley,Caleb Landry Jones
Description: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.
A voluptuous black vigilante takes a job as a high-class prostitute to get revenge on the mobsters who murdered her boyfriend.
An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

Cast: Frank Sinatra,Dean Martin,Sammy Davis Jr.,Peter Lawford
Description: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.
When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

Cast: Michelle Pfeiffer,George Clooney,Mae Whitman,Alex D. Linz
Description: The lives of two strangers and their young children unexpectedly intersect on one hectic, stressful day in New York City.

A headhunter whose life revolves around closing deals in a survival-of-the-fittest boiler room battles his top rival for control of their job placement company, but his dream of owning the company clashes with the needs of his family.

A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

Movie Name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
Description: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.
Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.
A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Cast: Kim Basinger,Chris Evans,Jason Statham,William H. Macy
Description: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped, and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

Cast: Amanda Seyfried,Gael García Bernal,Vanessa Redgrave,Marcia DeBonis
Description: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the "Secretaries of Juliet".
A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.
A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.
In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

Cast: Cassandra Peterson,Phil Rubenstein,Larry Flash Jenkins,Damita Jo Freeman
Description: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Helen Slater,Richard Jordan,Margaret Whitton
Description: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Cate Blanchett,Evan Rachel Wood,Jenna Boyd
Description: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.
Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.
Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) before its release.
Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.
A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

Cast: Jamie Lee Curtis,Donald Pleasence,Charles Cyphers,Jeffrey Kramer
Description: While Dr. Loomis hunts for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, and The Shape is not far behind her.

The unenviable life of a government-agency clerk takes a horrific turn with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite otherwise--he's a confident, charismatic ladies' man.
When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.
A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home.
A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.
The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

Cast: Bruce Willis,Billy Bob Thornton,Cate Blanchett,Troy Garity
Description: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.
The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

Cast: Perry King,Merrie Lynn Ross,Timothy Van Patten,Roddy McDowall
Description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

Cast: Eric André,Michaela Conlin,Lil Rel Howery,Tiffany Haddish
Description: This mix of a scripted buddy comedy road movie and a real hidden camera prank show follows the outrageous misadventures of two buds stuck in a rut who embark on a cross-country road trip to NYC. The storyline sets up shocking real pranks.
The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.
A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).
A late night talk show host suspects that she may soon lose her long-running show.
An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.
A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.
A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.

Cast: Matt Damon,Cécile de France,Bryce Dallas Howard,Thierry Neuvic
Description: A drama centered on three people - a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy - who are touched by death in different ways.
After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.
A father takes his son to tour colleges on the East Coast and meets up with an old friend who makes him feel inferior about his life's choices.

Cast: David Lean,Jean Negulesco,Max von Sydow,Dorothy McGuire,Charlton Heston,Michael Anderson Jr.
Description: An all-star, large scale epic movie that chronicles the life and ministry of Jesus Christ.
Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner, and guests (like gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-1930s Harlem.
The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.
In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.
Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.
Two talented landscape artists become romantically entangled while building a garden in King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.
The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas A. Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.
A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.
The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

Cast: Claudine Auger,Luigi Pistilli,Claudio Camaso,Anna Maria Rosati
Description: The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to seize her large estate.

Movie Name: When a Man Loves a Woman
Description: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

Cast: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung,Ziyi Zhang,Jin Zhang,Chang Chen
Description: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.

Cast: Matt Damon,Tony Hale,Patton Oswalt,Lucas McHugh Carroll
Description: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.
Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.
Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

Cast: Matthew Fox,Colin Moy,Tommy Lee Jones,Eriko Hatsune
Description: As the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.
Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

A young British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is sent to battle and soon receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they view as his cowardice.
In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

Cast: Paco Plaza,Jonathan D. Mellor,Manuela Velasco,Óscar Zafra,Ariel Casas
Description: In order to ascertain the current situation inside, a supposed medical officer and a GEO team step into the quarantined and ill-fated apartment building.
A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.
In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.
An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.
Three friends discover a mysterious machine that takes pictures twenty-four hours into the future, and conspire to use it for personal gain, until disturbing and dangerous images begin to develop.
Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

Movie Name: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Cast: Hayden Schlossberg,John Cho,Kal Penn,Neil Patrick Harris,Rob Corddry
Description: After being mistaken for terrorists and thrown into Guantánamo Bay, stoners Harold and Kumar escape and return to the U.S., where they proceed to flee across the country with federal agents in hot pursuit.

Cast: Fabrice Canepa,Ray Wise,Lin Shaye,Mick Cain,Alexandra Holden
Description: Christmas Eve. On his way to his in-laws with his family, Frank Harrington decides to try a shortcut, for the first time in 20 years. It turns out to be the biggest mistake of his life.
A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.
England 1959. In a small East Anglian town, Florence Green decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop.

One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.
Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.
A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

Movie Name: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
Description: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy, posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals, Sonny Kapoor (Dev Patel) pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.

Cast: Colin Firth,Emma Stone,Marcia Gay Harden,Hamish Linklater
Description: A romantic comedy about an Englishman brought in to help unmask a possible swindle. Personal and professional complications ensue.
Two brothers on either side of the law face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.

Movie Name: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
Description: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

Cast: Emma Caulfield Ford,Scott Holroyd,Kali Rocha,Katie Von Till
Description: If a clock could count down to the moment you meet your soul mate, would you want to know?
The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.
While his trailer trash parents teeter on the edge of divorce, Nick Twisp sets his sights on dream girl Sheeni Saunders, hoping that she'll be the one to take away his virginity.
A losing coach with an underdog football team faces their giants of fear and failure on and off the field to surprising results.

Cast: Ben Affleck,Samuel L. Jackson,Kim Staunton,Toni Collette
Description: A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

Cast: Julianne Moore,Mark Ruffalo,Gael García Bernal,Yûsuke Iseya
Description: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness.
A suspense horror film set in a small coastal town where, after a series of gory murders commited by mobs of townspeople against visiting tourists, the corpses begin to come back to life.
A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.
To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.
After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

George, a lonely and fatalistic teen who has made it all the way to his senior year without ever having done a real day of work, is befriended by Sally, a popular but complicated girl who recognizes in him a kindred spirit.

Cast: Christopher Lee,Peter Cushing,Alberto de Mendoza,Telly Savalas
Description: While on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a parasitic life-form.
The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the U.S. Government's subjugation of his people.
86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.

Cast: Timothy Spall,Kristin Scott Thomas,Patricia Clarkson,Bruno Ganz
Description: Janet hosts a party to celebrate her new promotion, but once the guests arrive, it becomes clear that not everything will be going down as smoothly as the red wine.
A firefighter, injured and trapped in a burning building, has flashbacks of his life as he drifts in and out of consciousness. Meanwhile, fellow firefighters led by the Chief attempt to rescue him.
A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.
A socio political, action thriller set against the geopolitical backdrop of Northeast India.

An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.
A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.
Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.
A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.

Cast: Holly Hunter,Anne Bancroft,Robert Downey Jr.,Charles Durning
Description: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Meryl Streep,Harvey Keitel,Jane Kaczmarek
Description: Although they live married lives, two strangers keep running into each other, starting a friendship that could blossom into so much more.

Cast: Mark Duplass,Jason Segel,Ed Helms,Judy Greer,Susan Sarandon
Description: Dispatched from his basement room on an errand for his widowed mother, slacker Jeff might discover his destiny (finally) when he spends the day with his unhappily married brother as he tracks his possibly adulterous wife.

Cast: Hrithik Roshan,Abhishek Bachchan,Aishwarya Rai Bachchan,Uday Chopra
Description: Mr. A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artifacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but who cannot be trusted. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.

Four mental patients on a field trip in New York City must save their caring chaperon, who ends up being taken to a hospital in a coma after accidentally witnessing a murder, before the killers can find him and finish the job.
A troubled and perverted family find their lives intruded by a mysterious stranger who seems to help find a balance in their disturbing natures.
Chris wants to show girlfriend Tina his world, but events soon conspire against the couple and their dream caravan holiday takes a very wrong turn.
A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.
A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.

Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.
In small-town Alaska, a news reporter recruits his Greenpeace-volunteer ex-girlfriend on a campaign to save a family of gray whales trapped by rapidly-forming ice in the Arctic Circle.
An actor prepping for an upcoming role meets a quirky grocery clerk, and together they hit the road to show each other their respective worlds.
Police inspector Emilien and his taxi-driver pal Daniel are back, this time on the tail of a group of Japanese yakuza.

Cast: Patrick Wilson,Ed Helms,James Badge Dale,Brooklyn Decker
Description: A hard-luck limo driver struggles to go straight and pay off a debt to his bookie. He takes on a job with a crazed passenger, whose sought-after ledger implicates some seriously dangerous criminals.

Cast: Anthony Hopkins,Cuba Gooding Jr.,Donald Sutherland,Maura Tierney
Description: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle, is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.
A 1930s American socialite creates a scandal in the expatriate high society of the Amalfi Coast of Italy when she forms a secretive relationship with a wealthy American unbeknownst to his young wife.
A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.
Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.
A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.
A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.
Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.
Three strangers arrive one by one at a mysterious cabin in the middle of nowhere only to learn they've been brought together for a reason.

On improvising a burglary at a shady tycoon's home, Fred takes refuge in the hip and surreal universe of the Paris Metro and encounters its assorted denizens, the tycoon's henchmen and his disenchanted young wife.
Robin Hood, aging none too gracefully, returns exhausted from the Crusades to woo and win Maid Marian one last time.

From the roaring 1920s to the ruinous Spanish Civil War and Adolf Hitler's rise into power, the lives of an Irish schoolteacher, a provocative heiress and her Spanish muse are intricately interlaced, sharing the same destiny and passion.
A detective is trying to find the cause of a string of suicides.

Cast: Benicio Del Toro,Josh Hutcherson,Claudia Traisac,Brady Corbet
Description: In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.
When Anna and her family arrive at their holiday home, they find it occupied by strangers. This confrontation is just the beginning of a painful learning process.

Cast: Val Kilmer,Derek Luke,William H. Macy,Tia Texada
Description: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

Cast: Robin Williams,Maria Conchita Alonso,Cleavant Derricks,Alejandro Rey
Description: A Russian saxophonist visiting New York with a circus troupe suddenly decides to defect from the USSR during a shopping trip to a department store, but he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

Cast: Punit Malhotra,Abhishek Bachchan,John Abraham,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Kirron Kher
Description: Two straight guys pretend to be gay in order to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay whilst secretly trying to win her heart.
A man returns home after years to find his brother's child bride now grown up and abandoned, and his ancestral village plagued by mysterious deaths.
Wealthy, inventive bachelor Colin endeavors to find a cure for his lover Chloe after she's diagnosed with an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs.
A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.
When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

Cast: Michele Mulroney,Jeff Daniels,Emma Stone,Ryan Reynolds,Lisa Kudrow
Description: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.
A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

On V.E. Day in 1945, as peace extends across Europe, Princesses Elizabeth and Margaret are allowed out to join the celebrations. It is a night full of excitement, danger and the first flutters of romance.

Cast: Aditya Roy Kapoor,Anil Kapoor,Disha Patani,Kunal Kemmu
Description: Advait visits Goa where he meets Sara, a free-spirited girl who lives life unshackled. Opposites attract and all goes well until life turns upside down. Years later, Advait is on a killing spree with cops Aghase and Michael in his way.

Cast: Pierce Brosnan,Trine Dyrholm,Molly Blixt Egelind,Sebastian Jessen
Description: A hairdresser who has lost her hair to cancer, finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding, and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

Cast: Andrew Lawrence,Rickey D'Shon Collins,Jason Davis,Ashley Johnson
Description: T.J. and the gang must save summer vacation from disappearing forever.

Cast: Evan Rachel Wood,Ron Livingston,James Woods,David Wagner
Description: A 15-year-old girl incites chaos among her friends and a media frenzy when she accuses her drama teacher of sexual harassment.

Cast: Robin Williams,Hannah Taylor Gordon,Éva Igó,István Bálint
Description: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.
Dobermann is the world's most ruthless bank robber and with his gang rob bank after bank, now in Paris. What can the police do but to let the mad, morally bankrupt police commissioner loose on him?

A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

Cast: Carlos Areces,Antonio de la Torre,Carolina Bang,Manuel Tallafé
Description: A young trapeze artist must decide between her lust for Sergio, the Happy Clown, or her affection for Javier, the Sad Clown, both of whom are deeply disturbed.

Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.
An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

Kika, a cute cosmetologist, prepares Ramon for funeral when he revives. He proposes to the much older Kika who has his dad as lover. Did Ramon's dad murder his mom? What about the escaped rapist and the PSYCHOlogist video reporter?

Cast: Lou Taylor Pucci,Tilda Swinton,Vincent D'Onofrio,Keanu Reeves
Description: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.
Rafael, a Sevillian who has never left Andalucia, decides to leave his homeland to follow Amaia, a Basque girl unlike other women whom he has ever known.
Based on true events of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) successfully launching the Mars Orbiter Mission (Mangalyaan), making it the least expensive mission to Mars.
The wife of a photojournalist sets out to discover why he came home from a recent assignment without his colleague.

Cast: Evan Rachel Wood,Luke Wilson,Justin Long,Chad Allen
Description: A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it.

Cast: David Siegel,Tilda Swinton,Goran Visnjic,Jonathan Tucker,Peter Donat
Description: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.
At a summer house in Vermont, neighbor Howard falls in love with Lane, who's in a relationship with Peter, who's falling for Stephanie, who's married with children.

Cast: Michael Goetz,Josh Duhamel,Dan Fogler,Miracle Laurie,Christie Burson
Description: Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.

Cast: Shah Rukh Khan,Rani Mukerji,Jas Arora,Satish Shah
Description: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.
One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.
Rainbow press reporter Ludo is sentenced to 8 months; he's released on probation but must work at a local daycare center for 300 hours. He meets Anna, who has unfinished business with him.

On a night of despair after being turned down continuously for the scripts he writes, Metin ends up in a bar where he meets a girl named Duygu. After spending the night together, she walks ...                See full summary »
A lawyer turns judge jury and executioner and goes after a gang, led by a minister's son, that threatens women with videos of them.
A young boy in a nameless, timeless American town establishes a gang of youthful misfits united in their love of guns and their code of honor.

Cast: Genndy Tartakovsky,Cathy Cavadini,Tara Strong,Elizabeth Daily,Roger Jackson
Description: After destroying the city of Townsville in a game of tag, a trio of super-powered little girls must redeem themselves by stopping a vengeful monkey's plot for world domination.

Cast: John C. Reilly,Jacob Wysocki,Bridger Zadina,Creed Bratton
Description: The story of a bullied fifteen-year-old boy in a small town as he struggles to adjust to his difficult life.

In the southeast region of Turkey, the Altun family lives in a small mountainside village plagued by a 25-year war that makes their daily lives a hellish struggle. As the war intensifies, ...                See full summary »
