After a violent shootout, a group of men have to hide two corpses.
The members of a drama troupe fall in trouble when they are framed for a murder. Things go worse when they find their actress committing suicide, which is somehow linked with the murder.

After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.
A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

Vizontele Tuuba is the sequel to Vizontele and recounts the 1980 military coup, the repercussions of the coup in a small southeastern town in Turkey. This is a very confusing period: every ...                See full summary »
A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.
This is a film about the leader of the 1857 mutiny and his fight against the British rule.
While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.
A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.

Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

Cast: Grace Caroline Currey,Virginia Gardner,Mason Gooding,Jeffrey Dean Morgan
Description: Best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves at the top of a 2,000-foot radio tower.
A woman in New York, who seems to have things under control, is faced with a trauma that makes her life unravel.

Bella Cherry arrives in Los Angeles with dreams of becoming an adult film star, but she soon learns that fame won't come easy as she harnesses her ambition and cunning to rise to the top of this mesmerizing and singular world.

Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

Cast: Ross Duffer,Alexander Skarsgård,Andrea Riseborough,Emily Alyn Lind,Steven Elliot
Description: A family takes refuge in a bomb shelter to avoid a dangerous outbreak.
Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.
Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.
Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

Cast: Gerard Butler,Frederick Schmidt,Danny Huston,Rocci Boy Williams
Description: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.
Two men with commitment problems attempt a relationship.

Cast: James Spader,Holly Hunter,Elias Koteas,Deborah Kara Unger
Description: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

Movie Name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

Cast: Jack Nicholson,Pierce Brosnan,Sarah Jessica Parker,Annette Bening
Description: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

Cast: Gerard Butler,Morena Baccarin,Roger Dale Floyd,Scott Glenn
Description: A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.

Movie Name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
Description: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.
The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.
On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

Cast: Matthias Schweighöfer,Nathalie Emmanuel,Ruby O. Fee,Stuart Martin
Description: A prequel, set before the events of Army of the Dead, which focuses on German safecracker Ludwig Dieter leading a group of aspiring thieves on a top secret heist during the early stages of the zombie apocalypse.
A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.
A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

Cast: Mia Wasikowska,Johnny Depp,Helena Bonham Carter,Anne Hathaway
Description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

Movie Name: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
Description: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.
A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

Cast: Walt Dohrn,Anna Kendrick,Justin Timberlake,Zooey Deschanel,Christopher Mintz-Plasse
Description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Carla Gugino,Ricky Gervais,Dick Van Dyke
Description: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.
A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.
A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.
Six strangers find themselves in a maze of deadly mystery rooms and must use their wits to survive.
James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Cast: Javier Abad,Eva Noblezada,Simon Pegg,Jane Fonda,Whoopi Goldberg
Description: The curtain is pulled back on the millennia-old battle between the organizations of good luck and bad luck that secretly affects everyday lives.
The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.
A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

Cast: Sacha Baron Cohen,Anna Faris,John C. Reilly,Ben Kingsley
Description: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

Cast: Dwayne Johnson,Billy Bob Thornton,Maggie Grace,Mauricio Lopez
Description: An ex-con gets on a series of apparently unrelated killings. He gets tracked by a veteran cop with secrets of his own and an egocentric hit man.

Movie Name: He's Just Not That Into You
Description: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose to her boyfriend Jeremy on February 29, leap day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.
A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

Cast: Anthony Hopkins,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Abbie Cornish,Colin Farrell
Description: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Cast: Don Cheadle,Benicio Del Toro,David Harbour,Jon Hamm
Description: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.

Cast: Pierre Coffin,Sandra Bullock,Jon Hamm,Michael Keaton,Pierre Coffin
Description: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

Cast: Gene Hackman,Owen Wilson,Gabriel Macht,Charles Malik Whitfield
Description: A disillusioned pilot shot down over war-torn Bosnia is ensnared in the conflict in war-torn Bosnia. In the crosshairs of the enemy and an assassin, the spoiled pilot runs for his life as his commanding officer risks all to save him.

Cast: Aaron Taylor-Johnson,Taylor Kitsch,Blake Lively,Benicio Del Toro
Description: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.
A group of camp counselors trying to reopen a summer camp called Crystal Lake, which has a grim past, are stalked by a mysterious killer.

Cast: Sigourney Weaver,Charles S. Dutton,Charles Dance,Paul McGann
Description: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.
An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.
In a seemingly perfect community without war, pain, suffering, differences, or choices, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the "real" world.

The acerbic, hilarious Claire Bennett becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group. As she uncovers the details of Nina's suicide and develops a poignant relationship with Nina's husband, she also grapples with her own, very raw personal tragedy.

The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.
Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe.

Cast: Ted Levine,Kathleen Quinlan,Dan Byrd,Emilie de Ravin
Description: A traveling family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.
The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

Cast: Jason Biggs,Seann William Scott,Shannon Elizabeth,Alyson Hannigan
Description: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.
A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

Cast: Adam Sandler,Joey Lauren Adams,Jon Stewart,Cole Sprouse
Description: A lazy law-school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.
An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.
When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.
A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In a rush of panic, he steals 'The Goldfinch', a painting that eventually draws him into a world of crime.

Cast: Conrad Vernon,Reese Witherspoon,Rainn Wilson,Stephen Colbert,Seth Rogen
Description: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

Cast: John Landis,George Miller,Steven Spielberg,Dan Aykroyd,Albert Brooks,Vic Morrow,Doug McGrath
Description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.
A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger,F. Murray Abraham,Art Carney,Charles Dance
Description: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal has disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.
A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.
Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.
Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

Cast: Carlos Saldanha,Ewan McGregor,Halle Berry,Mel Brooks,Robin Williams
Description: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.
A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.
Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

Cast: Balthazar Getty,Chris Furrh,Danuel Pipoly,James Badge Dale
Description: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.
The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

Cast: Zac Efron,Taylor Schilling,Blythe Danner,Riley Thomas Stewart
Description: A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.
A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

Cast: Peter Dinklage,Haley Bennett,Kelvin Harrison Jr.,Ben Mendelsohn
Description: Too self-conscious to woo Roxanne himself, wordsmith Cyrano de Bergerac helps young Christian nab her heart through love letters.
While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

Cast: Scoot McNairy,Whitney Able,Mario Zuniga Benavides,Annalee Jefferies
Description: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion, a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the U.S. border.
A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.
A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.
A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.
An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.
A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.
An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.
A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.
Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.
Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, as more and more similarities between himself and his literary alter ego seem to arise.

Cast: Kyle Balda,Zac Efron,Taylor Swift,Danny DeVito,Ed Helms
Description: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

2038: George Almore is working on a true human-equivalent AI. His latest prototype is almost ready. This sensitive phase is also the riskiest. Especially as he has a goal that must be hidden at all costs.

Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

Movie Name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
Description: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.
In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.
A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

Cast: Ralph Zondag,D.B. Sweeney,Julianna Margulies,Samuel E. Wright,Alfre Woodard
Description: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Cast: Judi Dench,Sophie Cookson,Stephen Campbell Moore,Tom Hughes
Description: The story of Joan Stanley, who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.
After a journalist discovers his identity, a former Weather Underground activist goes on the run.

Cast: Warren Coleman,Judy Morris,Elijah Wood,Brittany Murphy,Hugh Jackman,Robin Williams
Description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.
A famous rock star's vacation in Italy with her boyfriend is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.
Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.
When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

Cast: Salma Hayek,Vincent Cassel,Toby Jones,John C. Reilly
Description: From the bitter quest of the Queen of Longtrellis, to two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king, to the King of Highhills obsessed with a giant Flea, these tales are inspired by the fairytales by Giambattista Basile.
When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.
A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

Cast: Albert Magnoli,Sylvester Stallone,Kurt Russell,Teri Hatcher,Jack Palance
Description: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.
A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son, who was imprisoned after being set up in a drug deal.

Cast: Bridget Fonda,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Steven Weber,Peter Friedman
Description: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

Cast: Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz,Kevin Janssens,Vincent Colombe,Guillaume Bouchède
Description: Never take your mistress on an annual guys' getaway, especially one devoted to hunting - a violent lesson for three wealthy married men.

Cast: Jake Johnson,Damon Wayans Jr.,Rob Riggle,Nina Dobrev
Description: Two struggling pals dress as police officers for a costume party and become neighborhood sensations. But when these newly-minted "heroes" get tangled in a real life web of mobsters and dirty detectives, they must put their fake badges on the line.

February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.
A man's affair with his family's housemaid leads to dark consequences.
Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

Cast: Ryan Fleck,Ben Mendelsohn,Ryan Reynolds,Yvonne Landry,Anthony Howard
Description: Down on his luck and facing financial hardship, Gerry teams up with younger charismatic poker player, Curtis, in an attempt to change his luck. The two set off on a road trip through the South with visions of winning back what's been lost.

Cast: Andrew McCarthy,Jami Gertz,Robert Downey Jr.,James Spader
Description: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.
Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.
A young solicitor travels to a remote village where he discovers that the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.
A rookie New Orleans police officer is forced to balance her identity as a black woman after she witnesses two corrupt cops committing murder.
The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

When a nice new neighbor moves in next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire who preys on the community. Can he save his neighborhood from the creature with the help of the famous "vampire killer", Peter Vincent?

Cast: Andrew McCarthy,Jonathan Silverman,Catherine Mary Stewart,Terry Kiser
Description: Two idiots try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.
A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.
Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

Movie Name: The Personal History of David Copperfield
Description: A modern take on Charles Dickens's classic tale of a young orphan who is able to triumph over many obstacles.

Cast: Don Johnson,Virginia Madsen,Jennifer Connelly,Charles Martin Smith
Description: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

Movie Name: The Man with the Iron Heart
Description: As the German Fascists expand their borders, scorching Europe from end to end, two brave Czechs of the Resistance prepare for a suicide mission to assassinate Reinhard Heydrich, the hideous mastermind behind the "Final Solution".
A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

Cast: Peter Spierig,Ethan Hawke,Willem Dafoe,Sam Neill,Harriet Minto-Day
Description: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.
A young girl in Bogotá witnesses her parents' murder and grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.
A Brooklyn teenager spends his days experimenting with drugs and looking online for older men to meet.

Cast: Scott Mosier,Benedict Cumberbatch,Cameron Seely,Rashida Jones,Pharrell Williams
Description: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.
A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and becomes friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

Cast: Ryan Reynolds,Paul Giamatti,Maya Rudolph,Samuel L. Jackson
Description: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

Cast: Jason Statham,Clive Owen,Robert De Niro,Dominic Purcell
Description: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for his sons' deaths.
A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

Cast: Alexsandra Wright,Tyrese Gibson,Taraji P. Henson,Omar Gooding
Description: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a "baby boy", faces the commitments of real life.
Biological war has decimated life on Earth. Los Angeles is a windswept ghost town where Robert Neville tools his convertible through sunlit streets foraging for supplies.

Movie Name: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
Description: A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.

A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?
An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.
Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.
With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.

Cast: Anaïs Reboux,Roxane Mesquida,Libero De Rienzo,Arsinée Khanjian
Description: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.
Noah meets Avery at a Halloween party and falls in love but gets friend-zoned. 3 years later, she's engaged to someone else. Noah returns in a time machine to fix things.
A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

Cast: Chuck Jones,Zach Galligan,Phoebe Cates,Howie Mandel,Tony Randall
Description: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.
A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear - but is it real or a product of her delusion?

Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Jessie T. Usher,Richard Roundtree,Regina Hall
Description: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.
Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

On an alternate Earth, the Joker tricks Superman into killing Lois Lane, which causes a rampage in the hero. Superman decides to take control of Earth; Batman and his allies will have to attempt to stop him.

Cast: John Travolta,Debra Winger,Scott Glenn,Madolyn Smith Osborne
Description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.
When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

Cast: Maximiliano Ghione,Norberto Gonzalo,Elvira Onetto,George L. Lewis
Description: When strange events occur in a neighborhood in Buenos Aires, a doctor specializing in the paranormal, her colleague, and an ex police officer decide to investigate further.

Cast: David Worth,Jean-Claude Van Damme,Dennis Alexio,Dennis Chan,Michel Qissi
Description: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.
A gambling addict and ticket scalper living an aimless life reluctantly agrees to coach a Little League team from the Chicago projects as part of a loan agreement.
Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.

After Charlie survives a car crash that kills his younger brother, he is given the gift of seeing the spirits of his brother and others who he has lost, and must use his powers to save the woman he loves from impending disaster.
An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

Cast: Daniel Radcliffe,Dane DeHaan,Michael C. Hall,Ben Foster
Description: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.
The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.
Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

Cast: John Rice,Jason Sudeikis,Josh Gad,Leslie Jones,Bill Hader
Description: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.
A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

Cast: Brandon Quintin Adams,Everett McGill,Wendy Robie,A.J. Langer
Description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.
Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.
A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.
An ex-con reunites with his estranged wayward 17-year old daughter to protect her from drug dealers who are trying to kill her.
A young mother reconnects with her larger-than-life playboy father on an adventure through New York.
A bickering gay couple must suddenly deal with the unexpected task of raising a 10-year-old boy.

A searing look at a day in the life of an assistant to a powerful executive. As Jane follows her daily routine, she grows increasingly aware of the insidious abuse that threatens every aspect of her position.
A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

Movie Name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
Description: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.
A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.
A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.
A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.
A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.
A virus spreads through an office complex causing white-collar workers to act out their worst impulses.
A psychopathic man goes on a killing and mutilation spree in New York City.
In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his forehead.
A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.
A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.
When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.
A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

Cast: Evan C. Kim,Bong Soo Han,Bill Bixby,George Lazenby
Description: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

Cast: Eddie Redmayne,Sean Bean,Carice van Houten,Kimberley Nixon
Description: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

Cast: Jonathan del Val,Patton Oswalt,Kevin Hart,Harrison Ford,Eric Stonestreet
Description: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.
An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

Cast: Richard Jenkins,Debra Winger,Evan Rachel Wood,Patricia Belcher
Description: A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning.
A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.
A washed-up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the U.S. Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.
Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.
A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go more awry when he falls in love with a talking brain.

Cast: Jon Erwin,K.J. Apa,Britt Robertson,Nathan Parsons,Gary Sinise
Description: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.
When a mother disapproves of her son's lover, she hires an underwear model and former bullfighter to seduce her away.
The crew of a horror web series travels to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. It soon encounters much more than expected as it moves deeper inside the nightmarish old building.
Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.
Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.
An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

Cast: Scott Waugh,Alex Veadov,Roselyn Sanchez,Nestor Serrano,Rorke Denver
Description: An elite team of Navy SEALs embark on a covert mission to recover a kidnapped CIA agent.
Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.

The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned home alone - hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.

At the scene of a bizarre murder, L.A. homicide detective Thomas Dagget discovers a lethal heavenly prophecy now being fulfilled on earth. In his fight to stop the forces of evil, he finds an unlikely ally in an elementary school teacher.

When a housewife with a personality disorder is taken hostage by a terrorist on the loose and a husband accused of cheating on his wife, have their own versions of reality, how do we know ...                See full summary »

Life and facts of Mary Wollstonecraft Godwin, who at 16 met 21 year old poet Percy Shelley, resulting in the writing of Frankenstein.

Description: On the verge of giving up on life, a guy travels to his hometown to make amends.
A veteran soldier returns from his completed tour of duty in Iraq, only to find his life turned upside down when he is arbitrarily ordered to return to field duty by the Army.

A martial arts instructor from the police force gets imprisoned after killing a man by accident. But when a vicious killer starts targeting martial arts masters, the instructor offers to help the police in return for his freedom.
The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.
An uptight but secretly heartbroken primary school teacher's little white lie about Hollywood coming to see his class' nativity play grows like wildfire in his rag-tag school low on self-esteem.

Description: The epic tale of King Asoka's life is recounted.

Description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.
A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

A young man, much to the chagrin of his father, becomes the new assistant to an illusionist in decline.

Description: Four couples meet for Sunday brunch, then discover they are stuck in a house together as the world may be about to end.

A housewife and grandma takes over the family business 1977, after her husband is hurt during a strike.
Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighborhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a "miracle" by a nosy neighbor ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life.
Join Jagga, a gifted teenage detective, who along with a female companion, is on a quest to find his missing father.
A young woman from the future forces a local gunman to help her stop an impending alien invasion which will wipe out the human race.

Cast: Kangana Ranaut,Kangana Ranaut,Danny Denzongpa,Suresh Oberoi,Atul Kulkarni
Description: Story of Rani Lakshmibai, one of the leading figures of the Indian Rebellion of 1857, and her resistance to the British Rule.

Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Cast: Tyler Gillett,Melissa Barrera,Neve Campbell,Courteney Cox,David Arquette
Description: 25 years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, Calif., a new killer dons the Ghostface mask and begins targeting a group of teenagers to resurrect secrets from the town's deadly past.
Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor "Sully" Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago by the House of Moncada.
While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

Description: When a group of rich 20-somethings plan a hurricane party at a remote family mansion, a party game turns deadly in this fresh and funny look at backstabbing, fake friends, and one party gone very, very wrong.
In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.
The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe Deacon is sent to Los Angeles for what should have been a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorizing the city.
A mysterious mastermind - Daredevil and his team forms a plan and commits bank heist to find the corporate looted people's money.

A young American woman moves with her husband to Bucharest, and begins to suspect that a stranger who watches her from the apartment building across the street may be a local serial killer decapitating women.

Cast: Scarlett Johansson,Jeremy McWilliams,Lynsey Taylor Mackay,Dougie McConnell
Description: A mysterious young woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. However, events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.
An Interpol agent successfully tracks down the world's most wanted art thief with help from a rival thief. But nothing is as it seems as a series of double-crosses ensues.
Drea and Eleanor agree to go after one another's bullies.
The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.
Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

Description: It is the dawn of World War III. In the west mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.
A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.
While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

Description: Witness the making of Tony Soprano. The story that reveals the humanity behind Tony's struggles and the influence his family - especially his uncle, Dickie Moltisanti - had over him becoming the most iconic mob boss of all time.
A retiring assassin suddenly finds himself on the receiving end of a hit, contracted by none other than his own employer seeking to cash in on the pensions of aging employees.
A demoted police officer assigned to a call dispatch desk is conflicted when he receives an emergency phone call from a kidnapped woman.

When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

Cast: Bryan Woods,Katie Stevens,Will Brittain,Lauryn Alisa McClain,Andrew Lewis Caldwell
Description: On Halloween, a group of friends encounter an "extreme" haunted house that promises to feed on their darkest fears. The night turns deadly as they come to the horrifying realization that some nightmares are real.

Cast: Neve Campbell,Courteney Cox,David Arquette,Jada Pinkett Smith
Description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

Cast: Alexander Skarsgård,Millie Bobby Brown,Rebecca Hall,Brian Tyree Henry
Description: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against each other--the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong--with humanity caught in the balance.
Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

Cast: Zeek Earl,Sophie Thatcher,Jay Duplass,Pedro Pascal,Luke Pitzrick
Description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. They've secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive. Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.

Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

Cast: Tobey Maguire,Kirsten Dunst,Topher Grace,Thomas Haden Church
Description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.
A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.
In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.
A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.
After swapping bodies with a deranged serial killer, a high-school senior discovers that she has fewer than 24 hours before the change becomes permanent.
After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

Cast: Judah Lewis,Samara Weaving,Robbie Amell,Hana Mae Lee
Description: When Cole stays up past his bedtime, he discovers that his hot baby sitter belongs to a satanic cult that will stop at nothing to keep him quiet.
Dante, Elias, and Jay and Silent Bob are enlisted by Randal after a heart attack to make a movie about the convenience store that started it all.
Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.
When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.
Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

Movie Name: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
Cast: Patrick Wilson,Vera Farmiga,Ruairi O'Connor,Sarah Catherine Hook
Description: The Warrens investigate a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession.

Movie Name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
Description: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.
Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.
17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.
A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.
A young gymnast, who tries desperately to please her demanding mother, discovers a strange egg. She hides it and keeps it warm, but when it hatches, what emerges shocks them all.
The recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.
After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

On the eve of her college graduation, Natalie's life diverges into parallel realities: one in which she becomes pregnant and remains in her hometown to raise her child and another in which she moves to LA to pursue her dream career.
A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.
A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.
When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.
Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.
After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.
An agoraphobic Seattle tech worker uncovers evidence of a crime.
A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Northern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.
An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

Cast: Travis Tedford,Bug Hall,Brittany Ashton Holmes,Kevin Jamal Woods
Description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.
A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Cast: Danny Glover,Gary Busey,Kevin Peter Hall,Rubén Blades
Description: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.
C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle on each other when they discover they are dating the same woman.
On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.
A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

Cast: Noomi Rapace,Hilmir Snær Guðnason,Björn Hlynur Haraldsson,Ingvar Sigurdsson
Description: A childless couple discovers a mysterious newborn on their farm in Iceland.
An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

Movie Name: The Deep End of the Ocean
Description: A film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

Cast: Joel Coen,Josh Brolin,George Clooney,Alden Ehrenreich,Ralph Fiennes
Description: A Hollywood fixer in the 1950s works to keep the studio's stars in line.

Cast: Daniel Radcliffe,Samara Weaving,Ned Dennehy,Natasha Liu Bordizzo
Description: A guy relies on his newly-acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.
A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.

In rural 19th-century France, a mysterious, possibly supernatural menace threatens a small village. John McBride, a pathologist, comes to town to investigate the danger - and exorcise some of his own demons in the process.
The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction, and horrors of war.
A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.
A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

Cast: Jamie Lee Curtis,Lindsay Lohan,Mark Harmon,Harold Gould
Description: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

Cast: Blake Lively,Óscar Jaenada,Angelo Josue Lozano Corzo,Joseph Salas
Description: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.
Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

Movie Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Cast: Kris Pearn,Bill Hader,Anna Faris,Will Forte,Neil Patrick Harris
Description: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.
Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.
An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.
After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Michelle Pfeiffer,Dianna Agron,John D'Leo
Description: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the Witness Protection Program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging, as their old habits die hard.
Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.
A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.
A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Robert De Niro,Blythe Danner,Teri Polo
Description: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.
A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.
A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Julie Warner,Barnard Hughes,Woody Harrelson
Description: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.
Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.
A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

In 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.
In a last-ditch effort to stop a diabolical plot, a dead CIA operative's memories, secrets, and skills are implanted into a death-row inmate in hopes that he will complete the operative's mission.

After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham (Missy Peregrym) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

Cast: Michael Douglas,Sean Bean,Brittany Murphy,Skye McCole Bartusiak
Description: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Cast: Idris Elba,Richard Madden,Charlotte Le Bon,Kelly Reilly
Description: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

Movie Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
Description: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.
The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

Movie Name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
Description: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute. Meanwhile, Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

Cast: Will Speck,Will Ferrell,Jon Heder,Amy Poehler,Will Arnett
Description: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.
A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.
Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.

Movie Name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.
An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

Cast: Fergal Reilly,Jason Sudeikis,Josh Gad,Danny McBride,Maya Rudolph
Description: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

After Lilly suffers a loss, a combative Starling takes nest beside her quiet home. The feisty bird taunts and attacks the grief-stricken Lilly. On her journey to expel the Starling, she rediscovers her will to live and capacity for love.
A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.
A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.
The rapid spread of an unknown infection has left an entire city in ungovernable chaos, but one survivor remains alive in isolation. It is his story.
A teenager teams up with the daughter of young-adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

Movie Name: Barb and Star Go to Vista Del Mar
Cast: Kristen Wiig,Annie Mumolo,Jamie Dornan,Damon Wayans Jr.
Description: Lifelong friends Barb and Star embark on the adventure of a lifetime when they decide to leave their small Midwestern town for the first time - ever.
A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.
Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

Movie Name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
Description: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.
A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.
The unexpected arrival of a wounded Union soldier at a girls school in Virginia during the American Civil War leads to jealousy and betrayal.
Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.

Cast: Jason Biggs,Alyson Hannigan,Seann William Scott,Eugene Levy
Description: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.
With the 1970s behind him, San Diego's former top-rated newsreader, Ron Burgundy, returns to take New York City's first twenty-four-hour news channel by storm.

Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

Cast: Ethan Coen,George Clooney,Catherine Zeta-Jones,Billy Bob Thornton,Geoffrey Rush
Description: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

Cast: Thomas Guard,Emily Browning,Arielle Kebbel,Elizabeth Banks,David Strathairn
Description: Anna returns home after a stint in a mental hospital, but her recovery is jeopardized by her cruel stepmother and ghastly visions of her dead mother.
An insurance salesman/ex-cop is caught up in a life-threatening conspiracy during his daily commute home.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Kenneth Branagh,Helena Bonham Carter,Tom Hulce
Description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.
Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

Five married guys secretly share a penthouse loft in the city where they can carry out hidden affairs. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare, when they discover the dead body of a woman in the loft one of the group must be involved.
Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

Cast: Gita Pullapilly,Kristen Bell,Kirby Howell-Baptiste,Paul Walter Hauser,Bebe Rexha
Description: A pair of housewives create a $40 million coupon scam.
A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

Cast: Richard Gere,Lauren Hutton,Hector Elizondo,Nina van Pallandt
Description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.
Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.
Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.
Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

Cast: Yolanda Ramke,Simone Landers,Martin Freeman,Marlee Jane McPherson-Dobbins,Lily Anne McPherson-Dobbins
Description: After an epidemic spreads all over Australia, a father searches for someone willing to protect his daughter.
In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

Movie Name: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
Description: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.
A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

Cast: Fred Ward,Uma Thurman,Maria de Medeiros,Richard E. Grant
Description: Anaïs Nin meets American writer Henry Miller in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening, which includes Henry and his wife June.

In 1983, financially struggling college student Samantha Hughes takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret, putting her life in mortal danger.
Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.
An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Cast: Ben Affleck,Aaron Eckhart,Uma Thurman,Michael C. Hall
Description: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.
Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.
The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.
A passionate holiday romance leads to an obsessive relationship, when an Australian photojournalist wakes one morning in a Berlin apartment and is unable to leave.

A kids' show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, A.K.A. Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids' television isn't all child's play.
A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a two-year-old daughter with a surprising gift.

Cast: Mel Gibson,Jamie Lee Curtis,Elijah Wood,Isabel Glasser
Description: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

Movie Name: The Only Living Boy in New York
Description: Adrift in New York City, a recent college graduate's life is upended by his father's mistress.
A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.

Cast: Steve Carell,Tina Fey,Mark Wahlberg,Taraji P. Henson
Description: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

Cast: Matthew Robinson,Ricky Gervais,Jennifer Garner,Jonah Hill,Louis C.K.
Description: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.
David Marks, a real estate scion, is suspected of killing his wife Katie, who disappeared in 1982.

When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.
The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.
Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.
Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.

Cast: Peter Farrelly,Laurence Fishburne,Chris Rock,David Hyde Pierce,Brandy Norwood
Description: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel, and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

Cast: James Badge Dale,Emily Mortimer,Bruce Greenwood,Max Martini
Description: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

Cast: Catherine Mary Stewart,Kelli Maroney,Robert Beltran,Sharon Farrell
Description: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.
A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?
A likable guy pursues his office crush with help from his evil talking pets, but things turn sinister when she stands him up for a date.

Cast: Nina Dobrev,Jimmy O. Yang,Darren Barnet,James Saito
Description: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.
A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.
When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

Cast: AnnaSophia Robb,Jeff Daniels,Eva Marie Saint,Cicely Tyson
Description: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Cast: Lil Rel Howery,Yvonne Orji,John Cena,Meredith Hagner
Description: An uptight couple makes friends with a rowdy couple while on vacation in Mexico, but their friendship takes an awkward turn when they get back home.
The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

Cast: Richard Rich,Grant Bardsley,Freddie Jones,Susan Sheridan,Nigel Hawthorne
Description: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.
Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

Cast: Val Kilmer,LL Cool J,Christian Slater,Eion Bailey
Description: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

Cast: Don Bluth,Sean Marshall,Helen Reddy,Jim Dale,Mickey Rooney
Description: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.
A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.
On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.
After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.
During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.
An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).
After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

Cast: Amandla Stenberg,Nick Robinson,Anika Noni Rose,Ana de la Reguera
Description: A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.
A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.
A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.
A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.
Truckers form a mile-long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff - Based on the country song of the same title by C.W. McCall.

Cast: Björn Stein,Kate Beckinsale,Michael Ealy,India Eisley,Stephen Rea
Description: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.
In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.
A group of teens discovers secret plans for a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

Cast: Dermot Mulroney,Sarah Jessica Parker,Claire Danes,Diane Keaton
Description: An uptight, conservative businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.
Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down Chinese Premier Xiang Ping.
In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.
A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.
