Description: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.
A retired detective accepts a simple task, unaware that it will tear open old, forgotten, but deadly wounds.
When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.
After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

Cast: Carl Gottlieb,Peter Horton,John Landis,Robert K. Weiss,Rosanna Arquette,Michelle Pfeiffer,Arsenio Hall,Donald F. Muhich
Description: A spoof of low budget 1950s science-fiction movies, interspersed with various comedy sketches and fake commercials making fun of late-night television.
Two feisty, free-spirited women are connected by the brilliant, charismatic poet who loves them both.

Cast: Martin Henderson,Aishwarya Rai Bachchan,Nadira Babbar,Anupam Kher
Description: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

Cast: Christina Ricci,Jonathan Rhys Meyers,Jessica Lange,Anne Heche
Description: A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard.
A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

Movie Name: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
Cast: Sean Patrick Flanery,Norman Reedus,Billy Connolly,Clifton Collins Jr.
Description: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

Cast: Jason Beghe,John Pankow,Kate McNeil,Joyce Van Patten
Description: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

Cast: Scott Bakula,Hector Elizondo,Robert Loggia,Harley Jane Kozak
Description: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.
Documents Joaquin Phoenix's transition from the acting world to a career as an aspiring rapper.
A defense attorney works to get his teenage client acquitted of murdering his wealthy father.
The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.
When a terrorist escapes custody during a routine handover, Will Holloway must team with disgraced MI5 Intelligence Chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London.

Cast: Yvan Attal,Randall Balsmeyer,Allen Hughes,Shunji Iwai,Wen Jiang,Shekhar Kapur,Joshua Marston,Mira Nair,Natalie Portman,Brett Ratner,Shia LaBeouf,Natalie Portman,Bradley Cooper,Hayden Christensen
Description: Eleven love stories set in one of the most loved and hated cities of the world, New York City.
A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.
A pair of high-frequency traders go up against their old boss in an effort to make millions in a fiber-optic cable deal.
A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.
An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Patrick Wilson,Kerry Washington,Ron Glass
Description: A troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.

Cast: Ingrid Bolsø Berdal,Rolf Kristian Larsen,Tomas Alf Larsen,Endre Martin Midtstigen
Description: 5 young Norwegians head up to the mountains to snowboard. One breaks his leg and it's getting dark soon, so they spend the night in a big, abandoned hotel, closed 30 years ago. They are not alone.

Cast: Sidse Babett Knudsen,Marianne Jean-Baptiste,Julian Barratt,Steve Oram
Description: In Fabric is a haunting ghost story set against the backdrop of a busy winter sales period in a department store and follows the life of a cursed dress as it passes from person to person, with devastating consequences.

Cast: Peter Farrelly,Drew Barrymore,Jimmy Fallon,Jason Spevack,Jack Kehler
Description: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.
The young apprentice of a magical, eccentric toy store owner learns to believe in herself, and in her friends, upon learning some grave news about the future.

When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

Cast: Randy Barbato,Macaulay Culkin,Wilson Cruz,Seth Green,Diana Scarwid
Description: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.

Cast: Danny McBride,Ben Best,Mary Jane Bostic,Spencer Moreno
Description: An inept tae kwon do instructor struggles with marital troubles and an unhealthy obsession with fellow tae kwon do enthusiast Chuck "The Truck" Wallace.
Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

Cast: Max von Sydow,Ed Harris,Bonnie Bedelia,Amanda Plummer
Description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.
A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.
A disgraced MMA fighter finds redemption in the cage and the courage to face her demons when the son she had given up as an infant unexpectedly reenters her life.
The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.
A former U.S. First Lady wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

Cast: Christopher George,Catriona MacColl,Carlo De Mejo,Antonella Interlenghi
Description: A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.
The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.
A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.
A group of mountaineers in the Scottish Highlands discover a kidnapped girl and are pursued by her captors.
On a Tuesday night, five couples have separate sexual adventures.
A couple finds themselves lured into a Russian oligarch's plans to defect, and are soon positioned between the Russian Mafia and the British Secret Service, neither of whom they can trust.

Cast: Rob Lowe,James Spader,Palmer Lee Todd,Rosalyn Landor
Description: A soft and hesitant young man is in danger when he tries to break toxic relationships with a mysterious stranger claiming to be his friend.

Cast: Michael Palin,Harry H. Corbett,John Le Mesurier,Warren Mitchell
Description: A young peasant with no interest in adventure or fortune is mistaken for the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

Cast: Danny DeVito,Gregory Hines,James Remar,Ed Begley Jr.
Description: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.
A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.
A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish television set and must survive the gauntlet of twisted versions of shows in which they find themselves.

Cast: Chevy Chase,Madolyn Smith Osborne,Kevin O'Morrison,Joseph Maher
Description: A couple swap city life for the country, but their picturesque new hometown turns out to be just a little bit different to what they were expecting.
A thriller centered on a con artist, his wife, and a stranger who flee Athens after one of them is caught up in the death of a private detective.

Cast: Steeve Léonard,Diego Klattenhoff,Charlotte Sullivan,Brett Donahue,Bradley Sawatzky
Description: A man wakes up with no memory of who he is, and finds that everyone who comes within a certain distance of him suddenly dies.

Cast: Kate Hudson,Gael García Bernal,Kathy Bates,Peter Dinklage
Description: An irreverent young woman who uses her humor to prevent matters from getting serious has a life-changing visit with her doctor.
A reporter becomes involved with a mysterious woman while investigating her late husband's death.
A man with a thirst for revenge builds a full body armor from Kevlar and goes on a killing spree.

Movie Name: Down and Out in Beverly Hills
Description: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

Cast: Mary Beth Hurt,Michael McKean,Kathryn Walker,Colleen Camp
Description: A seemingly normal young boy is found abandoned on a mountain road and adopted by a family who are increasingly amazed by his abilities before discovering the secret behind his real identity.

Cast: David Posamentier,Sam Rockwell,Olivia Wilde,Michelle Monaghan,Jane Fonda
Description: Douglas leads a simple and uneventful existence as a pharmacist in a small town.
A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

Cast: Reese Witherspoon,Romola Garai,James Purefoy,Jonathan Rhys Meyers
Description: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia Sedley.
A sound engineer's work for an Italian horror studio becomes a terrifying case of life imitating art.

Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. But when the men in black kidnap him, it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help him reunite with his long-lost family.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Gabrielle Anwar,Anthony Higgins,Michael Tucker
Description: Doug's a concierge at a luxury hotel on Manhattan. He saves all his tips towards his plan for a hotel. A potential investor seduces the girl, Doug loves, with false promises of leaving his wife. Doug's dilemma: hotel project or girl?
An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

Cast: Christopher Soren Kelly,Cassandra Clark,Cajardo Lindsey,Jesse D. Arrow
Description: A man trapped in an automated prison must outsmart a computer in order to escape.
A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.
Two siblings decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

Cast: Clif Prowse,Clif Prowse,Derek Lee,Michael Gill,Baya Rehaz
Description: Two best friends see their trip of a lifetime take a dark turn when one of them is struck by a mysterious affliction. Now, in a foreign land, they race to uncover the source before it consumes him completely.
A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.
A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

Amid the Civil War in 17th-century England, a group of deserters flee from battle through an overgrown field. Captured by an alchemist, the men are forced to help him search to find a hidden treasure that he believes is buried in the field.
A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

Cast: Rebecca De Mornay,Jaime King,Shawn Ashmore,Briana Evigan
Description: The sadistic members of a villainous family return to their childhood home to terrorize the new home owners and their guests.

Cast: Melisa Wallack,Aaron Eckhart,Jessica Alba,Logan Lerman,Elizabeth Banks
Description: A guy fed up with his job and married to a cheating wife reluctantly mentors a rebellious teen.

A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.

Cast: Kal Penn,John Cho,Neil Patrick Harris,Patton Oswalt
Description: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

Cast: Nick Nolte,Martin Short,Sarah Rowland Doroff,James Earl Jones
Description: A reformed bank robber is taken hostage by a desperate man during a bank hold up, but is forced to go on the run with his captor when they're both mistakenly thought to be in cahoots.

Two siblings begin to develop special talents after they find a mysterious box of toys. Soon the kids, their parents, and even their teacher are drawn into a strange new world and find a task ahead of them that is far more important than any of them could imagine!

Cast: Jeffrey Combs,Bruce Abbott,Claude Earl Jones,Fabiana Udenio
Description: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.
Marie is a vampire with a thirst for bad guys. When she fails to properly dispose of one of her victims, a violent mob boss, she bites off more than she can chew and faces a new, immortal danger.
Beneath Bruce Garrett's under-confident, overweight exterior, the passionate heart of a salsa king lies dormant. Now, one woman is about to reignite his Latin fire.
A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

Cast: Liv Tyler,Matt Dillon,Mary Jo Smith,Michael Douglas
Description: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.
Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

Cast: Jessica De Gouw,Liam Graham,Fiona Press,Adriane Daff
Description: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.
A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Fioravante decides to become a professional Don Juan as a way of making money to help his cash-strapped friend, Murray. With Murray acting as his "manager", the duo quickly finds themselves caught up in the crosscurrents of love and money.
A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.
A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Uma Thurman,Bill Murray,David Caruso
Description: When shy, soft-spoken Chicago detective Wayne "Mad Dog" Dobie inadvertently saves the life of local gangster Frank Milo, he's the reluctant recipient of an unusual one week "thank you" gift - a beautiful bartender named Glory.

Cast: Isaach De Bankolé,Alex Descas,Jean-François Stévenin,Óscar Jaenada
Description: The story of a mysterious loner, a stranger in the process of completing a criminal job.
Maggie wants to have a baby, raising him on her own, but when she gets romantically involved with John, a married man, things get complicated and all the balance of Maggie's plans may collapse.
A talented mechanic prepares to battle his way through hordes of flesh-eating monsters after his sister is kidnapped on the eve of a zombie apocalypse.
In Iowa, a girl in foster care discovers her talent for butter carving and finds herself pitted against an ambitious local woman in their town's annual contest.
A college student, who sees a UFO, uses his exceptional math skills to investigate the sighting with his friends while the FBI follows closely behind.
A Chinese chef accidentally gets involved with a news reporter who filmed a drug bust that went awry, and is now being chased by gangs who are trying to get the video tape.
A man wakes up in the wilderness, in a pit full of dead bodies, with no memory and must determine if the murderer is one of the strangers who rescued him, or if he himself is the killer.

Cast: Panna Rittikrai,Tony Jaa,Sarunyu Wongkrachang,Sorapong Chatree,Primrata Dej-Udom
Description: A young Thai boxer learns the skills and inner meaning of martial arts.
In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event that comes to redefine their relationship.

Cast: Hugh Grant,Gene Hackman,Sarah Jessica Parker,David Morse
Description: A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.

Movie Name: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
Description: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.
Set in 1990s Belfast, an active member of the IRA becomes an informant for MI5 in order to protect her son's welfare.
A former rodeo champ befriends a young man with a propensity for violence.

Movie Name: I Am Not a Serial Killer
Description: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.
A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.

Cast: Mike Maguire,Len Cariou,Sarah McElligott,Amir Talai,Daniel Chacón
Description: Satirical interpretations of world events and curious human behavior.
Raj is a heartbreaker. His love stories with Mahi, Radhika, and Gayatri finally teach him about love and life in their own sweet, sexy, and sassy ways.
The legend of Santa Claus is put in jeopardy when an unscrupulous toy manufacturer attempts to take over Christmas.

Cast: William H. Macy,Julia Stiles,Joe Mantegna,Frances Bay
Description: A fortune-teller's teasing rumination sends Edmond Burke lurching into New York City's hellish underworld.
Mistaken for his character Ash from the 'Evil Dead' trilogy, Bruce Campbell is forced to fight a real monster in a small Oregon town.
A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.
People mysteriously start receiving voicemail messages from their future selves, foretelling their deaths.
A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.
A long-time married couple who've spent their lives together in the same New York apartment become overwhelmed by personal and real estate-related issues when they plan to move away.

Cast: John Cusack,Billy Bob Thornton,Connie Nielsen,Lara Phillips
Description: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

Cast: Pierre Niney,Guillaume Gallienne,Charlotte Le Bon,Laura Smet
Description: A look at the life of French designer Yves Saint-Laurent from the beginning of his career in 1958 when he met his lover and business partner, Pierre Bergé.

Movie Name: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
Cast: Donnie Yen,Alex Ahlstrom,Shu Qi,Anthony Chau-Sang Wong
Description: Chen Zhen, believed dead, returns to 1930s Shanghai under a false name. He joins a mob boss for info on the Japanese incl. a long kill list and at night fights the Japanese masked.
About a recent college grad who returns home while she tries to figure out what to do with her life.

Movie Name: Assassination of a High School President
Description: At a Catholic high school, a sophomore newspaper reporter investigates a case of stolen SAT exams. He thinks he's nailed the suspect and managed to get the popular girl when he realises a larger conspiracy is afoot.
A high schooler recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine.
A sweet Midwestern guy with his life planned out for himself is wooed, groomed, and ultimately dumped by a complicated, elusive gal.

Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.
A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.
A bitter conflict is sown in a powerful crime family when the son goes against his father and decides to stand up for the law.

Cast: Enzo Zelocchi,Mariel Betancourt,Paula Labaredas,Bryson Jones Allman
Description: It's a dark twisted story full of sex, jealousy, betrayal and violence - Where mercy is not an option.
A son steps into his father's shoes and has to win a bloody war before he becomes the leader.

John a CIA contractor goes to Ukraine with his team to look for Russian weapons of mass destruction and along the way takes with him a Ukrainian little girl found during a gunfight against ...                See full summary »
A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

Cast: Christian Bale,Margot Robbie,John David Washington,Alessandro Nivola
Description: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.
A young woman goes on a solo vacation to the English countryside following the death of her ex-husband.

Cast: Adam Nee,Sandra Bullock,Channing Tatum,Daniel Radcliffe,Da'Vine Joy Randolph
Description: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.
A runaway slave forges through the swamps of Louisiana on a tortuous journey to escape plantation owners that nearly killed him.

Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal,Yahya Abdul-Mateen II,Eiza González,Garret Dillahunt
Description: Two robbers steal an ambulance after their heist goes awry.

Cast: Jonathan Goldstein,Ed Helms,Christina Applegate,Skyler Gisondo,Steele Stebbins
Description: Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.

Cast: Allison Janney,Jurnee Smollett,Logan Marshall-Green,Ridley Asha Bateman
Description: A storm rages. A young girl is kidnapped. Her mother teams up with the mysterious woman next door to pursue the kidnapper, a journey that tests their limits and exposes shocking secrets from their pasts.

Cast: Chris Pratt,Bryce Dallas Howard,Rafe Spall,Justice Smith
Description: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

Cast: Elena Anaya,Natasha Yarovenko,Enrico Lo Verso,Najwa Nimri
Description: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.
Six individuals from all around the globe, each the very best at what they do, have been chosen not only for their skill, but for a unique desire to delete their pasts to change the future.
Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

Cast: Jamie Foxx,Dave Franco,Natasha Liu Bordizzo,Meagan Good
Description: A hard-working, blue-collar dad just wants to provide a good life for his quick-witted 10-year-old daughter. His mundane San Fernando Valley pool cleaning job is a front for his real source of income: hunting and killing vampires.
Follows a young graffiti artist who discovers a shocking secret that would put him and the ones closest to him in danger.

Music superstars Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting married before a global audience of fans. But when Kat learns, seconds before her vows, that Bastian has been unfaithful, she instead decides to marry Charlie, a stranger in the crowd.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,James Hampton,Susan Ursitti,Jerry Levine
Description: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.
While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

Cast: Ryan Reynolds,Samuel L. Jackson,Salma Hayek,Antonio Banderas
Description: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.
A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

Cast: Conrad Vernon,Seth Rogen,Kristen Wiig,Jonah Hill,Alistair Abell
Description: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.
In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.
A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.
Jack Reacher must uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy in order to clear his name while on the run as a fugitive from the law.
IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Will Smith,Rip Torn,Lara Flynn Boyle
Description: Agent Jay is sent to find Agent Kay and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from Kay's past.
Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.
A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

Cast: Nicole Kidman,Daniel Craig,Dakota Blue Richards,Ben Walker
Description: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Cast: Raman Hui,Mike Myers,Cameron Diaz,Eddie Murphy,Antonio Banderas
Description: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.
A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.
An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.
In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.
Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.
In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.
Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.
Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

Cast: Elizabeth Banks,David Denman,Jackson A. Dunn,Abraham Clinkscales
Description: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?
A designer makes a grievious mistake when he rejects the friendship of a borderline cable guy.
A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.
A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.
James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.
Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

Movie Name: A Million Ways to Die in the West
Description: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his newly found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.
A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.
Veteran CIA agent Henry is reunited in Vienna with his former colleague and former Celia.

Cast: Hayden Christensen,Samuel L. Jackson,Jamie Bell,Rachel Bilson
Description: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

A failed London musician meets once a week with a woman for a series of intense sexual encounters to get away from the realities of life. But when he begins inquiring about her, it puts their relationship at risk.

Cast: Havana Rose Liu,Danny Ramirez,David Rysdahl,Mila Harris
Description: During a blizzard and stranded at an isolated highway rest stop in the mountains, a college student discovers a kidnapped child hidden in a car belonging to one of the people inside.

Film adaptation of the Tony and Grammy Award-winning musical about Evan Hansen, a high school senior with Social Anxiety disorder and his journey of self-discovery and acceptance following the suicide of a fellow classmate.
Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.

Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.
In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.
In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.
The savage murders of three young children sparks a controversial trial of three teenagers accused of killing the kids as part of a Satanic ritual.
A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

Movie Name: The Girl in the Spider's Web
Description: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

Cast: Dwayne Johnson,Naomie Harris,Malin Akerman,Jeffrey Dean Morgan
Description: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.
A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.
Brother/sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch-hunters who help innocent villagers. One day they stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.
An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Dave Bautista,Kate Bosworth
Description: A father is without the means to pay for his daughter's medical treatment. As a last resort, he partners with a greedy co-worker to rob a casino. When things go awry they're forced to hijack a city bus.

Cast: David P. Smith,Anna Kendrick,Justin Timberlake,Rachel Bloom,James Corden
Description: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.
A group of young adults navigate love and relationships in New York City.
A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

Cast: Victoria Justice,Adam Demos,Luca Asta Sardelis,Samantha Cain
Description: It follows a hard-driving LA wine-company executive who travels to an Australian sheep station to land a major client and there she ends up working as a ranch hand and sparking with a rugged local.

Cast: Michael Keaton,Maggie Q,Samuel L. Jackson,David Rintoul
Description: Rescued as a child by the legendary assassin Moody, Anna is the world's most skilled contract killer. However, when Moody is brutally killed, she vows revenge for the man who taught her everything she knows.
After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

Cast: Sean Connery,Kim Basinger,Klaus Maria Brandauer,Max von Sydow
Description: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.
An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

Cast: Peri Baumeister,Carl Anton Koch,Alexander Scheer,Kais Setti
Description: A woman with a mysterious illness is forced into action when a group of terrorists attempt to hijack a transatlantic overnight flight.

Cast: Thomas Ian Nicholas,Gary Busey,Albert Hall,Amy Morton
Description: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.
A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.
After an innocent AOL chat turns racy, a Catholic teenager in the early 2000s discovers masturbation and struggles to suppress her new urges in the face of eternal damnation.

Cast: Steve Hickner,Jerry Seinfeld,Renée Zellweger,Matthew Broderick,Patrick Warburton
Description: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey and subsequently decides to sue them.

A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.
After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

Cast: John Gallagher Jr.,Tony Goldwyn,Adria Arjona,John C. McGinley
Description: In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

Cast: Pat Morita,Ralph Macchio,Pat E. Johnson,Bruce Malmuth
Description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.
As four friends prepare for life after high school, different challenges bring about turning points in each of their lives. The dramas unfold and resolve at their local rollerskating rink, Cascade.
A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.
Ethan Wate longs to escape his small southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena Duchannes. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town.
A super-powered construction worker falls in with a group of criminals in order to raise the funds to help his ill mother.

Cast: David Duchovny,Orlando Jones,Julianne Moore,Seann William Scott
Description: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

Cast: Will Ferrell,Mark Wahlberg,Linda Cardellini,Thomas Haden Church
Description: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.
A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.
A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Janeane Garofalo,William H. Macy,Hank Azaria
Description: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.
Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.
Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.
Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.
When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.
Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...
After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.
An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from German thieves and return them to their owners.
A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

Balthazar Blake, an apprentice of the legendary magician Merlin, must train his old teacher's successor - an introverted but resourceful physics prodigy - in the art of sorcery to prevent the return of Morgana le Fay.

The story of a man who returns home on Christmas to settle his estranged mother's estate. Once there, he discovers a diary that may hold secrets to his own past and of a beautiful young woman on a mysterious journey of her own.
A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

Movie Name: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
Description: Teenage explorer Dora leads her friends on an adventure to save her parents and solve the mystery behind a lost city of gold.
In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

Cast: Treat Williams,Famke Janssen,Anthony Heald,Kevin J. O'Connor
Description: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Dolph Lundgren,Ally Walker,Ed O'Ross
Description: Two rival soldiers who were killed in Vietnam are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.
As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.
Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.
A streetwise man flees South Central Los Angeles, heading to the suburbs and his lottery-winner uncle and cousin, to avoid a neighborhood thug with a grudge who has just escaped from prison.
Five years after the events of the first film, a summer camp next to the infamous Camp Crystal Lake is preparing to open, but the legend of Jason is weighing heavy on the proceedings.
The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

Cast: Zac Efron,Michael B. Jordan,Miles Teller,Imogen Poots
Description: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"
A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals. Someone Great is a romantic comedy about love, loss, growth and the everlasting bond of female friendship.

Cast: Robert Forster,Robin Riker,Michael V. Gazzo,Dean Jagger
Description: A pet baby alligator is flushed down a toilet and survives in the city sewers. 12 years later, it grows to an enormous size thanks to a diet of discarded laboratory dogs injected with growth hormones. Now, humans have entered the menu.
Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

Cast: Will Speck,Jennifer Aniston,Jason Bateman,Patrick Wilson,Jeff Goldblum
Description: Seven years after the fact, a man comes to the realization that he was the sperm donor for his best friend's boy.

Movie Name: The Kid Who Would Be King
Cast: Louis Ashbourne Serkis,Denise Gough,Dean Chaumoo,Tom Taylor
Description: A band of kids embark on an epic quest to thwart a medieval menace.
When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

Cast: Colin Farrell,Jessica Brown Findlay,Russell Crowe,Jennifer Connelly
Description: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

Cast: Dee Wallace,Daniel Hugh Kelly,Danny Pintauro,Christopher Stone
Description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

Cast: Marin Ireland,Michael Abbott Jr.,Julie Oliver-Touchstone,Lynn Andrews
Description: On a secluded farm in a nondescript rural town, a man is slowly dying. His family gathers to mourn, and soon a darkness grows, marked by waking nightmares and a growing sense that something evil is taking over the family.
Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.
Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.
A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a deceased ventriloquist.

Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

When Mari Gilbert's daughter disappears, police inaction drives her own investigation into the gated Long Island community where Shannan was last seen. Her search brings attention to over a dozen murdered sex workers.
A government fakes the death of a criminal to turn this young woman into a killer on its service.

Cast: Brian Taylor,Jason Statham,Amy Smart,Clifton Collins Jr.,Dwight Yoakam
Description: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

Cast: Jodie Foster,Sofia Boutella,Dave Bautista,Sterling K. Brown
Description: Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.
A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.
After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.
Grieving hairdresser, Justice, goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and a postal worker which she cannot stand
A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.
A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

Cast: Trey Parker,Dian Bachar,Robyn Lynne Raab,Michael Dean Jacobs
Description: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.
Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

A weak con man panics when he learns he's going to prison for fraud. He hires a mysterious martial arts guru who helps transform him into a martial arts expert who can fight off inmates who want to hurt or love him.

Movie Name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
Description: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs, and sleaze.
A disturbed, delusional high-school student with aspirations of a career in medicine goes to extremes to earn the approval of her controlling mother.
A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?
Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.
When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely teenagers band together to fight.

A summer in rural O‘ahu takes an exciting turn for two Brooklyn-raised siblings when a journal pointing to long-lost treasure sets them on an epic adventure with new friends, and leads them to reconnect with their Hawaiian heritage.

Cast: Jill Culton,Anthony Stacchi,Ashton Kutcher,Martin Lawrence,Debra Messing,Gary Sinise
Description: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.
An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.

A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.
A famous author goes on a cruise trip with her friends and nephew in an effort to find fun and happiness while she comes to terms with her troubled past.
Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.
A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

Luke and Kate are coworkers at a brewery who spend their nights drinking and flirting heavily. One weekend away together with their significant others proves who really belongs together and who doesn't.

Cast: Eric Christian Olsen,Nicholas D'Agosto,Sarah Roemer,Molly Sims
Description: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.
Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.
Joel, the owner of an extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.
An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

Cast: Stuart Ortiz,The Vicious Brothers,Benjamin Wilkinson,Sean Rogerson,Ashleigh Gryzko,Merwin Mondesir
Description: For their ghost hunting reality show, a production crew locks themselves inside an abandoned mental hospital that's supposedly haunted - and it might prove to be all too true.

Cast: Dee Wallace,M. Emmet Walsh,Billy Green Bush,Scott Grimes
Description: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.
A bored New Jersey suburban housewife's fascination with a free-spirited woman she has read about in the personal columns leads to her being mistaken for the woman herself.
Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

Newlyweds and their three children move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living in or visiting the house.
A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is then forced to help rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped lair.
Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.
A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.
American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

Movie Name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
Description: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.
A paroled former criminal is drawn into an endeavor that puts life with his family at risk and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.
A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.
In 1987, U.S. Senator Gary Hart's presidential campaign is derailed when he's caught in a scandalous love affair.

Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one.
Barbara Thorson struggles through life by escaping into a fantasy life of magic and monsters.
Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.
A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.
A suicidal American befriends a Japanese man lost in a forest near Mt. Fuji and the two search for a way out.

Cast: Melissa Rauch,Gary Cole,Haley Lu Richardson,Thomas Middleditch
Description: A foul-mouthed former gymnastics bronze medalist with local celebrity status reluctantly trains a rising Olympics aspirant.

Cast: Joe Johnston,Macaulay Culkin,Christopher Lloyd,Kanin Howell,Alexis Kirschner
Description: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school...now she just needs to learn how to dance.

Cast: Peter Huyck,Jason Sudeikis,Leslie Bibb,Tyler Labine,Lake Bell
Description: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.

Cast: Antonio Banderas,Jonathan Rhys Meyers,Piper Perabo,Vincent Riotta
Description: A reclusive screenwriter takes in a mysterious drifter who is determined to repay his kindness by helping him finish his latest story.

Cast: Dustin Hoffman,Sharon Stone,Samuel L. Jackson,Peter Coyote
Description: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.
Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

Movie Name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
Description: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armored car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.

Cast: James Woods,Daniel Baldwin,Sheryl Lee,Thomas Ian Griffith
Description: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.
A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Ed Harris,Eva Mendes,Luis Guzmán
Description: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.
A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

Cast: Ashley Judd,Michael Shannon,Harry Connick Jr.,Lynn Collins
Description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.
A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

Cast: Dax Shepard,Dax Shepard,Kristen Bell,Bradley Cooper,Kristin Chenoweth
Description: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.
The night of their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.
On the set of a playwright's new project, a love triangle forms between his wife, her ex-lover and the call-girl-turned-actress cast in the production.
Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend, but nothing is as it seems.

Cast: Nicolas Cage,Maria Conchita Alonso,Jennifer Beals,Elizabeth Ashley
Description: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.
The outback once more becomes a place of horror as another unwitting tourist becomes the prey for crazed, serial-killing pig-hunter Mick Taylor.

Cast: Chuck Connors,Jocelyn Jones,Jon Van Ness,Robin Sherwood
Description: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekenetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

Cast: Kelsey Grammer,Lauren Holly,Rob Schneider,Harry Dean Stanton
Description: Lt. Cmdr. Tom Dodge is assigned as Captain to the USS Stingray, an old diesel driven submarine that has seen better days.
A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.
In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still-living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

A grounded, soulful, celebratory comedy about three mothers and their adult sons. The film explores the stage after motherhood, Otherhood, when you have to redefine your relationship with your children, friends, spouse, and most importantly, yourself.

Cast: Kristen Stewart,Lars Eidinger,Sigrid Bouaziz,Anders Danielsen Lie
Description: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

Cast: Tyler James Williams,Tessa Thompson,Kyle Gallner,Teyonah Parris
Description: The lives of four black students at an Ivy League college.
Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

The gruesome murder of a Brooklyn Detective will turn the case into a personal vendetta when the deceased's best friend and fellow officer will unleash an all-out attack against a psychotic Mafia enforcer's brutal gang.
A playboy who refuses to give up his hedonistic lifestyle to settle down and marry his true love seeks help from a demented psychoanalyst who is having romantic problems of his own.

A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.
Four high school students look to redefine themselves after graduation.

Cast: Pierce Brosnan,Geoffrey Rush,Jamie Lee Curtis,Leonor Varela
Description: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.
A grown-up woman who kept her childish instincts and behavior starts working as the nanny of an 8-year-old girl who actually acts like an adult. But everything ends right-side up.
A veteran US Marine sniper is partnered with a rookie sniper as his spotter to take out a politician and a rebel leader in the jungles of Panama.
A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.
Two L.A. cops with opposing views on what is the best way to uphold the law have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.
Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.
Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.
A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.
Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.
An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

Movie Name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
Cast: Donnie Yen,Michelle Yeoh,Harry Shum Jr.,Natasha Liu Bordizzo
Description: A story of lost love, young love, a legendary sword and one last opportunity at redemption.
When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.
A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

Cast: Michael Paré,Nancy Allen,Eric Christmas,Bobby Di Cicco
Description: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future.
Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

Cast: Faye Dunaway,Tommy Lee Jones,Brad Dourif,Rene Auberjonois
Description: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.
A mysterious stranger and a random act of violence drag a town of misfits and nitwits into the bloody crosshairs of revenge.
A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.
A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.
A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.
A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.
An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in an upper class prep school, & centered around basketball player Odin.
A naive college graduate, Amy, who believes she's destined to be a great poet, begrudgingly accepts a job in a shop while she pursues a mentorship with reclusive writer Rat Billings.
Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

Cast: Lane Carroll,Will MacMillan,Harold Wayne Jones,Lloyd Hollar
Description: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.
A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,John Goodman,Peter Sarsgaard,Mary Steenburgen
Description: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.
An All-American college star and his beauty queen wife watch their seemingly perfect life fall apart as their daughter joins the turmoil of '60s America.
A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.
A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.
A District Attorney is terrorized by the criminal he put away years ago when he was a cop.

Cast: Justin Chatwin,Margarita Levieva,Marcia Gay Harden,Christopher Rodriguez Marquette
Description: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

Gordon invents the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories as they actually were. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved.
A Renegade Cop is forced to work with an FBI Agent in order to bring down a group of Drug Dealers with sinister plans.

Cast: Chevy Chase,Hal Holbrook,Julianne Phillips,R. Lee Ermey
Description: After receiving an inheritance in Louisiana, Los Angeles reporter Irvin Fletcher heads to the Belle Isle plantation where he gets himself into hilarious trouble.

Cast: James Purefoy,Max von Sydow,Rachel Hurd-Wood,Pete Postlethwaite
Description: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.
The overnight stock crew of a local supermarket find themselves being stalked and slashed by a mysterious maniac.

She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.
A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.

A modern and stylish kaleidoscope of interconnected love and relationships linking characters from different cities and countries in a vivid, suspenseful and deeply moving tale of romantic life in the 21st century.
When the world's media descend on the remote Scottish island where a Hollywood actress is attempting to get married, a local girl is hired as a decoy bride to put the paparazzi off the scent.

Cast: Robert Stevenhagen,Matthew Broderick,Emma Watson,Dustin Hoffman,Tracey Ullman
Description: An unusually brave mouse helps to restore happiness to a forlorn kingdom after making friends with a gentleman rat.
A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis investigates while Secret Service works against him. He's assigned agent Chance. She eventually cooperates after a man's framed.
After the death of Lama Dorje, Tibetan Buddhist monks find three children - one American and two Nepalese - who may be the rebirth of their great teacher.
The son of a courtesan retreats into a fantasy world after being forced to end his relationship with the older woman who educated him in the ways of love.

Cast: Robert De Niro,James Franco,Frances McDormand,Eliza Dushku
Description: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murder suspect.
A news team trails a man as he travels into the world of Eden Parish to find his missing sister, where it becomes apparent that this paradise may not be as it seems.
Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.
A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.
A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

Cast: Michael Keaton,Andy Garcia,Brian Cox,Marcia Gay Harden
Description: Frank Conner is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal Peter McCabe in jail is his only savior.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Greta Gerwig,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Rhys Ifans
Description: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.

A Secret Service Agent is held captive in the trunk of a car and endures mental and physical torture as terrorists attempt to extract information for their plot against the President of the United States.
A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.
Con artist Gwen moves into Newton's empty home without his knowledge and begins setting up house, posing as his new wife.
A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.
Sold at a brothel deep in the woods to work as a caretaker, a hapless deaf girl must summon the courage to fight for her life.
An expatriate British publisher unexpectedly finds himself working for British intelligence to investigate people in Russia.

Cast: Ryan Phillippe,Tim Robbins,Rachael Leigh Cook,Claire Forlani
Description: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

Cast: Derek Luke,Michael Ealy,Laz Alonso,Omar Benson Miller
Description: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.
The Jennings' fight for their daughters life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

Cast: Rob Lowe,Kristin Davis,Fezile Mpela,John Owen Lowe
Description: Jilted by her husband on the eve of embarking on an African safari, a woman travels to the continent solo and meets an elephant conservationist.

Cast: Crispin Glover,R. Lee Ermey,Laura Harring,Jackie Burroughs
Description: A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.

Cast: Ralph Fiennes,Felicity Jones,Kristin Scott Thomas,Tom Hollander
Description: At the height of his career, Charles Dickens meets a younger woman who becomes his secret lover until his death.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Edward Burns,Kelsey Grammer,Avery Brooks
Description: A homicide detective and a fire marshal must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

Cast: Philip Seymour Hoffman,Christina Hendricks,Richard Jenkins,John Turturro
Description: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.
An Air Force pilot joins a top secret military experiment involving chimps, but begins to suspect there might be something more to the mysterious "Project X".
Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome'.

Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.
An unskilled young fairy godmother ventures out on her own to prove her worth by tracking down a young girl whose request for help was ignored.

Cast: Jude Law,Richard E. Grant,Demián Bichir,Emilia Clarke
Description: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.

Cast: Sandra Bullock,Billy Bob Thornton,Anthony Mackie,Joaquim de Almeida
Description: A battle-hardened American political consultant is sent to help re-elect a controversial president in Bolivia, where she must compete with a long-term rival working for another candidate.
After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.
A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.
After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.
A black comedy about two 19th-century grave robbers who find a lucrative business providing cadavers for an Edinburgh medical school.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Sean Penn,Demi Moore,Hoyt Axton
Description: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.
When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Lawrence Taylor,Lloyd Battista,Carlos Gómez
Description: A man must survive a prison where hardened criminals battle to the death for the wardens' entertainment.

Cast: Christopher Lambert,Mike Anscombe,Jeff J.J. Authors,Patrick Chilvers
Description: Chicago homicide detectives Prudhome and Hollingsworth are assigned to investigate a murder. Both become entangled in the plot of a serial killer whose goal is to recreate the body of Christ.
Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.
An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in television journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

Movie Name: Snow White: A Tale of Terror
Description: In this dark take on the fairy tale, the growing hatred of a noblewoman, secretly a practitioner of the dark arts, for her stepdaughter, and the witch's horrifying attempts to kill her.
Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.
A married New York cop falls for the socialite murder witness he's been assigned to protect.
An American intern at U.K. Vogue helps her friends find love.
Fake faith healer Jonas Nightingale is stranded in a small town where he finds he can't fool all of the people all of the time.
It just isn't David's day. First he gets fired at the bank, then his fiancee breaks up and throws him out of the house. The bank gets robbed and he gets shot. Twists follow.

Movie Name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
Description: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.
Erik the Viking and his men travel across the sea to find Valhalla to ask the gods to end the Age of Ragnarok.
The story of a a young man who has spent his life searching for revenge only to find himself up against a bigger challenge than he originally bargained for.
A young refugee traveling from Russia to America in search of her lost father falls for a gypsy horseman.

Cast: Rami Malek,DJ Qualls,Kate Lyn Sheil,Sukha Belle Potter
Description: A family man's chance encounter with a conspiracy-obsessed drifter leaves him on the run from the police and an impending event known as the Inversion.

Cast: David Levien,Jennifer Baxter,Dennis Hopper,Vin Diesel,Barry Pepper
Description: The wannabe sons of mobsters go to a remote town in the Midwest, and get themselves into more trouble than anyone could anticipate.
Marc, a traveling entertainer, is on his way home for Christmas when his van breaks down in the middle of a jerkwater town with some strange inhabitants.

Cast: Paul Demeyer,Christine Cavanaugh,Elizabeth Daily,Cheryl Chase,Tara Strong
Description: While on a family vacation in Paris, the Rugrats attempt to help Chuckie find a new mom while stopping his dad from marrying a conniving businesswoman who hates kids.
In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.
A young man's life is unraveled after witnessing a murder that he filmed in his rural town of Cut Bank.
Two couples from different generations confront their issues after marriage.

Cast: Rocky Morton,Dennis Quaid,Meg Ryan,Charlotte Rampling,Daniel Stern
Description: A college professor's day: his top student allegedly commits suicide, his wife presents him with divorce papers and he overnights in a freshman girl's dorm. The next day: more murders around him. Will he find the killer in time?
After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.
Sooryavanshi traces the acts and serious antics of DCP Veer Sooryavanshi, the chief of the Anti-Terrorism Squad in India.
The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.
