Cast: Mary McCormack,Rory Cochrane,Tony Perez,Scotty Noyd Jr.
Description: A dirty bomb goes off in Los Angeles, jamming freeways and spreading a toxic cloud.
The devastating reconstruction of the rape and murder of a 15-year-old Iraqi girl by American soldiers in Samarra in 2006.

A down-on-his-luck American Indian recently released from jail is offered the chance to "star" as the victim of a snuff film, the resulting pay of which could greatly help his poverty stricken family.
A nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

Miami Bici is the story of Ion and Ilie, two young people from a small dark city in Romania who go to Miami in the middle of winter, to live both the "American Dream" and the Romanian dream of "getting rich quick".

Cast: Tim Roth,Alexandra Maria Lara,Bruno Ganz,André Hennicke
Description: A love story wrapped in a mystery. Set in World War II Europe, a professor is changed by a cataclysmic event and explores the mysteries of life.

An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.
A tough, cute woman is kidnapped for ransom and brought to a rural English cottage. David and two morons have way more to worry about than her crime boss stepdad, his two Asian killers and her.

The inside story of the planning, execution, rousing aftermath, and ultimate downfall of the kidnappers of beer tycoon Alfred "Freddy" Heineken in 1983, which resulted in the largest ransom ever paid for an individual.
Arjun, an IPS officer sets out for a mission on hunting down illegal bikers involving in theft and murder.

Cast: Ralph Etter,Anna Katharina Schwabroh,Martin Rapold,Regula Grauwiller,Yangzom Brauen
Description: Dr. Laura P. takes a job on a cargo spaceship for 4 years plus 4 years back. She'll join her sister on Rhea. 44 months later, in Laura's shift, strange things happen in cargo. The crew is reanimated and the captain dies mysteriously.
Richie and Eddie, a perverted loser and his alcoholic partner-in-crime, run the worst hotel in Britain: the Guest House Paradiso.
At Oxford University, a professor and a grad student work together to try to stop a potential series of murders seemingly linked by mathematical symbols.

Cast: Callan McAuliffe,Lorraine Nicholson,Daniel Eric Gold,Clifton Collins Jr.
Description: With the help of his new friends Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft.
An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

Cast: Gael García Bernal,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Alondra Hidalgo,Diego Cataño
Description: A group of people trying to cross the border from Mexico into the United States encounter a racist man who has taken border patrol duties into his own hands.
Juvenile delinquents are sent to a small British island after a fellow prisoner's death, where they have to fight for survival.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Scott Adkins,Ivan Kaye,Valentin Teodosiu
Description: Two assassins agree to work together as one tries to avenge his wife and the other collects a reward for a job.
A futuristic Brief Encounter (1945), this is a love story in which the romance is doomed by genetic incompatibility.

Cast: Dennis Quaid,Thomas Haden Church,Sarah Jessica Parker,Elliot Page
Description: Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.
Five New Yorkers come together on Christmas Eve, seeking a miracle.

Cast: Julien Seri,Châu Belle Dinh,Williams Belle,Malik Diouf,Yann Hnautra
Description: 7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.
After mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai, Dr Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan.
Ninjitsu master Casey is back and out for revenge when his pregnant wife is murdered.

This is the story of the life of the great queen of of the steppe - legendary Tomiris. She is destined to become a skillful warrior, survive the loss of close people and unite the Scythian/Saka tribes under her authority.
A suicidal and rebellious teenager is sent to live with her grandparents for the summer, where life takes an unexpected turn.

Movie Name: The Visitors II: The Corridors of Time
Description: Knight Godefroy has to return to our time from 1023 to get back the sacred jewels that Jacquouille has taken to the 20th century.
When an Indian commercial airliner is hijacked by terrorists in the mid 1980s, a government agent is tasked with rescuing the 210 hostages.

Cast: Clémence Poésy,David Morrissey,Stephen Campbell Moore,Laura Birn
Description: A couple expecting their first child discover an unnerving difference between themselves and the couple living in the flat below them who are also having a baby.

Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great general Meng Yi, who is sworn to protect a princess named Ok-Soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.
A skilled mountaineer races against time to rescue his mute daughter from the clutches of human traffickers in Bulgaria.

Cast: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong,Gillian Chung,Jordan Chan,Eric Tsang
Description: In postwar Hong Kong, legendary Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man is reluctantly called into action once more, when what begin as simple challenges from rival kung fu styles soon draw him into ...                See full summary »
Badrinath is looking for a typical bride; Vaidehi is looking for an independent life. Together they must break with tradition and redefine their role.

Cast: Shah Rukh Khan,Aishwarya Rai Bachchan,Chandrachur Singh,Sharad S. Kapoor
Description: Max, who lives with his twin sister Shirley in Goa, is enraged when he finds out that she has fallen in love with Rahul, his bitter rival Prakash's younger brother.
A reformed gangster is released from prison and attempts to protect his family from his enemies.
David Billa builds up his drug and arms dealing empire, becoming a feared underworld boss.

After a villager unwittingly prevents a number of terrorist attacks in Chennai, a young journalist identifies and persuades him to take on the disguise of a superhero to fight terrorism and corruption.
A New York cop and his wife go on a European vacation to reinvigorate the spark in their marriage, but end up getting framed and on the run for the death of an elderly billionaire.

Cast: Sydney Sweeney,Justice Smith,Ben Hardy,Natasha Liu Bordizzo
Description: Pippa and Thomas move into their dream apartment, they notice that their windows look directly into the apartment opposite, this will set in motion a chain of events that will lead to disaster.

Cast: Margot Robbie,Rosie Perez,Mary Elizabeth Winstead,Jurnee Smollett
Description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroines Black Canary, Huntress, and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.
A take on Clive Barker's 1987 horror classic where a young woman struggling with addiction comes into possession of an ancient puzzle box, unaware that its purpose is to summon the Cenobites.

When Mr. Harrigan dies, Craig, the teen who befriended and did odd jobs for him, puts his smart phone in his pocket before burial. When the lonely youth sends his dead friend a message, he is shocked to get a return text.
MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

Movie Name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
Cast: Lucas Black,Zachery Ty Bryan,Shad Moss,Damien Marzette
Description: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.
A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.
A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.
The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.
Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Colin Farrell,Michelle Rodriguez,LL Cool J
Description: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.
A young girl institutionalized by her abusive stepfather retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.

Cast: Daniel Kinnane,Kevin James,Taylor Lautner,Rob Schneider,Jackie Sandler
Description: New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton coaches his son's 6th-grade football team while he is being suspended for the entire 2012 season as a result of his role in the Saints' Bountygate scandal.
After discovering that her boyfriend is married, Carly meets the wife he's been betraying; when yet another affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.
An ambitious young woman finds followers and fame when she poses as the survivor of a deadly attack, but she soon learns that online notoriety comes with a terrible price.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Jennifer Aniston,Debra Messing,Philip Seymour Hoffman
Description: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.
Three generations of women fight back against those who could take everything from them.
A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.

Cast: Veronika Franz,Riley Keough,Jaeden Martell,Lia McHugh,Richard Armitage
Description: A soon-to-be stepmom is snowed in with her fiancé's two children at a remote holiday village. Just as relations begin to thaw between the trio, some strange and frightening events take place.
A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

Cast: Jennifer Kluska,Andy Samberg,Selena Gomez,Kathryn Hahn,Jim Gaffigan
Description: After one experiment, Johnny turns into a monster and everyone else becomes human. Now it has to be seen whether they will be able to reverse this experiment.

Cast: Kyle Chandler,Vera Farmiga,Millie Bobby Brown,Ken Watanabe
Description: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

Cast: Lily James,Armie Hammer,Kristin Scott Thomas,Keeley Hawes
Description: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.
The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.
After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.
The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

Movie Name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Description: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

Cast: Ariel Schulman,Jamie Foxx,Joseph Gordon-Levitt,Dominique Fishback,Rodrigo Santoro
Description: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.
An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.

An inexperienced rookie is teamed up with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol in Los Angeles; the newbie officer soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist which may involve some crooked cops.
In an abandoned house in Poughkeepsie, New York murder investigators uncover hundreds of tapes showing decades of a serial killer's work.

Cast: Pierce Brosnan,Linda Hamilton,Jamie Renée Smith,Jeremy Foley
Description: A volcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second-most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long-dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

Cast: Bette Midler,Sarah Jessica Parker,Kathy Najimy,Whitney Peak
Description: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

Cast: Pollyanna McIntosh,Brandon Gerald Fuller,Lauren Ashley Carter,Chris Krzykowski
Description: When a successful country lawyer captures and attempts to "civilize" the last remaining member of a violent clan that has roamed the Northeast coast for decades, he puts the lives of his family in jeopardy.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Geena Davis,Hugh Laurie,Jonathan Lipnicki
Description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Cast: Vicky Jenson,Rob Letterman,Will Smith,Robert De Niro,Renée Zellweger,Angelina Jolie
Description: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.
A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

An American nanny is shocked that her new English family's boy is actually a life-sized doll. After she violates a list of strict rules, disturbing events make her believe that the doll is really alive.
Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

Cast: Stephen Lang,Madelyn Grace,Brendan Sexton III,Adam Young
Description: The sequel is set in the years following the initial deadly home invasion, where Norman Nordstrom lives in quiet solace until his past sins catch up to him.
A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

Movie Name: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
Description: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.
After being abandoned by his parents at the Grand Canyon, Joe Dirt tells the story of his journey to find his parents.

Cast: Sid Haig,Karen Black,Bill Moseley,Sheri Moon Zombie
Description: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

After being committed for 15 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Benicio Del Toro,Connie Nielsen,Leslie Stefanson
Description: An FBI deep-woods tracker attempts to capture a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

Cast: Peter Farrelly,Jack Black,Gwyneth Paltrow,Jason Alexander,Joe Viterelli
Description: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.
Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.
Feature adaptation of the video game where werewolves attack a small town.
Sarah, a socially isolated woman with a fondness for arts and crafts, horses, and supernatural crime shows finds her increasingly lucid dreams trickling into her waking life.

Cast: Scott Moore,Adam Devine,Alexandra Shipp,Rose Byrne,Ron Funches
Description: Phil makes top 10 pop lists at work. His only "friend" is cellphone Siri. His new phone includes AI helper Jexi, who improves/controls his social life.

Cast: Jason James Richter,Lori Petty,Michael Madsen,Jayne Atkinson
Description: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.

Cast: Lilly Wachowski,Emile Hirsch,Matthew Fox,Christina Ricci,Nicholas Elia
Description: Young driver Speed Racer aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.
A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.
Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".
Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 80,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.
When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.
During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.
An idiosyncratic general confronts opposition from enemies, allies, and bureaucrats while leading a massive rebuilding operation in Afghanistan.

Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they long for the most is a child.

Driving in the heart of the Highlands, Edmond Murray receives a call from his ex-wife, in tears. Their 7-year-old son went missing from a campsite. Soon it becomes clear that the child was kidnapped and the parents give way to despair.

Movie Name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
Description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.
A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

Cast: Isabelle Huppert,Chloë Grace Moretz,Maika Monroe,Jane Perry
Description: A young woman befriends a lonely widow who's harboring a dark and deadly agenda toward her.

Cast: Oscar Isaac,Charlotte Le Bon,Christian Bale,Daniel Giménez Cacho
Description: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.
After being announced dead and taken to a morgue, Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives, escapes from the hospital, and stalks a group of friends renting a house in the countryside near Crystal Lake.

Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?
A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

Cast: Mario Miscione,Allegra Masters,Aimee McKay,Ashley Key,Autumn Federici
Description: Held captive and faced with their imminent executions, fifty strangers are forced to choose the one person among them who deserves to live.
A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.
Accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed, Bryan Mills goes on the run and brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.
The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.
A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.
Best friends Audrey and Morgan unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of them discovers that the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.
Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.

Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.
A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.
Set in a Chicago neighborhood nearly a decade after an occupation by an extraterrestrial force, 'Captive State' explores the lives on both sides of the conflict - the collaborators and dissidents.

Cast: Paul Fisher,Bob Logan,Jackie Chan,Dave Franco,Fred Armisen,Kumail Nanjiani
Description: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

Movie Name: The Lair of the White Worm
Description: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in a foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.
When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Vanessa Williams,Christian Bale,Jeffrey Wright
Description: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.
After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

Cast: Sandra Bullock,Harry Connick Jr.,Gena Rowlands,Mae Whitman
Description: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.
A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways.
On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.
Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.
The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.
Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.
Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.

Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

Cast: Frank Grillo,Elizabeth Mitchell,Mykelti Williamson,Joseph Julian Soria
Description: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.
After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.
Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.
A group of eccentric aliens confers a human being with the power to do absolutely anything, as an experiment.
A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cupboard from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother, and a plastic Indian from his best friend, Patrick.
A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

Movie Name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
Description: Tommy Jarvis exhumes Jason Voorhees to cremate his corpse, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can stop him.

Movie Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Cast: Mike Mitchell,Tom Kenny,Antonio Banderas,Bill Fagerbakke,Clancy Brown
Description: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Al Pacino,Carla Gugino,50 Cent
Description: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.
Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

Cast: Àlex Pastor,Chris Pine,Piper Perabo,Lou Taylor Pucci,Emily VanCamp
Description: As a lethal virus spreads globally, four friends seek a reputed plague-free haven. But while avoiding the infected, the travelers turn on one another.
A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

Shale's Mercenary team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes a substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

Movie Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
Description: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

Cast: Christopher George,Lynda Day George,Frank Braña,Edmund Purdom
Description: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.

Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.

Cast: Jason Scott Lee,Cary Elwes,Lena Headey,Sam Neill
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.
A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross-country, with help from a girl they meet, to compete in the ultimate video-game championship.

A reporter's dream of becoming a news anchor is compromised after a one-night stand leaves her stranded in downtown L.A. without a phone, car, ID or money - and only 8 hours to make it to the most important job interview of her life.
A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.
The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.
Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

Cast: Kurt Russell,Jason Scott Lee,Jason Isaacs,Connie Nielsen
Description: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

Movie Name: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
Description: Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.
A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy.
A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.
A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him but will also do anything to get it back.

An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

Cast: Rutger Hauer,Kim Cattrall,Alastair Duncan,Michael J. Pollard
Description: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.
Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.
An urban couple goes camping in the woods and find themselves lost in the territory of a predatory black bear.
Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.
With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

Movie Name: True History of the Kelly Gang
Description: Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang flee from authorities during the 1870s.

Cast: Ray Stevenson,David Oakes,Aura Garrido,Winslow M. Iwaki
Description: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.
A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.
An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

Movie Name: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
Description: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.

Cast: Dennis Quaid,Billy Bob Thornton,Emilio Echevarría,Jason Patric
Description: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.
A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

Jordan White and Amy Blue, two troubled teens, pick up an adolescent drifter, Xavier Red. Together, the threesome embark on a sex-and-violence-filled journey through an America of psychos and quickie marts.
Ryan Harrison is framed for murder and must prove himself innocent by finding a mysterious one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged man after escaping from a bus accident on the way to jail.

Cast: Mark Levin,Jodie Foster,Gerard Butler,Abigail Breslin,Michael Carman
Description: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.
An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Movie Name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
Description: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.
The equally strait-laced and "by-the-book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.
Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.
A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

Cast: Miguel Ferrer,Julie Entwisle,Dan Monahan,Michael H. Moss
Description: A reporter is on the trail of a vampiric murderer who travels by plane.

Cast: Sean Connery,Lorraine Bracco,José Wilker,Rodolfo De Alexandre
Description: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.

An ex-CIA agent and his estranged daughter are forced on the run when his employers erase all records of his existence, and mark them both for termination as part of a wide-reaching international conspiracy.

A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.
Three macabre tales from the latest issue of a boy's favorite comic book, dealing with a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and an undying hitchhiker.
In an emotionless utopia, two people fall in love when they regain their feelings from a mysterious disease, causing tensions between them and their society.
A daughter, mother and grandmother are haunted by a manifestation of dementia that consumes their family's home.

Cast: Antonio Banderas,Birgitte Hjort Sørensen,Dylan McDermott,Melanie Griffith
Description: Human race is at edge of the end. Robot race is at edge of the beginning.
American seminary student Michael Kovak travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

Cast: Sam Claflin,Max Irons,Douglas Booth,Jessica Brown Findlay
Description: Two first-year students at Oxford University join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single evening.
A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

Movie Name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
Description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

Movie Name: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
Description: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she'd ever dreamed of having.
A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.
In the wake of a disaster that wipes out most of civilization, two men and a young woman find themselves in an emotionally charged love triangle as the last known survivors.
A young divorcee is getting her life back together by moving into an apartment. But what will she do when a strange person repeatedly calls her, and threatens to change her new life around?
A killer dressed in a police uniform begins murdering innocent people on the streets of New York City.
A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

Cast: Colin Chilvers,Michael Jackson,Joe Pesci,Sean Lennon,Kelley Parker
Description: Anthology movie by, and starring, Michael Jackson in his prime, combining a number of music videos from his bestselling "Bad" album with a fantasy tale of Michael's confrontation with a ruthless drug dealer known as Mr. Big.
A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.
A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.
After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.
Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.
Kids left home alone accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

Cast: Melissa Sue Anderson,Glenn Ford,Lawrence Dane,Sharon Acker
Description: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

Movie Name: To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You
Description: Lara Jean and Peter have just taken their relationship from pretend to officially official when another recipient of one of her old love letters enters the picture.

Cast: Jason Eisener,Gareth Evans,Gregg Hale,Eduardo Sánchez,Timo Tjahjanto,Adam Wingard,Lawrence Michael Levine,Kelsy Abbott,Adam Wingard,Hannah Hughes
Description: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.
A rookie high school football coach has a harder time than she expected trying to whip her tough inner city team into shape.

Cast: Billy Crystal,Bette Midler,Marisa Tomei,Tom Everett Scott
Description: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

Cast: Javier Abad,Marcos Martínez,Dwayne Johnson,Seann William Scott,Jessica Biel,Justin Long
Description: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.
After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talk show talent scout writes a column on the relationship habits of men which gains her national fame.

Cast: Steve Saint Leger,Guy Pearce,Maggie Grace,Peter Stormare,Vincent Regan
Description: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the President's daughter from an outer-space prison taken over by violent inmates.

Movie Name: Father of the Bride Part II
Description: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.
A confused teenager writes a blog revealing her daily activities and secrets, advised to do so by her high school guidance counselor in lieu of moving onto her first year in college.

Cast: Anders Danielsen Lie,Golshifteh Farahani,Denis Lavant,Sigrid Bouaziz
Description: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

Cast: Alec Baldwin,John Lone,Penelope Ann Miller,Peter Boyle
Description: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

Cast: Simon Wells,Dick Zondag,Ralph Zondag,John Goodman,Charles Fleischer,Blaze Berdahl,Rhea Perlman
Description: A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.

Movie Name: I Could Never Be Your Woman
Description: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

Cast: Tom Everett Scott,Mark-Paul Gosselaar,Poppy Montgomery,Lochlyn Munro
Description: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.
The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

Cast: Dennis Widmyer,Alex Essoe,Amanda Fuller,Noah Segan,Fabianne Therese
Description: A hopeful young starlet uncovers the ominous origins of the Hollywood elite and enters into a deadly agreement in exchange for fame and fortune.

Cast: Mark Wahlberg,Lou Diamond Phillips,Christina Applegate,Avery Brooks
Description: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.
Kate Pierce, now a cynical teen, is unexpectedly reunited with Santa Claus when a mysterious troublemaker threatens to cancel Christmas - forever.
A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.
A nurse falls in love with a terminally ill man.
A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.
A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.
A doctor, who is travelling to see his estranged son, sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.
Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.
The oncologist wife of a prominent child psychologist suspects her husband has an unhealthy scientific obsession with their child, unaware of what - or who - is really going on inside his head.

Cheech and Chong live in a decrepit old house and drive their neighbour crazy with their loud music, weed smoking and general anarchy and slacker view on life. Then Chong meets Cheech's Texan cousin Red and things kick up a notch.

Cast: Scott Bakula,Kevin J. O'Connor,J. Trevor Edmond,Daniel von Bargen
Description: A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas - forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones. But they soon discover that no one is safe in this new world, and with civilization falling apart around them, the only people they can truly rely on are each other.

Movie Name: How to Be a Latin Lover
Description: Finding himself dumped after twenty-five years of marriage, a man who made a career of seducing rich older women must move in with his estranged sister, where he begins to learn the value of family.
To stop an elusive criminal, a maverick detective enlists the aid of a police dog who's an unusually intelligent smart alec.

Cast: John Cusack,Billy Bob Thornton,Cate Blanchett,Angelina Jolie
Description: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.
Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

Cast: Nicole Kidman,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Flora Cross,Zane Pais
Description: Margot and her son Claude decide to visit her sister Pauline after she announces that she is marrying less-than-impressive Malcolm.
In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.

Cast: Edward Furlong,Frank Langella,T. Ryder Smith,Amy Hargreaves
Description: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.
After a freak accident, a company executive turns completely invisible, goes on the run and becomes hunted by a treacherous CIA official, whilst trying to cope with his new reality.

A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.

Cast: Ioan Gruffudd,Dakota Blue Richards,Tim Curry,Juliet Stevenson
Description: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.
A man searches the world for a set of mystic artifacts. The twelve bronze heads of the animals from the Chinese zodiac.

Cast: Tiger Hu Chen,Keanu Reeves,Karen Mok,Hai Yu
Description: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.
A writer's fictional alter ego wants to take over his life...at any price.
A journalist investigates a series of murders near American-owned factories on the border of Juarez and El Paso.

Cast: George Clooney,Renée Zellweger,John Krasinski,David de Vries
Description: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

A tournament is watched by dozens of wealthy men betting on which one of the 30 assassins will survive the next 24 hours "kill or die" and claim the USD10,000,000 prize. It takes place in an English town with plenty of CCTVs.
A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.
A holistic medicine practitioner attends a wealthy client's dinner party after her car breaks down.

Cast: Melanie Papalia,David Schlachtenhaufen,Adam Shapiro,Anna Margaret Hollyman
Description: While studying the habits of web cam chat users from the apparent safety of her own home, a young woman's life begins to spiral out of control after witnessing a grisly murder online.

Cast: Björn Stein,Julianne Moore,Jonathan Rhys Meyers,Jeffrey DeMunn,Frances Conroy
Description: A forensic psychiatrist discovers that all but one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.
A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.
A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

Ninety-six hours before the World War II invasion of Normandy, British Prime Minister Winston Churchill struggles with his severe reservations with Operation Overlord and his increasingly marginalized role in the war effort.
At her new job in a rundown children's hospital, a nurse desperately tries to keep her patients safe from a plague of random, mysterious attacks.

Cast: Michael Haigney,Veronica Taylor,Rica Matsumoto,Ikue Ôtani,Unshô Ishizuka
Description: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.
While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation that involves his former mistress and his driver.

Jim, an average New Yorker, lives with a sick but loving wife. Suddenly, everything changes when the economy crashes and causes him to lose everything. Filled with anger and rage, Jim goes to seek revenge for the life taken from him.

Cast: Christopher Walken,Joseph McKenna,Wynn Everett,Patricia B. Till
Description: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.

Cast: Ari Graynor,Lauren Miller Rogen,Justin Long,James Wolk
Description: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.
Three radical environmentalists look to execute the protest of their lives: the explosion of a hydroelectric dam.
Competing in a Christmas baking competition in Belgravia, a Chicago baker bumps into the prince's fiancée--who looks just like her. They switch lives for two days.

Cast: Dan Bush,Jacob Gentry,Anessa Ramsey,Justin Welborn,Scott Poythress,Sahr Ngaujah
Description: A horror film told in three parts, from three perspectives, in which a mysterious transmission that turns people into killers invades every cell phone, radio, and television.

Cast: Jackie Chan,Shu Qi,Tony Chiu-Wai Leung,Emil Chau
Description: A romantic girl travels to Hong Kong in search of certain love but instead meets a kind-hearted professional fighter for whom she begins to fall instead.
A group of men, heading to a remote village to help one of their friends get over his divorce, soon discover that all the women have been infected with a virus that makes them man-hating cannibals.
A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

Cast: Shah Rukh Khan,Rani Mukerji,Amitabh Bachchan,Abhishek Bachchan
Description: Dev, a former football player is married to Rhea, a successful fashion editor. Maya is a kindergarten teacher who is married to Rishi, an outgoing event planner. These couples' lives intersect and they each question their own marriage.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Joe Flanigan,Anna-Louise Plowman,Charlotte Beaumont
Description: An ex-mercenary known for finding missing children is hired by a mixed martial arts fighter whose daughter has been kidnapped.
Two teenage assassins accept what they think will be a quick-and-easy job, until an unexpected target throws them off their plan.
A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

Cast: Jesper Møller,Roger Carel,Lorànt Deutsch,Sara Forestier,Jacques Frantz
Description: The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?
A timid Jayesh must defy his patriarchal family as he flees with his wife to save their unborn daughter from foeticide.
A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

A portrait of the broken lives of four people (a vigilante detective, a worried parent, an awkward man looking for love and a suicidal artist) as they all struggle to cope in their religiously-dystopian city.
Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.
A mysterious building is the gateway to infinite parallel Earths.
Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

Cast: Demi Moore,Henry Ian Cusick,Nicholas Gleaves,James Cosmo
Description: Rachel Carlson, a successful novelist moves to a small Scottish village to move on with her life after the death of her son. Strange things start to happen when she is haunted by ghosts and real life terror.

Cast: Chris Pine,Anjali Jay,Eddie Kaye Thomas,Jennifer Alden
Description: A young blind man (Pine) thinks he's found love with an Indian woman (Jay) though their relationship is fraught with cultural differences.
Two miles into the earth, nine Appalachian miners struggle to survive after a methane explosion leaves them with one hour of oxygen.

Cast: Billy Burke,Christian Slater,Crispin Glover,Michael Jai White
Description: Set in 1974, a pair of '60s radicals rely on their bomb-making skills on their way to becoming capitalists.
A cute med student starts a summer course at Heidelberg University. David's on her dissection table. She met him the day before on the train. Something's wrong.
Asim Noyan swindles people with his lies and games. Asim Noyan and his gang, who no one else has been able to catch, gets into a ruse again.
A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

Cast: Ryan Phillippe,Sarah Polley,Piper Perabo,Robert Sean Leonard
Description: An amnesiac discovers himself leaping through time between 2000 and 2002 as his past returns to him.

Cast: Yagmur Taylan,Engin Günaydin,Haluk Bilginer,Binnur Kaya,Öner Erkan
Description: The story of Aziz through an existential crisis longing for his youth: he is not happy with his work nor his private life, which is hijacked by his sister and her family, who have been living with him for some time now.
Set against the pulsating backdrop of rustic North India, Love Hostel traces the volatile journey of a spirited young couple, being hunted by a ruthless mercenary.
Live-action sci-fi movie based on a 1973 Japanese animé of the same name (Shinzo Ningen Casshân). Theme song by Utada Hikaru.
A smooth and charming conman, Ricky Bahl, cons girls for a living but finally meets his match is this fun-filled "ROM-CON."

Cast: Jet Li,Ching Wan Lau,Karen Mok,Françoise Yip
Description: A survivor of a supersoldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero.
Three bachelors who are compulsive womanizers find their lives turned upside down when a baby is left at their doorstep. The trio suspect each other of being the father.
A grave robber reflects on his life of crime.

Cast: Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh,Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh,Daniel Kaleb,Flora Saini,Jayshree Soni
Description: Guru Ji is a social reformer who works to help people fight against social evils.

Cast: Bruno Samper,Raffiella Chapman,Eddie Marsan,Rosy McEwen,Richard Brake
Description: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.
A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.
After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Esther travels to America by impersonating the missing daughter of a wealthy family.

Humans adapt to a synthetic environment, with new transformations and mutations. With his partner Caprice, Saul Tenser, celebrity performance artist, publicly showcases the metamorphosis of his organs in avant-garde performances.
After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.
A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.
Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

Cast: Freddie Prinze Jr.,Rachael Leigh Cook,Matthew Lillard,Paul Walker
Description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

Cast: Thomas Jane,Saffron Burrows,Samuel L. Jackson,Jacqueline McKenzie
Description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.
Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.
In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.
Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold, leading to their mysterious disappearance.

Nick Bannister, a private investigator of the mind, navigates the alluring world of the past when his life is changed by new client Mae. A simple case becomes an obsession after she disappears and he fights to learn the truth about her.
In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.
A father's coming to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding through the prism of multiple relationships within a big, sprawling Cuban-American clan.
When Earth is on the verge of an alien invasion, five teenagers, who are infused with superhuman abilities, must harness their newfound powers to battle this threat - as the Power Rangers.
A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.
Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

Cast: Joey King,Jacob Elordi,Joel Courtney,Megan du Plessis
Description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.
Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.
A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.
With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

Cast: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II,Teyonah Parris,Nathan Stewart-Jarrett,Colman Domingo
Description: A sequel to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.

Cast: Sam Neill,William H. Macy,Téa Leoni,Alessandro Nivola
Description: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

Cast: Keri Russell,Jesse Plemons,Jeremy T. Thomas,Graham Greene
Description: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with an ancestral creature.
A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

Cast: Hilary Duff,Chad Michael Murray,Jennifer Coolidge,Dan Byrd
Description: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Samantha Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

Cast: Peter Farrelly,Owen Wilson,Jason Sudeikis,Christina Applegate,Jenna Fischer
Description: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

Cast: Vin Diesel,Rose Leslie,Elijah Wood,Ólafur Darri Ólafsson
Description: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.
A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Zac Efron,Zoey Deutch,Aubrey Plaza
Description: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

Movie Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
Description: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies: the mutant thugs Bebop and Rocksteady and the alien being Krang.
A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.
When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.
A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.
A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.
Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

Movie Name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
Description: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

Cast: Cary Murnion,Lulu Wilson,Kevin James,Joel McHale,Robert Maillet
Description: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a troubled, recently-arrested man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

Cast: Steven Kostanski,Aaron Poole,Kenneth Welsh,Ellen Wong,Kathleen Munroe
Description: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.
Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.
A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.
Young newlyweds find out just how unprepared they are for their future together.
Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.
Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

Cast: Ian Nelms,Mel Gibson,Walton Goggins,Marianne Jean-Baptiste,Chance Hurstfield
Description: A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.

Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she's still alive. Police, parents and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

Cast: Musa Muhammed Olayinka,Salman Khan,Katrina Kaif,Anupriya Goenka,Kumud Mishra
Description: When a group of Indian and Pakistani nurses are held hostage in Iraq by a terrorist organization, a secret agent is drawn out of hiding to rescue them.

Cast: Penélope Cruz,Edgar Ramírez,Gael García Bernal,Ana de Armas
Description: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.
Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.
Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?
A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.
A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.
A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.
A young girl's love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.

In a small town in Arizona, a mysterious man/spirit descends from the sky and manifests in a sports car and targets a local violent road-racing gang of motor heads, headed by a ruthless bully who'll do anything to get what he wants.
When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, 2 would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.
After a car accident, a young woman caught between life and death meets a funeral director who claims to have the gift of transitioning the dead into the afterlife.

Cast: Sarah Michelle Gellar,Jason Behr,Clea DuVall,William Mapother
Description: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.
A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn baby is narrated through voice-over.
Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.
A troupe of hilariously self-obsessed theater stars swarm into a small conservative Indiana town in support of a high-school girl who wants to take her girlfriend to the prom.
While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll.

Movie Name: The Last House on the Left
Cast: Sandra Peabody,Lucy Grantham,David Hess,Fred J. Lincoln
Description: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.

At an isolated frontier outpost, a colonial magistrate suffers a crisis of conscience when an army colonel arrives looking to interrogate the locals about an impending uprising, using cruel tactics that horrify the magistrate.
Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.
The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

After he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their special guests, a rising executive questions the merits of his invitation just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.
Alice, an ambitious camgirl, wakes up one day to discover she's been replaced on her show with an exact replica of herself.
Death returns to claim the lucky survivors of a deadly bridge collapse in this fifth frightening installment in the series.

A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

Cast: Tom Cruise,Lea Thompson,Craig T. Nelson,Charles Cioffi
Description: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.
The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.
An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.
Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.
When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.
A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.
A suburban couple becomes embroiled in an international espionage plot when they discover that their seemingly perfect new neighbors are government spies.

Movie Name: Return of the Living Dead III
Cast: Kent McCord,James T. Callahan,Sarah Douglas,Melinda Clarke
Description: Having recently witnessed the horrific results of a top secret project to bring the dead back to life, a distraught youth performs the operation on his girlfriend after she's killed in a motorcycle accident.
A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
A mother stops at nothing to recover her kidnapped son.
Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Billy Crystal,Lisa Kudrow,Joe Viterelli
Description: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.
Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

Cast: Natasha Calis,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Kyra Sedgwick,Madison Davenport
Description: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.
In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

Movie Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
Description: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.
Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.
A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

A rogue Multiverse agent goes on a manhunt for alternate versions of himself, getting stronger with each kill. Only the last version of himself, an LASD cop, can stop his crusade before he becomes "The One".
Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.
A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child whom dark forces want to eliminate.
A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

Cast: Will Speck,Jason Bateman,Olivia Munn,T.J. Miller,Jennifer Aniston
Description: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...
Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

Cast: Sacha Baron Cohen,Gustaf Hammarsten,Clifford Bañagale,Chibundu Orukwowu
Description: Flamboyant and gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.

Cast: Ryan Guzman,Briana Evigan,Adam Sevani,Misha Gabriel Hamilton
Description: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

Cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.,Gerald McRaney,David Oyelowo,Andre Royo
Description: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.
As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.
Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.
A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.
A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

Cast: Rebel Wilson,Liam Hemsworth,Adam Devine,Priyanka Chopra Jonas
Description: A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.
A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.
Despite Jigsaw's death, and in order to save the lives of two of his colleagues, Lieutenant Rigg is forced to take part in a new game, which promises to test him to the limit.
Four teenagers visit a local carnival for a night of innocent amusement, but soon discover that nothing there is innocent or amusing.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Dakota Fanning,Famke Janssen,Elisabeth Shue
Description: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.

Movie Name: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Cast: Biff Yeager,Kristi Somers,Richard Blade,Ian Michael Giatti
Description: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

Cast: Alan Canvan,Bruce Lee,Bruce Lee,Gig Young,Dean Jagger,Hugh O'Brian
Description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.
Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Mia Sara,Ron Silver,Bruce McGill
Description: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.
Charley Brewster and Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.
While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.
A gang of ruthless highway killers kidnap a wealthy couple traveling cross country only to shockingly discover that things are not what they seem.
Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.
A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.
When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.
A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.
After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice, Ahsoka Tano, must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.
A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

Cast: Daniel Radcliffe,James McAvoy,Jessica Brown Findlay,Andrew Scott
Description: Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein became the man - and the legend - we know today.

Cast: Eva Bourne,Michael J Rogers,Scott Hylands,Rondel Reynoldson
Description: Despite being under heavy sedation, a young woman tries to make her way out of the Arboria Institute, a secluded, quasifuturistic commune.
Three college students base their class project around gossip and how fast it spreads, which soon spirals out of control.
A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.
