Description: An over-the-hill hitman faces off against a younger clone of himself.

In the weeks following an apocalyptic event, a husband and wife venture across the countryside inhabited by deadly factions in search of safety, and must work together as they are pushed to the breaking point in order to survive.

Cast: Peter Spierig,Matt Passmore,Tobin Bell,Callum Keith Rennie,Hannah Emily Anderson
Description: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

Cast: Seth Rogen,Rose Byrne,Zac Efron,Chloë Grace Moretz
Description: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity that lived there before, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.
Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.
A newlywed couple finds their lake-country honeymoon descend into chaos after Paul finds Bea wandering and disoriented in the middle of the night.
An obsessed cop is on the trail of a serial killer prowling the streets of Buffalo, N.Y. but when his teenage daughter disappears, he drops any professional restraint to get the killer.

When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

Cast: Dennis Widmyer,Jason Clarke,Amy Seimetz,John Lithgow,Jeté Laurence
Description: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.
Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.
Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.
An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.
A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.
On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.
An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.
A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.
A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

Movie Name: Return of the Living Dead II
Cast: James Karen,Thom Mathews,Michael Kenworthy,Thor Van Lingen
Description: Curious kids unearth the barrels that previously helped revive the dead, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

Cast: Chris Farley,Matthew Perry,Bokeem Woodbine,Barry Del Sherman
Description: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.
A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.
Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...
A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

Cast: Louise Fletcher,Victoria Tennant,Kristy Swanson,Jeb Stuart Adams
Description: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

Cast: Cary Murnion,Elijah Wood,Rainn Wilson,Alison Pill,Jack McBrayer
Description: A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.
As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

Cast: Mario Casas,Déborah François,Guillermo Pfening,Maria Rodríguez Soto
Description: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

Cast: Evangeline Lilly,Owen Atlas,Adam Scott,Marcus Terrell Smith
Description: Gary, who has just married Samantha, the woman of his dreams, discovers that her six-year-old son may be the Antichrist.
Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home where the terror began.

Movie Name: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
Description: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.
Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Cast: Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Famke Janssen,Cush Jumbo,Joachim Król
Description: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

Cast: Melissa Joan Hart,Adrian Grenier,Stephen Collins,Mark Metcalf
Description: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?
A group of students go to the location of the infamous Dyatlov pass incident to make a documentary, but things take a turn for the worse as the secret of what happened there is revealed.
A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.
A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.
Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.
An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.
Desperate to help her ailing brother, a young woman unknowingly agrees to compete in a deadly game of "Would You Rather," hosted by a sadistic aristocrat.
Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

Cast: Gina Carano,Cam Gigandet,Ismael Cruz Cordova,Danny Trejo
Description: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

Cast: Kristen Bell,Odette Annable,Sigourney Weaver,Jamie Lee Curtis
Description: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

Cast: Dominic Cooper,Samuel L. Jackson,Gloria Reuben,Ryan Robbins
Description: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.
A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.
A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.
A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.
A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

Cast: Espen Sandberg,Penélope Cruz,Salma Hayek,Steve Zahn,Dwight Yoakam
Description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

Cast: Paolo Strippoli,Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz,Francesco Russo,Peppino Mazzotta,Will Merrick
Description: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.
A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.
Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.
Rachel tries to spice up her marriage with a trip to a strip club. She befriends McKenna who gave her a lapdance. She moves in with Rachel's family and becomes a nanny for the son.

After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.
A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

Cast: John David Washington,Boyd Holbrook,Vicky Krieps,Alicia Vikander
Description: Following a tragic car accident in Greece, an American tourist finds himself at the center of a dangerous political conspiracy and on the run for his life.
Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

Cast: Denise Black,Gabriel Cartade,Ray Fearon,Mark Anthony Brighton
Description: Two stories separated by 1400 years. After losing his mother in the midst of a war-torn country, an Iraqi child, learns the importance and power of patience by discovering the historical story of Lady Fatima and her suffering.

A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.
A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.

The story of former Hollywood star Grace Kelly's crisis of marriage and identity, during a political dispute between Monaco's Prince Rainier III and France's Charles De Gaulle, and a looming French invasion of Monaco in the early 1960s.

Cast: Jonathan Lipnicki,Rollo Weeks,Richard E. Grant,Jim Carter
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.
A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Cast: Akshay Kumar,Rakul Preet Singh,Sargun Mehta,Chandrachur Singh
Description: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.
Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.
A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.
The apocalypse proves a blessing in disguise for one lucky recluse -- until a second survivor arrives with the threat of companionship.
A husband and wife will stop at nothing to find their missing daughter, who disappeared on a family camping trip. When the police don't have any leads, the duo takes over.

Cast: Michael J. Reynolds,Shauna Macdonald,Jessika Williams,Douglas Hodge
Description: Refusing to believe her story about cave-dwelling monsters, the sole survivor of a spelunking exploration gone horribly wrong is forced to follow the authorities back into the caves where something awaits.
A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

Cast: Kate Capshaw,Lea Thompson,Kelly Preston,Larry B. Scott
Description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.
A loving father finds a clown suit for his son's birthday party, only to realize that it's cursed.
A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.
A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

Cast: Sam Worthington,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Chloë Grace Moretz,Jessica Chastain
Description: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.
A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.
The unconventional love story of an aspiring actress, her ambitious driver, and their eccentric boss, the legendary billionaire Howard Hughes.

A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.
After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington, D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

Movie Name: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
Description: A legendary American war veteran is recruited to hunt a mythical creature.
Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.
A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.
A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.
A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.
A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Robert Guillaume,Cynthia Gibb,George Dickerson
Description: In a violent and corrupt prison, decorated cop Louis Burke must infiltrate the jail to find answers to a number of inside murders. What he finds is a struggle of life and death tied in to his own past.
Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.
A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.

A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.
A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.

Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?

Cast: Danny DeVito,Bette Midler,Neve Campbell,Jamie Lee Curtis
Description: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

Anna suffers from agoraphobia so crippling that when a trio of criminals break into her house, she cannot bring herself to flee. But what the intruders don't realize is that agoraphobia is not her only problem.
An employee at a weapons factory discovers that an energy drink turns his co-workers into zombies.
A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.
A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

Cast: Frank Grillo,Stuart F. Wilson,Buster Reeves,Christian Cooke
Description: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

Cast: Charlton Heston,Karen Black,George Kennedy,Efrem Zimbalist Jr.
Description: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.
A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.
A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

Cast: Kevin Hart,Gabrielle Union,Wendi McLendon-Covey,La La Anthony
Description: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.
Two scientists who are hopeless with the opposite sex experiment with a substance that makes them irresistible to anyone who hears them speak.

Cast: Evan Rachel Wood,Elijah Kelley,Kristin Chenoweth,Maya Rudolph
Description: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

Cast: Jamie Lee Curtis,Ron Silver,Clancy Brown,Elizabeth Peña
Description: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.
Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.
The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.
A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

Cast: Denzel Washington,Whitney Houston,Courtney B. Vance,Gregory Hines
Description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

Movie Name: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
Description: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London borough of Croydon.

Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.
The owner of an historic South Side Chicago barbershop is pressured to sell out to a land developer, but must face the impact this would have on his close-knit community.
An art curator decides to seek revenge on his abusive boss by conning him into buying a fake Monet, but his plan requires the help of an eccentric and unpredictable Texas rodeo queen.

Cast: Christina Hendricks,Iain De Caestecker,Matt Smith,Saoirse Ronan
Description: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.
Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Rosanna Arquette,Kieran Culkin,Ted Levine
Description: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

Movie Name: Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland
Description: When the Dean of Blue Mountain State threatens to sell the Goat House, Alex throws Thad the party of his dreams in an effort to get him to buy it.

Movie Name: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
Description: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.
A blind musician hears a murder committed in the apartment upstairs from hers that sends her down a dark path into London's gritty criminal underworld.
A family who moved into a remote mill house in Ireland finds themselves in a fight for survival with demonic creatures living in the woods.

Cast: Michael Pitt,Lukas Haas,Asia Argento,Scott Patrick Green
Description: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.
A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his classmates -- with him at the center.
An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.
A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

Cast: Kenneth Branagh,Embeth Davidtz,Robert Downey Jr.,Daryl Hannah
Description: A lawyer uses his power to help his lover put her father behind bars, but when he escapes, they are all in danger.

Cast: Diogo Morgado,Amber Rose Revah,Greg Hicks,Adrian Schiller
Description: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.
Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.
Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

Movie Name: The Man with One Red Shoe
Description: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.
An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
A clown comes back from the dead to haunt those who took his life during a fatal party mishap.
Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.
Set in a near future, technology-reliant society that pits man against killing machines.
In the cold, wintery fields of New England, a lonely old house wakes up every thirty years - and demands a sacrifice.
A perpetually angry man is informed he has 90 minutes to live and promptly sets out to reconcile with his family and friends in the short time he has left.
When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit who has been trapped for 18 years.

Cast: Jaden Michael,Gerald Jones,Gregory Diaz IV,Sarah Gadon
Description: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

Cast: Caity Lotz,Casper Van Dien,Mark Steger,Agnes Bruckner
Description: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death and the disappearance of her sister, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.

Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.
Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.
A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.
At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.

A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?
Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

Cast: Tom Montgomery,Tadao Takashima,Kenji Sahara,Yû Fujiki,Michael Keith
Description: A UN reporter broadcasts a report on the appearance of a prehistoric monster that emerges from hibernation while a pharmaceutical company seeks publicity with a monster of their own. (US Version)
A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

A hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl whom he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.
The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.
Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes 10 people's lives forever.

Cast: Robert Pulcini,Kristen Wiig,Annette Bening,Matt Dillon,Darren Criss
Description: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.
After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.

UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

A horror-thriller centered on a woman living with "face-blindness" after surviving a serial killer's attack. As she lives with her condition, one in which facial features change each time she loses sight of them, the killer closes in.
After poor advice from a psychic leads to the death of his wife, a man vows to disprove the existence of the paranormal by allowing himself to be possessed by demons.
An ex-con is used by police to lure a criminal out of hiding.

To be the CEO, an heiress is challenged by her dad to deliver a Christmas letter in person to his ex-partner in their hometown - traveling by bus, incognito and with only $100. Will she learn something from the people there?
An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?
Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.
With his career on the skids, a Hollywood screenwriter enlists the aid of a modern-day muse, who proves to test his patience.

In Istanbul, terrorists abduct executives, blow-up the car of a journalist and plan five great attacks to the city. The violent police officer Firat Baran interrogates a terrorist and ...                See full summary »
The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.
Following the loss of his family, a man attempts suicide only to discover upon waking that he can identify people who are about to die
A gang of bank robbers hide their loot in the car of a family going camping. They chase down the family to kill them and get the loot back, but run into a fight.
Two friends lose their jobs, then part bitterly after they get exposed as male strippers.
A group of people who feel betrayed by their government and let down by their Police force form a modern-day outlaw posse in order to right what they see as the wrongs of society.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Stephen Rea,Selina Giles,Mark Dymond
Description: Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.

Cast: Kat Graham,Quincy Brown,Ethan Peck,Ron Cephas Jones
Description: A struggling but talented photographer inherits an antique holiday advent calendar, the contents of which seem to predict the future. Will this magical calendar lead her to love this holiday season?
A comic caper about Happy Singh, a Punjabi villager who goes through a series of misadventures and eventually becomes the King of the Australian underworld.
Two long-distance best friends change each other's lives when she decides to pursue a lifelong dream and he volunteers to keep an eye on her teenage son.

Cast: Chris Pratt,Bryce Dallas Howard,Laura Dern,Sam Neill
Description: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.
Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

Cast: Qui Nguyen,Jake Gyllenhaal,Jaboukie Young-White,Gabrielle Union,Dennis Quaid
Description: The legendary Clades are a family of explorers whose differences threaten to topple their latest and most crucial mission.
Will's soon-to-be ex-wife mysteriously vanishes at a gas station. He delves into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time to find her.
A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.
Fifteen years after her happily ever after, Giselle questions her happiness, inadvertently turning the lives of those in the real world and Andalasia upside down in the process.

Cast: Jenna Kanell,Samantha Scaffidi,David Howard Thornton,Catherine Corcoran
Description: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.
A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon.
While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.
Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.
A weekend getaway to Croatia that goes awry when a woman is accused of killing her best friend. As she attempts to clear her name and uncover the truth, her efforts unearth a painful secret.

Cast: Mark Wahlberg,Nicola Peltz Beckham,Jack Reynor,Stanley Tucci
Description: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.
This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.
Twin brothers arrive at their mother's house and begin to suspect that something isn't right.
When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.
Two men named Charlie Hinton and Phil Ryerson get laid off and have to become stay-at-home fathers when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day care center.
Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.

A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.
Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

A cop killed by his own partner joins RIPD, an afterlife law enforcement department working to apprehend various monsters disguised as humans living on earth, and gets paired up with a smart-mouthed veteran.
Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.
Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

Cast: Matthew McConaughey,Sarah Jessica Parker,Kathy Bates,Terry Bradshaw
Description: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.
After fooling around with one of her customers, a teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys.
A bouncer with a slightly murderous anger-management problem that she controls with the help of an electrode-lined vest she uses to shock herself back to normalcy whenever she gets homicidal.

When a strong-willed princess refuses to wed the cruel sociopath, she is kidnapped and locked in a remote tower of her father’s castle. With her vindictive suitor intent on taking her father’s throne, the princess must save the kingdom.

Cast: Anna Kendrick,Daniel Dae Kim,Shamier Anderson,Toni Collette
Description: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the lives of everyone on board.

Cast: Daniel Doheny,Geraldine Viswanathan,Sadie Calvano,Luke Spencer Roberts
Description: When a group of teenage friends go on a spring break camping trip, an unfortunate accident sets off a race against time to save their friend's most prized possession.
Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.
When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves his house, fortune, and his prized collection of ghosts.
Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.
Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.
Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.
The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.
Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

Cast: Jeffrey Wright,Alexander Skarsgård,James Badge Dale,Riley Keough
Description: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the mother of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate her son in the Alaskan wilderness.
A writer indulging in all that Los Angeles and Las Vegas have to offer, undertakes a search for love and self via a series of adventures with six different women.

A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fiancé dumps her.
A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiancés at the altar.
A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.
The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

Movie Name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Description: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.
A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.

Cast: Marc Silverstein,Amy Schumer,Michelle Williams,Emily Ratajkowski,Tom Hopper
Description: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

Movie Name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
Description: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.
An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

Cast: Robert Downey Jr.,Antonio Banderas,Michael Sheen,Jim Broadbent
Description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.
Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.
Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" Elizabeth Short murder investigation.
After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a 'big-rig' ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen lake to save the trapped miners.
Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Geoffrey Lewis,Alonna Shaw,Corinna Everson
Description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.
This is the story of Shiva who sets out in search of love and self-discovery. During his journey, he has to face many evil forces that threaten our existence.
When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

When his parents must go out of town on business, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. He is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but he is just trying to be helpful, even to the thief who has arrived in town.
A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in 14th-century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.
Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.
A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.
Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.
Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

Movie Name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
Description: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

Cast: Galen T. Chu,Ray Romano,Denis Leary,John Leguizamo,Chris Wedge
Description: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.
The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.
The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.
A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.
Sam Reide uses his power to time travel to solve the mystery of his girlfriend's death.

Cast: Tye Sheridan,Ana de Armas,Helen Hunt,John Leguizamo
Description: A voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.
An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

Movie Name: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!
Description: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

Movie Name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
Description: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.
In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.
A group of online chatroom friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Cast: Peter Farrelly,Jim Carrey,Jeff Daniels,Rob Riggle,Laurie Holden
Description: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Diane Keaton,Katherine Heigl,Amanda Seyfried
Description: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

Cast: Joey Lauren Adams,Ben Affleck,Fred Armisen,Diedrich Bader
Description: Jay and Silent Bob inadvertently sign away their names and rights to the new Bluntman and Chronic movie. Now they head to Hollywood to stop the film from being made. Along the way Jay discovers that he is a father.
Three generations come together in the week leading up to Mother's Day.
When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

Cast: Aubrey Plaza,Dane DeHaan,John C. Reilly,Molly Shannon
Description: A young man's recently deceased girlfriend mysteriously returns from the dead, but he slowly realizes she is not the way he remembered her.
When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

Cast: Eddie Murphy,Robin Givens,Halle Berry,David Alan Grier
Description: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.
After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.
After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.

Cast: Michelle Michaels,Robin Stille,Michael Villella,Debra De Liso
Description: A female high school student's slumber party turns into a bloodbath, as a newly escaped psychotic serial killer wielding a power drill prowls her neighborhood.
Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.
A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.
After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.
Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.
Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

Cast: Renée Zellweger,Harry Connick Jr.,Siobhan Fallon Hogan,J.K. Simmons
Description: A Miami, Florida businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a small Minnesota town.
A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.
An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.
A group of wealthy boys in Los Angeles during the early 1980s establish a 'get-rich-quick' scam that turns deadly.

A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.
Jason Voorhees stalks a group of friends who's just arrived to spend the weekend at a cabin near Crystal Lake.
A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

Movie Name: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
Cast: Joe Johnston,Mackenzie Foy,Keira Knightley,Morgan Freeman,Helen Mirren
Description: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.
A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

Cast: Sarah Jessica Parker,Jessica Biel,Ashton Kutcher,Michelle Pfeiffer
Description: The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the so-called "moonlight murders" begin again. Is it a copycat or something even more sinister? A lonely high school girl may be the key to catching him.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Uma Thurman,Rob Riggle,Oakes Fegley
Description: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.
A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.
A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Cast: Scott Moore,Mila Kunis,Kristen Bell,Kathryn Hahn,Jay Hernandez
Description: As their own mothers drop in unexpectedly, our three under-appreciated and over-burdened moms rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for mothers: Christmas.

When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

Cast: Wendi McLendon-Covey,Madison Iseman,Jeremy Ray Taylor,Caleel Harris
Description: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

Cast: JoBeth Williams,Craig T. Nelson,Heather O'Rourke,Oliver Robins
Description: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.
When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.
Two inseparable, hormonal, English BFF teen boys, avoided by all others, head to Ibiza with Kevin's parents. Will they lose their virginity there?

Cast: Dolph Lundgren,Louis Gossett Jr.,Jeroen Krabbé,Kim Miyori
Description: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.
When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.
Biopic about notorious American serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, taking place in both the past and the present.
A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.
A happily married professor, known for having many affairs with students, becomes the prime suspect when a young woman has gone missing.
After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracts the interest of a down-and-out reporter.
Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by an ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.

Cast: Chloë Grace Moretz,Blake Lively,Rory Culkin,Eddie Redmayne
Description: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.
A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.
A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

An egoistic real estate broker in huge debts, meets with an accident.God appears in front of him and informs him that he will have to play a "GAME OF LIFE". If he win, he will be sent back to earth and if not, he will be sent to hell.

Cast: Adam Kaufman,Catherine Mangan,Brad William Henke,Michael C. Williams
Description: Fifteen years ago, a group of men's lives were forever changed by a strange occurrence. Now, the same group of men will spend a night together ... in terror.

A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

Movie Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Description: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

Cast: Rachael Leigh Cook,Damon Wayans Jr.,Heather Graham,Caitlin Howden
Description: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each other.
A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle against a notorious Chinese criminal.

Cast: Joe Russo,Kate Hudson,Owen Wilson,Matt Dillon,Michael Douglas
Description: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.
Trapped in a London subway station, a woman who's being pursued by a potential attacker heads into the unknown labyrinth of tunnels beneath the city's streets.

Cast: Jennifer Connelly,Ariel Gade,John C. Reilly,Tim Roth
Description: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.
An alien ship crash lands onto a Russian city, many who saw it and the occupants start to question their own existence, while there are those who demand the aliens leave Earth.
A teenage girl in the Midwest becomes infected by an outbreak of a disease that slowly turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies. During her transformation, her loving father stays by her side.

Cast: Taraji P. Henson,Idris Elba,Leslie Bibb,Kate del Castillo
Description: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.
Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.
After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.
A group of high school dropouts is forced to attend night school in hopes that they will pass the GED exam to finish high school.

Five American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. This unexpected respite quickly descends into madness when they encounter a supernatural enemy more terrifying than anything seen on the battlefield.
Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.
After a plane is hijacked by terrorists, The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.

Cast: Iliza Shlesinger,Britney Young,Christopher Nicholas Smith,Adam Lustick
Description: After years of putting her career first, a stand-up comic meets a guy who seems perfect: smart, nice, successful and possibly too good to be true.
A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

Cast: Seána Kerslake,James Quinn Markey,Kati Outinen,David Crowley
Description: A single mother living in the Irish countryside with her son begins to suspect he may not be her son at all, and fears his increasingly disturbing behavior is linked to a mysterious sinkhole in the forest behind their house.
A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.
The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

Cast: Meryl Streep,Roseanne Barr,Ed Begley Jr.,Linda Hunt
Description: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

Cast: Kurt McKinney,Jean-Claude Van Damme,J.W. Fails,Kathie Sileno
Description: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.

Molly owns a quaint little sweet shop. Joel works for a gigantic candy company threatening to shut her down. How they meet, fall in love, break up and get back together is hilariously recounted in this rom-com spoof.

Cast: Kane Hodder,Joel David Moore,Deon Richmond,Tamara Feldman
Description: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.
When city girl Gabriela spontaneously enters a contest and wins a rustic New Zealand inn, she teams up with bighearted contractor Jake Taylor to fix and flip it.

Cast: Jennifer Aniston,Aaron Eckhart,Dan Fogler,John Carroll Lynch
Description: A widower whose book about coping with loss turns him into a best-selling self-help guru, falls for the hotel florist where his seminar is given, only to learn that he hasn't yet truly confronted his wife's passing.

Cast: Sanaa Lathan,Michael Ealy,Morris Chestnut,L. Scott Caldwell
Description: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a professional woman gets involved with a man who seems almost too good to be true.

Cast: Robert Urich,Mary Crosby,Michael D. Roberts,Anjelica Huston
Description: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

Cast: Tony Jaa,Tiger Hu Chen,Iko Uwais,Scott Adkins
Description: When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.
a couple from college get caught in a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a psychopathic hitchhiker and the police after witnessing a murder and being framed

An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Roger Moore,James Remar,Janet Gunn
Description: A group of gentlemen of fortune visits a legendary "Lost City", located in Tibet. They plan to steal a priceless statue "Golden Dragon" during the martial arts tournament.

Cast: Melanie Griffith,Ed Harris,Michael Patrick Carter,Malcolm McDowell
Description: A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named, V.

Cast: Brian Salzberg,Donna Dempsey,Stephen Charles Barry,James Gandia
Description: Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.
A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.
A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.
When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).
A fireman takes an unexpected course of action when a man whom he's been ordered to testify against, after being held up at a local convenience store, threatens him.

At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse.
Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.
A young drug dealer watches as his high-rolling life is dismantled in the wake of his cousin's murder, which sees his best friend arrested for the crime.
Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.
As a copycat killer named after movie villain Cinderhella stalks the student body at Grizzly Lake High School, a group of co-eds band together to survive while serving detention.

Cast: John Wayne,Mervyn LeRoy,John Wayne,David Janssen,Jim Hutton,Aldo Ray
Description: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

Cast: Robert De Niro,John Turturro,Stanley Tucci,Sean Penn
Description: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

Three college students set out to document what other people dread the most. However, one of the three turns out to secretly be a sadistic psychopath who uses this knowledge to gruesomely torture the subjects.
An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighboring woods.
An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Cologne high-speed Autobahn.

A guy proposes to his girlfriend, who drops dead. His BFF tries to get him to date other women but he only talks about his dead big love. At a diner he proposes to a cute waitress just to get his BFF off his back. She says yes.
A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.
A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.
Batman, along with a number of his allies and adversaries, finds himself transplanted from modern Gotham City to feudal Japan.
A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

Jenny's parents and siblings are always trying to set her up with a man when she visits them. What they don't know is that she's already met the right person, her "roommate" Kitty, 5 years ago and she wants to marry her and start a family.

Cast: Billy Bob Thornton,Kathy Bates,Tony Cox,Christina Hendricks
Description: Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.

Cast: Brie Larson,Samuel L. Jackson,Joan Cusack,Bradley Whitford
Description: Kit, a twenty-something dreamer, receives an invitation that would fulfill her childhood dreams.

Cast: Eddie Murphy,Thomas Haden Church,Yara Shahidi,Ronny Cox
Description: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

Cast: Michael Douglas,Jeremy Irvine,Martin Palmer,Hanna Mangan Lawrence
Description: In the Mojave Desert, a naked and unarmed hunting guide runs from a wealthy hunter who wants to ensure his silence in the death of an old man.
A father and his son attempt to bring in an assassin to the authorities, but his dangerous associates have other plans.
A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.

Cast: Vince Vaughn,Paul Giamatti,Elizabeth Banks,John Michael Higgins
Description: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

Cast: Seann William Scott,John C. Reilly,Chris Conrad,Rick Gonzalez
Description: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store vie for a coveted promotion.

Cast: Chuck Cooper,Victor Verhaeghe,Robert Gerard Larkin,Lindsay Lohan
Description: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.

Eliza (Lacey Chabert) and Debbie (Danielle Harris) are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals.
Set in 1965 New England, a troubled girl encounters mysterious happenings in the woods surrounding an isolated girls school that she was sent to by her disinterested parents.
When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

Cast: Justin Long,Keir O'Donnell,Evan Rachel Wood,Gideon Glick
Description: A young writer tries to impress a girl he meets online with an embellished profile, but he finds himself in a real mess when she falls for him and he has to keep up the act.
On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.
A medieval English knight is magically transported to present-day America where he falls for a high school science teacher who is disillusioned by love.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,50 Cent,Jessica Biel,Brian Presley
Description: Three soldiers struggle to readjust to life at home after returning home from a lengthy tour in Iraq.
Wanted by the Chinese mafia, a New York City bike messenger escapes into the world of parkour after meeting a beautiful stranger.
A groom and his three best men travel to the Australian outback for a wedding.

A disgraced black ops agent is dispatched to a remote CIA broadcast station to protect a code operator. Soon, they find themselves in a life-or-death struggle to stop a deadly plot before it's too late.
Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Luke Kirby,Ruth Negga,A.C. Peterson
Description: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.

A grown man caught in the crossfire of his parents' 15-year divorce discovers he was unknowingly part of a study on divorced children and is enlisted in a follow-up years later, which wreaks new havoc on his family.
Four individuals sign up for a psychological research study only to discover that they are now subjects of a brutal, classified government program.
Two immature detectives are joined by a pesky assistant district attorney in staking out a lakeside home where a Mafia trial witness is believed to be heading.
A slacker hatches a million-dollar idea. But, in order to see it through, he has to learn to trust his attractive corporate counterpart. Based on Max Barry's novel.
The film covers through fiction real-life events like the occupation of Iraq, the execution of Daniel Pearl, the Hood event and the Abu Ghraib torture scandal.
After being conned by the woman he loves, a finance agent arrives in India from USA to retrieve his money from the woman's father, a powerful MP and an industrialist.
In 2016 BC, a kind farmer leads an uprising in the city of Mohenjo Daro.

Movie Name: Ali Baba and the Seven Dwarfs
Description: Ali and Ilber, the two partners of Senay Cüccaciye, sell garden dwarfs. When their company starts to dwindle, they decide to participate in a gardening fair in Sofia with the plan to meet ...                See full summary »
A rookie detective Dylan Williams, hunt a serial killer who has a very twisted modus operandi.
Follows a new couple and their families, who find themselves examining modern love and family dynamics amidst clashing cultures, societal expectations and generational differences.

Cast: Ana de Armas,Lily Fisher,Julianne Nicholson,Tygh Runyan
Description: The story of American actress Marilyn Monroe, covering her love and professional lives.

Cast: Dwayne Johnson,Zac Efron,Alexandra Daddario,Priyanka Chopra Jonas
Description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

Cast: Brendan Fraser,Leslie Mann,Thomas Haden Church,Richard Roundtree
Description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.
The patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy the family.

Cast: Paul Giamatti,Bryce Dallas Howard,Jeffrey Wright,Bob Balaban
Description: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.
An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

Movie Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
Description: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent until Todd's 18th birthday. Now Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding after years apart, sending the groom-to-be's world crashing down.
A cheerleading stunt gone wrong landed her in a 20-year coma. Now she's 37, newly awake and ready to live out her high school dream: becoming prom queen.
Don Champagne seems to have it all, but when his wife, Mona, learns of his affair with a pretty new salesgirl, she will stop at nothing to maintain their storybook life.
Friends hiking the Appalachian Trail are confronted by 'The Foundation', a community of people who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.
Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wild-card C.I.A. agent joins forces with three international agents on a mission to retrieve it, while staying a step ahead of a mysterious woman who's tracking their every move.
Cindy must investigate mysterious crop circles and video tapes, and help the President in preventing an alien invasion.

Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there to help.

A quiet drifter is tricked into a janitorial job at the now condemned Willy's Wonderland. The mundane tasks suddenly become an all-out fight for survival against wave after wave of demonic animatronics. Fists fly, kicks land, titans clash -- and only one side will make it out alive.

Cast: Matthew McConaughey,Snoop Dogg,Isla Fisher,Stefania LaVie Owen
Description: A rebellious stoner named Moondog lives life by his own rules.
The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.
Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.
A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.
Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel and discover the grim reality behind it.
A group of young adults visit a boarded up campsite named Crystal Lake where they soon encounter the mysterious Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.
After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the Playboy Mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

Cast: Ashton Kutcher,Seann William Scott,Jennifer Garner,Marla Sokoloff
Description: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.
Life for the residents of a tower block begins to run out of control.

Cast: Dwayne Johnson,Steven Brand,Michael Clarke Duncan,Kelly Hu
Description: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Movie Name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Description: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

Cast: Jamie Lee Curtis,Judy Greer,Andi Matichak,James Jude Courtney
Description: Surviving victims of Michael Myers form a vigilante mob and vow to end his reign of terror.
An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.
A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

Cast: Aamir Khan,Ahmad Ibn Umar,Kareena Kapoor,Hafsa Ashraf
Description: Laal Singh Chaddha, a simple man whose extraordinary journey will fill you with love, warmth, happiness and will also make you laugh.

Cast: Michael Caine,Francesca Annis,Olivia Le Andersen,Jim Broadbent
Description: A true crime movie about a crew of retired crooks who pull off a major heist in London's jewelry district. What starts off as their last criminal hurrah, quickly turns into a brutal nightmare due to greed.

When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.
A devastated husband vows to bring justice to the people responsible for his wife's death while protecting the only family he has left: his daughter.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Julianna Margulies,Nathan Phillips,Rachel Blanchard
Description: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Cast: Jennifer Aniston,Gerard Butler,Gio Perez,Joel Marsh Garland
Description: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.
Vengeance drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power-hungry auto magnate who is systematically eliminating his competition.
Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

Movie Name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
Description: Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Anne Heche,Gaby Hoffmann,Don Cheadle
Description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

Movie Name: House at the End of the Street
Description: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.
An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.
The Bakers find themselves competing with a rival family of eight children while on vacation.
When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.
Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.
Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

Cast: Deborah Kaplan,Marc Webb,Rachael Leigh Cook,Tara Reid,Rosario Dawson,Gabriel Mann
Description: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.
A zombie virus has in the last 4 years spread to all South Korea. 4 Koreans in Hong Kong sail through the blockade to Incheon for USD20,000,000 on a truck.
Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.
A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.
