When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

Cast: Kabir Khan,Salman Khan,Katrina Kaif,Girish Karnad,Roshan Seth
Description: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

Cast: Louis Gossett Jr.,Jason Gedrick,David Suchet,Tim Thomerson
Description: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.
A teenage girl and her younger brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origin causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.
Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.
When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.
An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.
An American official realizes that his young son may literally be the Devil incarnate.
A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part-time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost gold.
A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.
A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

Movie Name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Description: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.
A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children's Little League squads.

Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.
During a vacation to Napa Valley, a group of long time friends reunite and revisit past choices in this hilarious and heartfelt comedy from director Amy Poehler.
Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

Cast: Sophia Lillis,Samuel Leakey,Alice Krige,Jessica De Gouw
Description: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

Movie Name: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
Description: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.

Cast: Ben Stiller,Teri Polo,Robert De Niro,Owen Wilson
Description: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker, have what it takes?

Cast: Bruce Willis,Tracy Morgan,Juan Carlos Hernández,Cory Fernandez
Description: Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.
A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

A Latina spin on Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility": two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.
A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.
After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.
A millionaire has his life turned upside down after firing his I.T. consultant.

In 2017, a successful businessman travels to the ends of the earth to find that the perfect woman is always under his nose. He hires a sexy renegade tracker to find an exact duplicate of his android wife.
A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl who got away in alternate versions of the same day.

Cast: Steve Guttenberg,Olivia d'Abo,Jay O. Sanders,John Terry
Description: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.
Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.

Cast: K.J. Apa,Maia Mitchell,Norman Johnson Jr.,Jacob Latimore
Description: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.
Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.
A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.
Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.
A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.
In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.
An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.
During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.
A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

Cast: Gadi Harel,Shiloh Fernandez,Noah Segan,Candice King,Eric Podnar
Description: Two high school boys discover an imprisoned woman in an abandoned mental asylum who cannot die.
A battle-hardened SEAL Team set off on a mission to destroy a shipment of US-built Stinger missiles that have fallen into terrorist hands.
The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.
A ghost reaches out to two bumbling ghostbusters for a business idea. However, their plans go downhill as the eerie ghost reveals her plan.
A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

Cast: Robert De Niro,Eddie Murphy,Rene Russo,Rachael Harris
Description: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based television cop show, while tracking down the manufacturer and distributor of an illegally made semi-automatic firearm.

Cast: Michael J. Fox,Geena Davis,Hugh Laurie,Jonathan Lipnicki
Description: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.
When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Natasha Henstridge,Jean-Hugues Anglade,Zach Grenier
Description: While seeking answers regarding the death of the twin brother he never knew he had, a French cop and his sibling's fiancée find themselves pursued by corrupt FBI agents and the Russian mafia.
After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

Cast: Michael Keaton,Deborah Kara Unger,Ian McNeice,Chandra West
Description: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.
U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica as the sun is about to set for six months.

Movie Name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
Description: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.
A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.

Cast: Shane West,Marla Sokoloff,Jodi Lyn O'Keefe,Manu Intiraymi
Description: A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.
A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

Cast: Jonathan Taylor Thomas,Brad Renfro,Charles Rocket,Eric Schweig
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.
A woman fights to protect her family during a home invasion.

Cast: Diane Keaton,Mandy Moore,Gabriel Macht,Tom Everett Scott
Description: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

Cast: Scott Grimes,Liane Curtis,Terrence Mann,Don Keith Opper
Description: Eggs of the small but voracious alien creatures called Crites are left behind on earth and, after hatching, set their appetites on the small farm town of Grover's Bend.
A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake.

Cast: Uma Thurman,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Justina Machado,Colin Firth
Description: When talk-radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.

Cast: Kari Matchett,Geraint Wyn Davies,Grace Lynn Kung,Matthew Ferguson
Description: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.
A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.
A young couple, bound by a seemingly ideal love, begin to unravel as unexpected opportunities spin them down a volatile and violent path and threaten the future they had always imagined.
Four criminals steal diamonds from a safe-deposit box in Cape Town00including a drive containing a US senator's evil plans. He'll do anything to get it back from Alexis Olga Kurylenko.
To escape a scandal, a bestselling author journeys to Scotland, where she falls in love with a castle - and faces off with the grumpy duke who owns it.

Cast: Martin Lawrence,Louis C.K.,James Earl Jones,Margaret Avery
Description: Dr. RJ Stevens is a talk show host who visits his family in the deep south. While there he reunites with his brother Otis, his sister Betty, his cousin/rival Clyde and his childhood love interest Lucinda Allen.
When Nadja becomes pregnant, she and David make an attempt to rekindle their relationship by traveling to the north of Sweden for a hiking trip, but soon their romantic trip turns into a nightmare.
During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.

Cast: Dennis Quaid,Ziyi Zhang,Lou Taylor Pucci,Clifton Collins Jr.
Description: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
A group of young film students run into real-life zombies while filming a horror movie of their own.
A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.
When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.
Upon learning that their mother has been lying to them for years about their allegedly deceased father, two fraternal twin brothers hit the road in order to find him.

Cast: Cary Solomon,Ashley Bratcher,Brooks Ryan,Robia Scott,Jared Lotz
Description: All Abby Johnson ever wanted to do was help women. As one of the youngest Planned Parenthood clinic directors in the nation, she believed in a woman's right to choose. Until the day she saw something that changed everything.

At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?
A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.

Cast: Todd Wilderman,Joel McHale,Mike Epps,Jane Krakowski,Billy Connolly
Description: After falling head over hooves in love with Giselle, Elliot's road to the altar takes a slight detour when Mr. Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

Movie Name: I Think I Love My Wife
Description: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.

Cast: Alexis Wajsbrot,Gregg Sulkin,Garrett Clayton,Bella Dayne,Sienna Guillory
Description: An evening of drunken prank calls becomes a nightmare for two teenagers when a stranger turns their own game against them, with deadly consequences.
Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father

Cast: Axelle Carolyn,Adam Gierasch,Andrew Kasch,Neil Marshall,Lucky McKee,Mike Mendez,Dave Parker,Ryan Schifrin,John Skipp,Paul Solet,Adrienne Barbeau,Hunter Smit,Cameron Easton,Caroline Williams
Description: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.
After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.
Gabriel the archangel fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the city's inhabitants.
A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.
The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of married couple Henry and Nancy Clark as they are vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.
Slick Private Investigator Mike Murphy (Burt Reynolds) and tough Police Lieutenant Speer (Clint Eastwood), once partners, now bitter enemies, reluctantly team up to investigate a murder.
A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

A down-on-his-luck music manager discovers a teenage girl with an extraordinary voice while on a music tour in Afghanistan and takes her to Kabul to compete on the popular television show, Afghan Star.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Eugene Levy,Miguel Ferrer,Luke Goss
Description: Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner, but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fiddler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vann's way.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje,Steven Berkoff,Nicholas Farrell
Description: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

Cast: Jericca Cleland,James Arnold Taylor,David Kaye,Jim Ward,Sylvester Stallone
Description: When the galaxy comes under the threat of a nefarious space captain, a mechanic and his newfound robot ally join an elite squad of combatants to save the universe.

A corporation hires a professional assassin to pose as its trade show representative who must organize the wedding of a Middle Eastern pop star, which will allow him the opportunity to kill a Middle Eastern politician.

Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.

Cast: Annette Bening,Robert Downey Jr.,Katie Sagona,Aidan Quinn
Description: A suburban housewife learns that she has a dreamworld connection to a serial murderer, and must stop him from killing again.

Daniel, the driver of a very special taxi in Marseille, gets a famous soccer player to the stadium in time and later helps his clumsy police friend Émilien catch the dangerous Belgian after he escaped on Émilien's guard.

Cast: Will Ferrell,Gael García Bernal,Diego Luna,Nick Offerman
Description: Scheming to save their father's ranch, the Alvarez brothers find themselves in a war with Mexico's most feared drug lord.
Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Jeff Goldblum,Damon Wayans,Peter Berg
Description: The boxing champ's promoter thinks, change is needed. He finds the one man who's beaten his black champ (at 17), a white man now in a rock band. Like Rocky, he trains heavily whereas the champ slacks.
When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.
After Marnie Watson kills her abusive husband in self-defense, she is condemned to house arrest... only to discover that the house is possessed by the enraged and violent spirit of her dead husband.

Cast: Jonathan Taylor Thomas,Jessica Biel,Adam LaVorgna,Gary Cole
Description: A college student faces an impossible journey when he is left stranded in the desert, thousands of miles from home, with no money and only a few days left until Christmas.
Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

Two female journalists and a photographer travel to Europe to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, only to find themselves embroiled in a struggle against a kind of evil they never expected.
A drama set centered around the war between Russia and Georgia, and focused on an American journalist, his cameraman, and a Georgian native who become caught in the crossfire.

Cast: Sean Cw Johnson,Kris Lemche,Stephen O'Reilly,Laura Regan
Description: Five people are offered one million dollars to spend six months together in an isolated mansion, with cameras watching their every move.
A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.

A young couple sets out on a weekend getaway in hopes of mending their failing relationship. However, a seemingly innocent weekend turns dark when the man discovers a videotape chronicling the events of a murder in his very own hotel room from years before.
An adopted woman returns to her home country and the family home that she never knew and must face the mystery that lies there.

Cast: Ranveer Singh,Sara Ali Khan,Sonu Sood,Ashutosh Rana
Description: Simmba, a Corrupt Officer, enjoys all the perks of being an immoral and unethical police officer until a life-changing event forces him to choose the righteous path.

The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

Cast: Sharan Sharma,Janhvi Kapoor,Pankaj Tripathi,Angad Bedi,Manav Vij
Description: Inspired by the life of a fearless young officer who made history by becoming the first Indian female Air Force officer to fly in a combat zone during the 1999 Kargil War

Movie Name: Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
Description: Naomi and Ely have loved each other their whole lives, even though Ely isn't exactly into girls. The institution of a "No Kiss List" has prevented the two from rifts in the past, but bonds are tested when they both fall for the same guy.
An all-American guy is murdered each day by horrifying pursuers, only to wake up in slightly different lives to experience the terror of being murdered again.

Darcy and Tom gather their families for the ultimate destination wedding but when the entire wedding party is taken hostage the bride and groom must save their loved ones--if they don't kill each other first.
A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.
Diana must contend with a work colleague, and with a businessman whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

Cast: Ben Affleck,Ana de Armas,Tracy Letts,Grace Jenkins
Description: A well-to-do husband who allows his wife to have affairs in order to avoid a divorce becomes a prime suspect in the disappearance of her lovers.
A newly-possessed high-school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

In the near future, convicts are offered the chance to volunteer as medical subjects to shorten their sentence. One such subject for a new drug capable of generating feelings of love begins questioning the reality of his emotions.
An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.
Ava is a deadly assassin who works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong she is forced to fight for her own survival.
The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.
Raquel's longtime crush on her next-door neighbor turns into something more when he starts developing feelings for her, despite his family's objections.

Cast: Val Kilmer,Tommy Lee Jones,Jim Carrey,Nicole Kidman
Description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

After being cut from the U.S.A. softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.
A crew of astronauts on a multi-generational mission descend into paranoia and madness, not knowing what is real or not.
A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.
A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.

Cast: Ana de la Reguera,Tenoch Huerta,Josh Lucas,Leven Rambin
Description: All the rules are broken as a sect of lawless marauders decides that the annual Purge does not stop at daybreak and instead should never end.
A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

Cast: Chad Michael Murray,Paris Hilton,Elisha Cuthbert,Brian Van Holt
Description: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.
A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.
Set in the distant future, a female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, must decide the fate of the wasteland's remaining populace.
Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

Cast: Kevin Bacon,Amanda Seyfried,Avery Tiiu Essex,Colin Blumenau
Description: A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.

Cast: Elizabeth Lail,Jordan Calloway,Talitha Eliana Bateman,Peter Facinelli
Description: When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out.
Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.
Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watchdog assigned to him.
Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

In the not too distant future, a drifter travelling through the desert discovers the largest gold nugget ever found. He must guard it from thieves amid harsh conditions and wild dogs while waiting for his partner to return.
Æon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.
A fishing boat captain juggles facing his mysterious past and finding himself ensnared in a reality where nothing is what it seems.
A young woman takes a trip to romantic Verona, Italy, after a breakup, only to find that the villa she reserved was double-booked, and she'll have to share her vacation with a cynical British man.
A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.
French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.
Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.
A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.
A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.
A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.
Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.
A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.
A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Cast: Anne Hathaway,Rebel Wilson,Alex Sharp,Tim Blake Nelson
Description: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.
Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.
Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

Cast: Meg Ryan,Mark Ruffalo,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Michael Nuccio
Description: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.
A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.

Cast: Conrad Vernon,Laura Brousseau,Kevin Pavlovic,Oscar Isaac,Charlize Theron,Chloë Grace Moretz,Javon 'Wanna' Walton
Description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.
A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.
After a one-night stand, a successful married man finds himself entangled in a cunning police detective's latest investigation.
A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

Cast: Laysla De Oliveira,Avery Whitted,Patrick Wilson,Will Buie Jr.
Description: After hearing a young boy's cry for help, a sister and brother venture into a vast field of tall grass in Kansas but soon discover there may be no way out...and that something evil lurks within.

Cast: Julien Maury,Camille Rowe,James Jagger,Eric Savin,Alexis Servaes
Description: A young and modern couple who go to France to explore an underwater house and share their findings on social media undergoes a serious change of plans when the couple enters the interior of...                See full summary »

Cast: Melissa McCarthy,Elizabeth Banks,Maya Rudolph,Leslie David Baker
Description: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.
God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.
A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

Cast: Hank Azaria,Katy Perry,Jonathan Winters,Neil Patrick Harris
Description: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.
A rich young boy finds his family the target of an inside job, and must use his cunning to save them.
A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

Cast: Colin Firth,Ben Kingsley,Aishwarya Rai Bachchan,Peter Mullan
Description: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Cast: Xavier Palud,Jessica Alba,Alessandro Nivola,Parker Posey,Rade Serbedzija
Description: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.
Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.
In the near future, a drone pilot sent into a war zone finds himself paired with a top-secret android officer on a mission to stop a nuclear attack.
A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.
A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widowed handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of his 8 and her 10 children.
To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

Cast: Sheri Moon Zombie,Bill Moseley,Sid Haig,Jeff Daniel Phillips
Description: After barely surviving prison, the demented Firefly clan go on the run, unleashing a whole new wave of murder, madness and mayhem.
A young boy just short of a monster is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.
Three career criminals find themselves trapped in a warehouse with the law closing in and an even worse threat waiting inside - a nigh unstoppable killer dog.
A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Cast: Melissa McCarthy,James Corden,Bobby Cannavale,Brian Tyree Henry
Description: When an all-powerful Superintelligence chooses to study average Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the A.I. decides to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth saving.

Movie Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
Description: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.
Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

Movie Name: The Man with the Iron Fists
Description: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.
A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

Cast: John Sanford,Judi Dench,Cuba Gooding Jr.,Jennifer Tilly,Randy Quaid
Description: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.
When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

Cast: Emma Roberts,Jake T. Austin,Lisa Kudrow,Don Cheadle
Description: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.
Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

Cast: Nicolas Cage,Ron Perlman,Claire Foy,Stephen Campbell Moore
Description: 14th-century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce that her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.
The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.
In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

Jimmy the Tulip's (Bruce Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Matthew Perry), whose wife (Natasha Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Amanda Peet) spring into action.

Cast: Jackie Chan,Amber Valletta,Billy Ray Cyrus,Madeline Carroll
Description: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

When his brother is murdered, a street dancer moves to Georgia to work his way through college. He joins a fraternity's step dancing team for a competition. Will he also get an education and the girl?
6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

Cast: Samuel L. Jackson,Onni Tommila,Ray Stevenson,Victor Garber
Description: A young teenager camping in the woods helps rescue the President of the United States when Air Force One is shot down near his campsite.

Cast: Peter Spierig,Helen Mirren,Sarah Snook,Finn Scicluna-O'Prey,Jason Clarke
Description: Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.
American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones,Christina Milian,Kelli Garner,Cedric the Entertainer
Description: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

Cast: Jackie Chan,Jennifer Love Hewitt,Jason Isaacs,Debi Mazar
Description: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.
After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.
A band of Vikings cross enemy lines and a panicked race begins. The losers will pay with their lives.

Cast: Jaime King,Samuel L. Jackson,Madeleine Stack,Eva G. Cooper
Description: A teenage special ops agent coveting a "normal" adolescence fakes her own death and enrolls in a suburban high school. She quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of high school is more challenging than international espionage.
A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

Cast: Nick Ormerod,Robert Pattinson,Uma Thurman,Kristin Scott Thomas,Christina Ricci
Description: A chronicle of a young man's rise to power in Paris via his manipulation of the city's wealthiest and most influential women.

A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every way imaginable, and unimaginable.

Movie Name: Three Men and a Little Lady
Description: Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.
A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.

A social media personality travels with his friends to Moscow to capture new content for his successful VLOG. Always pushing the limits and catering to a growing audience, they enter a cold world of mystery, excess, and danger.

Cast: Freddie Prinze Jr.,Claire Forlani,Brendon Ryan Barrett,Gay Thomas Wilson
Description: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.
A woman finds herself locked in a series of strange tunnels full of deadly traps.

Cast: Jim Varney,Victoria Racimo,John Vernon,Iron Eyes Cody
Description: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

A group of young horror fans go searching for a film that mysteriously vanished years ago but instead find that the demented killer from the movie is real, and he's thrilled to meet fans who will die gruesomely for his art.
E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.
Conrad (Jason Bateman) is helped by his old friend Dylan (Billy Crudup) and returns the favor by falling for Dylan's girlfriend Beatrice (Olivia Wilde).
A creature from another planet tries to seduce a shy Earth physicist to gain control over his researches. The result of this important mission much exceeded her expectations.
A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves.
A father who can't keep his promises is killed in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

Cast: Benjamin Brewer,Nicolas Cage,Elijah Wood,Sky Ferreira,Eric Heister
Description: A pair of cops investigating a drug invasion stumble upon a mysterious bank vault.
A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

Cast: Charles Bronson,Kay Lenz,John P. Ryan,Perry Lopez
Description: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.
A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.
In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.
A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

Cast: Steven Seagal,Keenen Ivory Wayans,Bob Gunton,Brian Cox
Description: Two cops are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man".
A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

Cast: Tim Allen,Jamie Lee Curtis,Dan Aykroyd,M. Emmet Walsh
Description: With their daughter, Blair, away in Peru, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

Cast: Paul Weitz,Chris Rock,Regina King,Chazz Palminteri,Eugene Levy
Description: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.

Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.
The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

Strapped for cash, three fraternity playboys make one last attempt to live the high life - cheaply - by masquerading as girls. But their chauvinistic ways come back to haunt them as they get a crash course in the opposite sex.
A guy's regrets over moving in with his girlfriend are compounded when she dies and comes back as a zombie.
The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return -- and has no intention of letting her escape.

Cast: Chuck Norris,M. Emmet Walsh,David Tress,Lenore Kasdorf
Description: Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.
Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.
Newlyweds move to the family thoroughbred horse ranch, where the husband's obsessive mother resolves to get rid of her new daughter-in-law.
A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.

Cast: Robert De Niro,John Travolta,Milo Ventimiglia,Liz Olin
Description: Two veterans of the Bosnian War, one American, one Serbian, find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

Cast: Danny Trejo,Charles S. Dutton,Ron Perlman,Patrick Fabian
Description: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

Cast: Edward Norton,Milla Jovovich,Robert De Niro,Frances Conroy
Description: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.
Journalist Anne Roland explores the disturbing links behind her friend's sudden disappearance, an ominous government research chemical, and a disturbing radio broadcast of unknown origin.

Cast: Monica Potter,Freddie Prinze Jr.,Shalom Harlow,Ivana Milicevic
Description: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.
A teenage girl moves into a remote country house with her family, only to discover that their gloomy new home has a horrifying past that threatens to destroy the family.

Cast: Chow Yun-Fat,Seann William Scott,Jaime King,Karel Roden
Description: Based on the very underground comic book of the same name, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street punk and tries teaching him how to protect the scroll of ultimate power from a secret Nazi organization bent on world domination.
After attracting both media and police attention for accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the River Thames, Edina and Patsy hide out in the south of France.

When Sahir, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics, turns into a thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago that ruined his father, Indian officers Jai and Ali are called to catch him.
The Crypt Keeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.
A one-man army comes to the rescue of the United States when a spy attempts an invasion.

Movie Name: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
Description: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

Movie Name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
Description: Ten years after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.
Two NYC money launderers make a quick drug deal. Things go wrong, as dirty cops are involved. One of the friends gets amnesia during their escape with the drugs and money.
The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.

Movie Name: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
Cast: Seann William Scott,Randy Quaid,Brando Eaton,Emilee Wallace
Description: A high school janitor has not recovered from his failed career as a tennis pro. He begins coaching his beloved sport to a group of misfits and leads them to the Nebraska State Championships.
Marybeth escapes the clutches of the bayou-butcher Victor Crowley and returns to the swamp with an army of hunters and gunmen, determined to end Crowley's reign of horror once and for all.
Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.
The seniors return to Earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on Earth?

Cast: Peter Spierig,Felicity Mason,Mungo McKay,Rob Jenkins,Lisa Cunningham
Description: A quaint Australian fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the ravenous undead, leaving a small group of those unharmed to find a way out.
A regular guy from America becomes king of England after a royal wipe-out puts him next in line.

When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin, it's up to her double Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona foils their plans.
The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.
A physicist who invents a time machine must travel back to the past to uncover the truth about his creation and the woman who is trying to steal it.

Cast: Clive Owen,Carice van Houten,Izán Corchero,Ella Purnell
Description: Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them.
A lonely, obnoxious young millionaire pays a family to spend Christmas with him.
A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.
An ex-convict and his bumbling crook brother fight for the same woman.
A couple's replacement babysitter turns out to be more than they bargained for when she subjects their kids to a series of twisted activities.
A young man leaves India to find fame and fortune in America where he unexpectedly becomes a sex guru.

Cast: Melissa Joan Hart,William Lee Scott,John Terry,James C. Victor
Description: Nine strangers are kidnapped and forced to figure out the connection they have to each other as one has to die every ten minutes.

Cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.,Cole Hauser,Jonathan LaPaglia,Ginny Weirick
Description: A man creates a hit list with a stranger during a drunken night out and must then race to try to save those he marked for death as the bodies pile up and all fingers point to him.
After seeing herself drive down the street, Radiologist Gina McVey unravels a mystery centered around a broken mirror.
A New York press agent must scramble when his major client becomes embroiled in a huge scandal.

Three hundred years in the future, Mars is colonized by humans and their leader Regulator Rogul plans to conquer Earth. Queen Königin Metapha is advised to send the gays Captain Kork, the ...                See full summary »
When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.
A young woman is courted and swept off her feet, only to realize a gothic conspiracy is afoot.

Cast: Justin Long,Michael Parks,Haley Joel Osment,Genesis Rodriguez
Description: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Cast: Josephine Langford,Hero Fiennes Tiffin,Khadijha Red Thunder,Dylan Arnold
Description: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

Cast: Malcolm McDowell,Peter O'Toole,Helen Mirren,Teresa Ann Savoy
Description: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and four hundred costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.
Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
Four teens are tricked by Professor Oldman (Tim Curry) into visiting a haunted house for a school project.
The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.
A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

Cast: Gerard Butler,Jim Sturgess,Abbie Cornish,Alexandra Maria Lara
Description: When the network of satellites designed to control the global climate starts to attack Earth, it's a race against the clock for its creator to uncover the real threat before a worldwide Geostorm wipes out everything and everyone.

Cast: Robert Pulcini,Amanda Seyfried,James Norton,Natalia Dyer,Alex Neustaedter
Description: An artist relocates to the Hudson Valley and begins to suspect that her marriage has a sinister darkness, one that rivals her new home's history.
Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.
A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.
A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.
Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying, drinking, and taking drugs, they are arrested, only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.
A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.
A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.
When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.
A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

Cast: Ben Affleck,Jennifer Garner,Colin Farrell,Michael Clarke Duncan
Description: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.
The African monarch Akeem learns he has a long-lost son in the United States and must return to America to meet this unexpected heir and build a relationship with his son.

Cast: Lorenza Izzo,Ariel Levy,Aaron Burns,Kirby Bliss Blanton
Description: A group of student activists travels to the Amazon to save the rain forest and soon discover that they are not alone, and that no good deed goes unpunished.

A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for Beth Cooper--the hottest, most popular girl in school--during his graduation speech. That very night, she shows up at his door offering to show him the best night of his life.

Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. At least, she thought he was a stranger...Until she later meets Jack, her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her. Based on the blockbuster NYT bestseller.

Cast: Nora-Jane Noone,Alexandra Park,Diane Farr,Christian Kain Blackburn
Description: Two sisters are trapped under the fiberglass cover of an Olympic sized public pool and must brave the cold and each other to survive the harrowing night.
A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

A young couple struggling to stay together, when they are offered an amazing deal on a home with a questionable past that would normally be beyond their means. In a final attempt to start fresh as a couple they take the deal.
A foster kid who lives with her mean foster mom sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

Cast: Lilly Wachowski,Channing Tatum,Mila Kunis,Eddie Redmayne,Sean Bean
Description: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.
A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.
The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

When the world is under attack from terrifying creatures who hunt their human prey by sound, 16-year old Ally Andrews (Kiernan Shipka), who lost her hearing at 13, and her family seek refuge in a remote haven.
A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.
After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

Cast: Ralph Macchio,Pat Morita,Robyn Lively,Thomas Ian Griffith
Description: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.
After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.

Cast: Owen Wilson,Salma Hayek,Nesta Cooper,Jorge Lendeborg Jr.
Description: A mind-bending love story following Greg who, after recently being divorced and then fired, meets the mysterious Isabel, a woman living on the streets and convinced that the polluted, broken world around them is a computer simulation.

Cast: Suzanne Coote,Kate Siegel,Jason O'Mara,Dulé Hill,Lucie Guest
Description: A young woman seeking self-improvement enlists the help of a renowned hypnotherapist. But after a handful of intense sessions, she discovers unexpected and deadly consequences.
After being forced to take a room in a boardinghouse, an immigrant in search of the American Dream finds herself in a nightmare she can't escape.
When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.
Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.

Cast: Jennifer Lopez,Alex O'Loughlin,Michaela Watkins,Eric Christian Olsen
Description: A woman conceives twins through artificial insemination, then meets the man of her dreams on the very same day.
Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.
Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.
A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.
A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?
A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.
The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.
Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective and an assassin, who will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Cast: Dwayne Johnson,Sarah Michelle Gellar,Seann William Scott,Carlos Amezcua
Description: During a three-day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations ...                See full summary »
Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Cast: Robin Williams,Marcia Gay Harden,Christopher McDonald,Ted Levine
Description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Cast: Victor Wong,Michael Treanor,Max Elliott Slade,Chad Power
Description: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

Movie Name: Astérix and Obélix: God Save Britannia
Description: Asterix crosses the channel to help second-cousin Anticlimax face down Julius Caesar and invading Romans.
Plaid-skirted schoolgirls are groomed by a secret government agency to become the newest members of the elite national-defense group, D.E.B.S.
A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.
A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.

Cast: Sylvester Stallone,Charles S. Dutton,Polly Walker,Kris Kristofferson
Description: A lead detective being stalked by a serial killer is asked to check into a clinic treating law enforcement officials who can't face their jobs.
Three courageous young Americans prevent a terrorist attack on a train bound for Paris.
The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

Cast: Scott Eastwood,Freddie Thorp,Ana de Armas,Gaia Weiss
Description: Two car thief brothers, who journey to the south of France for new opportunities, wind up in the cross hairs of the local crime boss.
A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "MJ" inside them.
A couple tries to repair their marriage while staying at a hotel in France.
An unexpected player joins the school basketball team - a circus dog who escaped from a cruel master.

Cast: Neil Patrick Harris,Jayma Mays,Katy Perry,Hank Azaria
Description: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

Cast: James Ransone,Shannyn Sossamon,Robert Daniel Sloan,Dartanian Sloan
Description: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

Cast: Taraji P. Henson,Kristen Ledlow,Josh Brener,Kellan Lutz
Description: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.
When an ambitious young lawyer takes on a big case against a powerful and ruthless executive of a large pharmaceutical company, he soon finds himself involved in a case of blackmail and corruption.

At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the 2 guys.

When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she loves.

A team of navy personnel stationed at a temporary base at the bottom of the ocean and tasked with setting up nuclear missiles discovers a huge underwater cavern which houses a giant prehistoric creature.
Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of seven year-old twins.

A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.
The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protégée escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.
As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

Cast: Leslie Nielsen,Jamie Lee Curtis,Casey Stevens,Anne-Marie Martin
Description: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.
A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

Cast: Hilary Swank,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Lee Pace,Christopher Lee
Description: When a young doctor suspects she may not be alone in her new Brooklyn loft, she learns that her landlord has formed a frightening obsession with her.
During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.
An illustrious British boarding school becomes a bloody battleground when a mysterious sinkhole appears at a nearby fracking site unleashing unspeakable horror.

Cast: Dan Aykroyd,Jamie Lee Curtis,Anna Chlumsky,Austin O'Brien
Description: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.
An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

Cast: Logan Paul,Peyton List,Lia Marie Johnson,Calum Worthy
Description: In a future, overcrowded, dystopian society, students with the lowest test scores are culled. Two students discover errors with the test.

Cast: Oxide Chun Pang,Dylan McDermott,Penelope Ann Miller,Kristen Stewart,John Corbett
Description: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.
Two alchemist brothers go on a quest for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their dead mother goes horribly wrong.

Cast: Alicia Silverstone,Benicio Del Toro,Christopher Walken,Jack Thompson
Description: A bratty teenager fakes her own kidnapping, but gets mistakenly kidnapped for real instead.

Cast: Devon Sawa,Robert B. Martin Jr.,Jason Segel,Michael C. Maronna
Description: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

At the wedding of a friend, the remaining bachelors bet on staying single. Seven years later, one of the two remaining loses $51,000 in Vegas. He must get the other guy married to cash in and pay his debt or die. A cute woman helps him.
Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.
After 25 years of a good marriage, what will Darcy do once she discovers her husband's sinister secret?
Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.
A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

Cast: Leslie Nielsen,Nicollette Sheridan,Charles Durning,Marcia Gay Harden
Description: Dick Steele, Agent WD-40 is assigned by his Director, to stop the evil General Rancor from destroying the world. WD-40 believed Rancor was dead and he teams up with the hot KGB Agent Veronique Ukrinsky to find Rancor and save the world.

Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.
Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.
Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Cast: Gene Hackman,Ray Romano,Maura Tierney,Marcia Gay Harden
Description: A US president who has retired after two terms in office returns to his hometown of Mooseport, Maine and decides to run for Mayor against another local candidate.
A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.
The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.
A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

Two childhood best friends, one a superficial womanizer and the other a barely functioning bipolar, embark on a road trip back to their hometown after one of them learns his estranged father has died.

Cast: Aaron Eckhart,Carice van Houten,Catalina Sandino Moreno,David Mazouz
Description: A scientist with the ability to enter the subconscious minds of the possessed must save a young boy from the grips of a demon with powers never seen before, while facing the horrors of his past.
A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.

Cast: Harrison Ford,Kristin Scott Thomas,Charles S. Dutton,Bonnie Hunt
Description: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.
An ill-fated television reporter is rescued and sent on a voyage across the ocean, but she is followed by the deadly virus that has plagued her and numerous others.

Cast: Jon Erwin,Sarah Drew,Sean Astin,Patricia Heaton,Trace Adkins
Description: Hardworking mom Allyson has a crazy night out with her friends, while their husbands watch their children.

Cast: Ashley Judd,Samuel L. Jackson,Andy Garcia,David Strathairn
Description: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

Movie Name: Once Upon a Time in Venice
Description: A Los Angeles detective seeks out the ruthless gang that stole his dog.

Cast: Hrithik Roshan,Vivek Oberoi,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Kangana Ranaut
Description: Krrish and his scientist father must save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his gang of mutants, led by the ruthless Kaya.
A police officer and a psychologist investigate the deaths of five people who were killed while trying to summon ghosts.
Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.

Movie Name: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
Cast: Abigail Spencer,Chad Michael Murray,Katee Sackhoff,Emily Alyn Lind
Description: A young family moves into a historic home in Georgia, only to learn they are not the house's only inhabitants. Soon they find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground and threatening to bring down anyone in its path.

Cast: John Goodman,Haley Joel Osment,Tony Jay,Mae Whitman
Description: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.
An awkward student with a deadly vendetta leads a group of outcasts who plot to avenge the years of humiliation they faced by the popular students at Hohn High School.

Cast: Shelly Hatton,Paul Hogan,Elijah Wood,Jonathan Banks,Robert Deacon
Description: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.
A stuffy businessman finds himself trapped inside the body of his family's cat.
A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog who develops a special friendship with Miles and will go to any length to protect his new companion.
A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.

Movie Name: The Other Side of the Door
Cast: Sarah Wayne Callies,Jeremy Sisto,Sofia Rosinsky,Logan Creran
Description: After her young son is killed in a tragic accident, a woman learns of a ritual which will bring him back to say goodbye, but when she disobeys a sacred warning, she upsets the balance between life and death.
A single father moves his two children to rural South Carolina, only to watch his daughter exhibit increasingly strange behavior.
After being drugged and raped at a party, a young woman contracts what she thinks is an STD; but, it's actually something much worse.

Cast: Dyllan Christopher,Tyler James Williams,Gia Mantegna,Quinn Shephard
Description: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.
An ex-logger comes to the aid of a woman who returns to her hometown in the Pacific Northwest and finds herself harassed and stalked by a former cop turned crime lord.
Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.
Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.

Cast: Bill Goldberg,Douglas Smith,Emilie de Ravin,Robert Culp
Description: Santa Claus is actually a demon who lost a bet with an Angel, so he becomes the giver of toys and happiness. But when the bet is off, he returns to his evil ways.
Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.
Eight college students travelling to Florida for Spring Break stumble into a remote town in Georgia, where they are set upon by the residents.

Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.
Nine strangers, with no apparent connection between them are abducted: drugged, kidnapped and sealed in a house together.

Cast: Clint Eastwood,Bernadette Peters,Timothy Carhart,Tiffany Gail Robinson
Description: Skip tracer Tommy looks for bail-jumper Lou Ann. Her crime is marrying Roy, who left counterfeit money in their mobile home and got her arrested. She leaves Roy in his pink Cadillac full of money. His psycho friends want their money back.
A pair of well-meaning, but socially inept brothers try to find their perfect mates in order to provide their dying father with a grandchild.

Cast: Oxide Chun Pang,Nicolas Cage,Charlie Yeung,Shahkrit Yamnarm,Panward Hemmanee
Description: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.
Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.
A teenage werewolf is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man.

Movie Name: Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie
Cast: Eric Wareheim,Tim Heidecker,Eric Wareheim,Robert Loggia,Will Ferrell
Description: Two guys get a billion dollars to make a movie, only to watch their dream run off course. In order to make the money back, they then attempt to revitalize a failing shopping mall.

Cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Michael Rooker,Catherine Dent,Brandon James Olson
Description: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

In 1976, Vikramaditya, a palmist and disciple of Paramahamsa, predicts to Indian Prime Minsiter Indira Gandhi that soon she will declare emergency in the country. The prediction comes true ...                See full summary »
Two over-loyal Celtic fans kidnap their opponent's star player in order to guarantee their team the championship.

Cast: Adrien Brody,Caroline Dhavernas,Ryan Robbins,Adrian G. Griffiths
Description: A man wakes in a car wreck at the bottom of a ravine must overcome incredible odds to survive.
An elite 'search and rescue' team transport onto an off-world mining-facility to rescue Whit Carmichael, the lone survivor of a biological outbreak.

Cast: Morgan Freeman,Kevin Spacey,Justin Timberlake,LL Cool J
Description: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.

Cast: Patrick John Flueger,Val Kilmer,Louisa Krause,Mattea Conforti
Description: A man becomes the superintendent of a large New York City apartment building where people mysteriously go missing.

Cast: Luke Wilson,Samuel L. Jackson,Leslie Bibb,Peyton List
Description: John is taken on a murder-fueled ride by a mysterious stranger that transforms the weak-willed, disillusioned husband and father into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.
After moving to a vineyard to start a new life with her husband, a pregnant woman begins to experience terrifying visions.
In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.
A comedy of errors wherein four men help each other to fool their prospective father-in-laws creating a cascade of confusion and mayhem.

Cast: Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla,Saif Ali Khan,Anil Kapoor,John Abraham,Deepika Padukone
Description: Ranvir treads through the world of the Indian mafia in Turkey as he looks to avenge the death of his lover and partner in crime.

Movie Name: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Wedding
Description: A year after helping Richard get to the throne, Amber is about to become his wife. But is she really made to be queen?

The trials and triumphs of Malti, an acid attack survivor. From the investigation of the attack to the court proceedings, the medical treatment to the emotional healing. Chhapaak is the story of the unquashable human spirit.

A man who has been wronged, whose children, wife, home, and future have been taken from him - A lonely and helpless woman left alone with her children. An old love that was a victim of the wrong time and the wrong case.

Cast: Enzo Zelocchi,Jennifer Lyons,Bryson Jones Allman,Brandi Maclaren
Description: An early thirties father, Mick, caught in a very lucrative drug dealing lifestyle with a raunchy drug abusing ex-wife, Mandy, who blackmails him for money and uses their son, Jake, as leverage.
Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

Cast: Matthew Lillard,Freddie Prinze Jr.,Sarah Michelle Gellar,Linda Cardellini
